




























































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































Abraham laga chokra, David laga chokra, Jisu Khrista laga purbo khandan laga likhi kene rakha kitab.
Abraham, Isaac laga baba hoise, aru Isaac, Jacob laga baba hoise, aru Jacob, Judah aru tai laga bhai-kokai khan laga baba hoise.
Judah pora Perez laga baba, aru Zerah pora Tamar laga baba, Perez pora Hezron laga baba hoise, aru Hezron, Ram laga baba hoise.
Ram, Amminadab laga baba hoise, aru Amminadab, Nahshon laga baba hoise, aru Nahshon, Salmon laga baba hoise.
Salmon, Boaz laga baba hoise, etu to Rahab logot pora hoise, aru Boaz, Obed laga baba Ruth logot pora hoise, aru Obed, Jesse laga baba hoise.
Jesse, Raja David laga baba hoise, aru David, Solomon laga baba, Uriah laga maiki logot pora hoise.
Solomon pora Rehoboam laga baba hoise, aru Rehoboam pora Abijah laga baba hoise, aru Abijah pora Asa laga baba hoise.
Asa pora Jehoshaphat laga baba hoise, aru Jehoshaphat pora Joram laga baba hoise, aru Joram pora Uzziah laga baba hoise.
Uzziah pora Jotham laga baba hoise, aru Jotham pora Ahaz laga baba hoise, aru Ahaz pora Hezekiah laga baba hoise.
Hezekiah pora Manasseh laga baba hoise, aru Manasseh pora Amon laga baba hoise, aru Amon pora Josiah laga baba hoise.
Josiah pora Jechoniah aru tai laga bhai-kokai khan laga baba hoise jitia taikhan ke Babylon desh te dhurikene loi jaise.
Babylon te loija pichete, Jechoniah pora Shealtiel laga baba hoise, aru Shealtiel pora Zerubbabel laga baba hoise.
Zerubbabel pora Abiud laga baba hoise, aru Eliakim pora Azor laga baba hoise.
Azor pora Zadok laga baba hoise, aru Zadok pora Achim laga baba hoise, aru Achim pora Eliud laga baba hoise.
Eliud pora Eleazar laga baba hoise, aru Eleazar pora Matthan laga baba hoise, aru Matthan pora Jacob laga baba hoise.
Jacob pora Joseph laga baba hoise, jun laga maiki Mary asele, jun pora Jisu ke jonom dise, aru Khrista koi kene matise.
Etu karone, sob khandan Abraham pora loi kene David tak choudah khandan thakise, aru David pora loi kene jun khan ke Babylon te loi jaise aru Jisu Khrista laga jonom etu tak choudah khandan thakise.
Jisu Khrista laga jonom eneka pora hoise. Tai laga ama, Mary Joseph ke shadi kori bole kotha milai loise, kintu tai duijon shadi nohua age te, Pobitro Atma dwara bacha pet te bukhi ja jani jaise.
Kintu Joseph, tai laga mota, ekjon dharmik manu asele aru sob manu age te taike bodnam nadibo nimite, tai lukaikene taike chari bole bhabona kori loise.
Jitia tai eitu khan bhabi thakise, Probhu laga ekjon sorgodoth tai laga sapna te ahise, aru eneka koise, “Joseph, David laga chokra, Mary ke tumi laga maiki kori bole bhoi na koribi, kele koile juntu ekjon bacha tai laga pet te bukhikena ase etu Pobitro Atma pora ase.
Tai ekjon chokra bacha ke jonom dibo, aru tumi tai laga naam Jisu rakhibo, kelemane Tai he Tai laga manu khan ke taikhan laga paap pora bachai lobo.”
Isor pora bhabobadi khan dwara kowa kotha khan pura hobole karone eitu khan sob tineka he hoi jaise. Eneka likha ase,
“Huni bhi, ekjon kumari maiki pora tai laga pet te bacha bukhi bo aru ekjon chokra ke jonom dibo, aru taikhan Tai laga naam Immanuel” rakhibo- etu motlob ase, “Isor amikhan logote ase.”
Etu pichete Joseph ghumai thaka pora uthijaise aru ki kotha Isor laga sorgodoth pora hukum dise tai etu manise aru Mary ke tai laga maiki bonai loise.
Kintu tai laga maiki pora bacha jonom nohua tak, tai laga usorte janai aru tai bacha laga naam Jisu matise.
Jitia Herod raja thakise, etu somoite Judea desh laga Bethlehem town te Jisu jonom hoise. Aru gyaan thaka manu khan purab phale thaka desh pora jonom laga kotha huni kene Jerusalem te ahise,
aru eneka hudise, “Yehudi khan laga Raja hobole jonom huwa to kot te ase? Kilekoile amikhan Tai laga tara purab te dikhise, aru amikhan Taike aradhana kori bole ahise.”
Kintu jitia Herod raja etu hunise, tai aru tai logote Jerusalem te thaka khan sob laga mon chinta hoise.
Etu pichete Herod raja pora mukhyo purohit aru niyom likha manu khan ke eke logote mati kene hudise, “Khrista to kun jagate jonom hobo?”
Taikhan taike koise, “Judea laga Bethlehem te, kele koile etu he bhabobadi khan pora Isor kotha te likhise,
‘Kintu tumi Bethlehem, Judah desh te thaka, Apnikhan Judah desh laga cholawta khan pora komti nohoi, Kilekoile apnikhan majot pora ekjon raja ulabo, Jun Ami laga Israel manu khan ke Rokhiya kori cholai loijabo.’”
Etu pichete, Herod pora lukaikene gyaani manu khan ke kotha korise aru tara ki homoi te ulaise etu bhal pora jani loise.
Etu pichete tai gyaani manu khan ke Bethlehem te eneka koi kene pathaise, “Jabi aru bhal pora etu bacha ke bisari bhi. Kitia apnikhan taike pabo, amike kobi, kele koile Moi bhi ta te jai kene Taike aradhana koribo.”
Raja laga kotha khan huna pichete, taikhan jai jaise, aru sabi, taikhan juntu tara purab te dikhise etu eke tara aru dikhise aru taikhan etu tara laga piche jaise. Etu tara taikhan age-age jai kene bacha thaka jaga uporte rukhi jaise.
Jitia taikhan tara ke dikhise, taikhan bisi khushi hoi kene rukhibo.
Titia taikhan ghor bhitor te ghusi se chutu bacha ke Tai laga ama Mary pora dhuri thaka dikhise. Taikhan athukari kene Taike aradhana korise. Taikhan khushi pora taikhan laga khajana khan khuli kene suna, aru dhona, aru bhal gundh laga tel khan daan korise.
Kintu Isor pora taikhan laga sapna te Herod logote wapas najabi koi kene hoshiar kori dise, etu nimite dusra rasta pora taikhan nijor desh te wapas jai jaise.
Kintu taikhan jai ja-a pichete, Isor laga sorgodoth sapna te ahikena Joseph ke koise, “Uthibi, bacha aru ama ke loi kene Egypt te polai jabi aru ami nokuwa tak ta te thakibi, kele koile Herod Raja pora etu bacha ke mora bole bisari bole ase.”
Titia utu rati te, Joseph uthikena bacha aru ama ke loi kene Egypt desh te polai jaise.
Tai Herod namora tak ta te he thakise. Juntu kotha Isor laga bhabobadi pora koi disele, etu pura hoi jaise, “Egypt pora Ami laga chokra ke mati loise.”
Jitia Herod gyaani manu khan pora taike thogaise koi kene janise, tai bisi khong uthise. Etu nimite tai laga sipahi khan ke pathaikena jiman dui saal pora niche mota bacha Bethlehem te ase, sobke morai dibole hukum dise. Kilekoile utu somoite Jisu jonom koi kene dui saal ase koi kene Herod khobor paikena thakise.
Bhabobadi Jeremiah pora ki kotha koi dise eitu khan sob pura hoi jaise, juntu eneka likha asele,
“Ramah town te ekta awaj hunise, Bisi mon dukh koi kene kandi thakise, Rachel tai laga bacha nimite kandi thakise, Aru kunke bhi tai laga mon shanti koribo diya nai kele koile taikhan nathaka hoi jaise.”
Aru jitia raja Herod mori jaise, sabi, Isor laga ekjon sorgodoth, Joseph to Egypt te thaka somoite tai laga sapna te ahise,
aru eneka koise, “Uthikena bacha aru tai laga ama ke loi kene Israel desh te jabi, kele koile jun manu bacha ke mora bole thakise taikhan morise.”
Etu pichete Joseph uthikena, bacha aru ama ke loi jaise, aru Israel laga desh te jaise.
Kintu jitia tai hunise Herod laga chokra Archelaus he Judea laga raja ase, titia, tai ta te jabole bhoi hoi jaise. Hoilebi Isor pora tai laga sapna te hoshiar kori dise, aru etu jaga chari kene, tai Galilee jagate jaise.
Aru Nazareth laga sheher te jaise aru ta te thaki jaise. Eneka pora, juntu bhabobadi khan pora Isor laga kotha koi dise etu pura hoi jaise, juntu asele, Taike Nazareth laga manu koi kene matibo.
Etu somoite Baptizma diya John ahise aru Isor laga kotha prochar kori kene Judea laga sunsan jagate ahise,
aru eneka koise, “Mon ghura bhi, kele koile sorgo laga rajyo to usorte ahi jaise.”
Kilekoile bhabobadi Isaiah pora tai laga he kotha koi diya eneka likha ase, “Ekjon kunba sunsan jaga pora hala kori ase, ‘Isor laga rasta taiyar koribi, Tai laga rasta sidha koribi.”
Etiya, John to uth janwar laga chuli pora bona kapra lagai aru komor te chamra laga peti pora bandhe. Aru tai pango aru jongol laga mou pani he khai.
Titia Jerusalem sheher, aru pura Judea desh, aru Jordan Nodi laga sob jaga pora manu khan taike lok kori bole ahe.
Taikhan laga paap shikar kora pichete, John pora Jordan Nodi te taikhan ke baptizma di thakise.
Kintu tai logot bisi Pharisee aru Sadducee khan baptizma lobole ahi thaka dikhise, aru tai taikhan ke koise, “Tumikhan saph laga bacha khan, kun koise tumikhan Isor laga khong pora polabo karone?
Etu nimite, mon ghura laga bijon apnikhan laga kaam pora dikhai dibi.
Apnikhan laga monte ‘Amikhan laga purbojo Abraham ase’ eneka nabhabi bhi. Moi tumikhan ke koi ase Isor to etu pathor khan loi kene Abraham laga khandan bonabo pare.
Kintu sob ghas khan kati bole kuthar to age pora taiyar hoi kene ase. Juntu ghas bhal phol nadhure etu ghas ke katikena jui te phelai dibo.
Moi to tumikhan ke pani pora he baptizma dibo. Kintu Jun ami laga pichete ahi ase, Tai to ami pora bisi hokti thaka ase, Tai laga chapal moi dhori bole layak nai. Tai tumikhan ke Pobitro Atma aru jui pora baptizma dibo.
Tai dhaan kati bole dao loi kene ahi ase, sob dhaan ke dhaan ghor te joma kori kene ghas khan ke kitia bhi khotom nohobole jui te phelai dibo.”
Etu pichete Jisu Galilee jaga pora ulaikena baptizma lobole Jordan Nodi te John logot ahise.
Hoilebi John to Jisu ke rukhabole bisi kosis korise, aru eneka koise, “Ami he Apuni laga hath pora baptizma lobo lage, hoilebi Apuni he moi logote ahise?”
Kintu Jisu taike eneka koise, “Etiya karone to eneka koridi bhi, kele koile Amikhan bhi dharmikta kaam sob pura korile he thik ase.” Etu pichete John pora kotha mani loise.
Jitia Jisu baptizma loi kene pani pora ulaise, sorgo pora ekta pohor ahise aru Isor laga Atma kopu chiriya nisena hoi kene Tai uporte rukhi jaise.
Etu pichete, sabi, ekta awaj sorgo pora koise, “Etu Ami laga bisi morom thaka Putro ase. Ami Tai uporte bisi khushi ase.”
Etu pichete Jisu ke Atma pora ekta sunsan jagate loi jaise juntu jagate saitan pora taike porikha koribo.
Aru chalis din aru chalis rati Jisu upwas korise, etu karone Tai bhuk lagi jaise.
Titia porikha kora jon ahikena Taike eneka koise, “Apuni Isor laga Putro ase koile, etu pathor khan ke roti hobole kobi.”
Kintu Jisu taike jowab dikena koise, “Isor kotha te eneka likhi kene ase, ‘Manu to khali bhaat khaikena jinda nathake, kintu Isor laga mukh pora ula kotha te he jinda thakibo.’”
Etu pichete saitan pora Jisu ke pobitro sheher te loi jaise aru mondoli laga sob pora uporte khara koribo dise,
aru Taike koise, “Apuni Isor laga Putro ase koile, yate pora nijorke nichete phelai dibi, kele koile Isor laga kotha te eneka likha ase, ‘Tai pora Tai laga duth khan ke hukum dikene Apuni ke bachai lobo,’ Aru, ‘Taikhan laga hath pora Apuni ke dhuri lobo, Aru Apuni laga theng ke pathor pora bhi jokhom nahobo.’”
Jisu taike eneka koise, “Aru Isor kotha te etu bhi likhi kene ase, ‘Apuni laga Probhu Isor ke porikha na koribi.’”
Aru, saitan pora Jisu ke untcha pahar te loi jaise aru Taike prithibi laga rajyokhan laga dangor mohima thaka dikhai dise.
Saitan pora Taike koise, “Apuni moike athukari kene aradhana korile, eitu khan sob ami Apnike di dibo.”
Titia Jisu pora taike koise, “Yate pora jai jabi, Saitan! Kilekoile Shastro te eneka likhi kene ase, ‘Tumikhan khali Probhu, tumi laga Isor ke he aradhana koribi, aru khali Taike he sewa koribi.’”
Titia saitan Taike chari kene jai jaise, aru sabi, sorgodoth khan ahi kene Taike modot korise.
Jitia John ke dhurise koi kene Jisu khobor paise, Tai Galilee jagate wapas jai jaise.
Tai Nazareth sheher chari kene Galilee Samundar laga usorte thaka, Capernaum town te jaise, etu jaga to Zebulun aru Naphtali laga majot te ase.
Isaiah bhabobadi dwara Isor kotha pora kowa pura hobole karone eitu khan sob eneka hoise,
“Zebulun laga mati aru Naphtali laga mati, Sagar phale, Jordan paar kori kene, Porjati khan laga Galilee!
Utu manu khan jun andhera te bohi thake taikhan dangor ekta ujala dikhise, Aru jun khan mora laga chaya aru jagate bohi thake, Taikhan uporte ekta pohor dikhai dise.”
Utu somoi pora he Jisu prochar kori bole shuru hoise aru koise, “Mon ghura bhi, kele koile sorgo laga rajyo to usor hoise.”
Jitia Tai Galilee Nodi phale berai thakisele, Tai Simon junke Peter koi, aru tai laga bhai Andrew khan ke maas dhora jaal loi kene samundar te phelai thaka dikhise, kele koile taikhan maas dhora manu thakise.
Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Ahibi, Ami laga piche koribi, aru Moi tumikhan ke manu dhori bole bonai dibo.”
Loge-loge taikhan laga maas dhura jaal khan phelai dise aru Jisu laga piche kori bole shuru hoise.
Jitia Jisu ta te pora jai thakise, tai duijon bhai ke dikhise, James, Zebedee laga chokra, aru tai laga bhai John Tai ekta naw te taikhan laga baba Zebedee logote maas dhura jaal khan milai thakise. Jisu taikhan ke matise,
Aru etu loge-loge taikhan laga naw aru baba ke chari kene Jisu laga piche korise.
Titia Jisu Galilee laga sob jagate berai jaise, synagogue khan te sikhaise, aru rajyo laga susamachar prochar korise, aru sob kisim laga ghao bemar aru bemar manu khan ke changai korise.
Tai laga khobor sob Syria jagate punchi jaise, aru manu khan Jisu usorte kisim-kisim bemar pora dukh pai thaka khan, gaw bhitor te bhoot huma khan, murgi-bemar thaka khan, aru jothor bemar thaka khan sobke loi kene anise. Aru taikhan ke Jisu pora changai kori dise.
Aru Galilee, Decapolis, Jerusalem, Judea, aru Jordan pora bhi dur thaka sob jaga pora manu khan Jisu logot ahise.
Bhir bisi dangor hoija pora, Jisu to ekta tilla uporte uthijaise. Tai ta te boha pichete, tai laga chela khan bhi Tai usorte ahise.
Aru Jisu pora Tai laga chela khan ke eneka koi kene sikhaise,
“Atma te dukhia thaka khan dhonyo ase, Kilekoile sorgo laga rajyo taikhan nimite ase.
Dukh koi kene thaka khan, taikhan dhonyo ase, Kilekoile taikhan laga mon aram kori dibo.
Nomro hoi kene thaka khan dhonyo ase, Taikhan prithibi laga adhikari hobo.
Dharmikta nimite bhuk aru pyaas thaka khan dhonyo ase, Taikhan ke bhorta kori dibo.
Dayalu thaka manu khan dhonyo ase, Taikhan daya pabo.
Mon sapha thaka khan dhonyo ase, Taikhan Isor ke dikhibo.
Shanti nimite kaam kora khan dhonyo ase, Taikhan ke Isor laga bacha khan koi kene matibo.
Dharmikta nimite dukh pai thaka khan dhonyo, Sorgo laga desh to taikhan nimite ase.
Tumikhan dhonyo ase jitia Ami laga naam nimite manu khan pora tumikhan ke gali dibo, dukh digdar dibo aru misa misi bodnam dibo.
Monte bisi khushi hobi kele koile sorgote tumikhan nimite bisi dangor inam rakhi kene ase. Jun bhabobadi khan tumi laga age te ahisele, taikhan ke bhi eneka dukh digdar dise.
Tumikhan etu prithibi laga nimok nisena ase. Kintu nimok laga swadh haraise koile, kineka tai laga swadh to arubi anibo? Etu to eku kaam laga nohoi jai, kintu etu ke phelai dibo aru manu khan pora chipai dibo.
Tumikhan etu prithibi laga puhor ase. Ekta sheher ke pahar uporte bonaile lukabo napare.
Nohoile bhi manu khan tai laga saaki julai kene kiba ekta dabba pora bondh kori kene narakhe, kintu etu saaki ke khamba te rakhikena pura ghor ke ujala kori bole diye.
Tumi laga pohor ke eneka ujala kori dibi manu khan age te, titia taikhan tumi laga bhal kaam khan sob dikhi jabo aru tumi laga Baba Isor jun sorgote ase, Taike mohima dibo.
Moi Isor laga niyom aru bhabobadi khan ke khotom kori dibo nimite ahise eneka nabhabi bi. Moi khotom kori dibole aha nohoi, kintu eitu khan sob pura kori dibo nimite ahise.
Kilekoile moi hosa pora tumikhan ke koi ase jitia tak prithibi aru akas khan khotom nohoi, ekta dagi nohoile ekta chutu kotha bhi naharabo, jitia tak etu kotha khan sob pura nohoi.
Etu nimite, kun pora etu niyom aru hukum khan bhangabo aru dusra khan ke bhi eneka kori bole sikhabo, taikhan laga naam bhi sorgo laga rajyo pora hatai dibo. Kintu kun pora etu hukum aru niyom sob rakhe, taike sorgo laga rajyote mohan matibo.
Etu nimite Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, tumikhan laga dharmikta to niyom likha khan aru pharisee khan pora bhi bhal hobo lage, eneka nohoile tumikhan sorgo laga rajyote ahibo na paribo.
Tumikhan hunise utu purana somoite eneka koi dise, ‘Morai diya kaam na koribi,’ aru, ‘Jun pora manu ke morai taikhan Isor laga bisar te ahibo.’
Kintu Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, sob manu jun khan tai nijor bhai ke gusa kore, tai logot Isor laga bisar ahibo, aru nijor bhai ke eneka kowa khan to sabha age te bisi digdar hobo, ‘Tumi kaam nathaka manu!’ Aru tai norok laga jui te juli bo jodi ekjon pora tai bhai ke eneka koi, ‘Tumi murkho manu!’
Etu karone, jitia tumi Isor laga age te daan dibole ane, aru bhai ke kiba biya korise koi kene monte ahise koile,
tumi laga dhun khan bedi usorte chari dibi. Aru poila jai kene tumi laga bhai logote mon milai lobi, etu pichete ahikena Isor ke daan dibi.
Kunba tumike bisar ghor te loijabo koi ase koile, naja-a age te tai logote kotha milai lobi, kele koile ekbar bisar ghor te jaise koile tai pora tumike ukil laga hathte di dibo, aru ukil pora tumike sipahi khan logote di dibo aru sipahi khan pora tumike bondhi ghor te rakhidibo.
Hosa pora Ami tumikhan ke koidi ase, tumi bondhi ghor pora bahar naulabo jitia tak tumi laga dhar sob tirai nadibo.
Tumikhan eneka kowa hunise, ‘Bebichari na koribi.’
Kintu Moi tumikhan ke koidi ase, jun manu ekjon mahila ke biya kaam kori bole bhabi loi, tai mon bhitor te bebichar kori loise.
Jitia ekta suku pora tumike biya kaam koribo di ase, utu suku ke ulaikene dhur te phelai dibi. Kilekoile gaw te ekta biya saman nimite pura gaw norokte ja pora to, ekta suku nathaki kene jinda thaka he bhal hobo.
Tumi laga ekta hath pora paap kaam kori ase koile, etu ke kati kene phelai dibi. Kilekoile pura gaw norokte ja pora, ekta hath nathaki kene jinda thakile he bhal ase.
Eneka bhi koi kene ase, ‘Jun mota tai laga maiki ke chari bole mon ase, tai pora chari diya laga chithi likhi kene tai laga maiki ke dibole lage.’
Kintu Moi tumikhan ke etu koidi ase, jun mota dusra maiki logote bebichar kori bole tai laga maiki ke chari diye, taike bebichari maiki bonai di ase. Aru jun manu pora etu chari diye maiki ke shadi koribo, tai bhi bebichar kori loise.
Aru, tumikhan poila jamana te huni kene thakibo, ‘Misa kotha nimite kosom nakhabi, kintu ji kosom Probhu logote korise etu purah koribi.’
Kintu Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, tumi laga kosom nimite, sorgote thaka laga naam nalobi, kele koile etu Isor laga singhason ase;
prithibi laga naam nalobi, kele koile etu Isor laga theng rakha jaga ase; Jerusalem laga naam nalobi, kele koile etu mohan Raja laga desh ase.
Aru nijor laga naam loi kene kosom nakhabi, kele koile tumi nijor laga chuli ke boga nohoile kala kori bole hokti nai.
Kintu tumi laga kotha ‘Hoi to, hoi' kobi, aru ‘Nohoi to Nohoi’ kobi. Kintu etu pora aru bisi kotha kora khan to sob biya khan pora ase.
Tumikhan hunise eneka koi kene ase, ‘Suku laga bodli suku, aru daat laga bodli daat.’
Kintu Moi koi ase, tumike kunba golti kora manu ke badla lobole na koribi. Hoilebi, jun manu tumike mukh laga ekta phale thapor mare, tumi laga dusra phale bhi mari bole dibi.
Kunba manu bisar ghor te jabole itcha hoi aru tumi laga kapra pindhi loi, taike apuni laga chador bhi di dibi.
Kunba manu khan pora tumike ek kilometer jabole koile, tumi tai logote dui kilometer jabi.
Jun manu tumike kiba mangile taike di dibi, aru jun manu tumike kiba dhar lobole mange, taike mana na koribi.
Tumikhan hunise eneka koi kene, ‘Tumi laga ghor usorte thaka manu ke morom koribi aru tumi laga dushman ke ghin koribi.’
Kintu Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, tumi laga dushman ke morom koribi, aru jun khan tumike dukh-digdar di ase, taikhan nimite prathana koribi,
eneka korile tumikhan sorgote thaka Baba laga bacha khan hobo. Kilekoile Tai laga suryo to biya manu aru bhal manu ke bhi diye, aru borkhon pani to biya manu aru bhal khan ke bhi diye.
Jitia tumikhan khali morom kora khan ke morom kore, etu to ki labh pabo? Kilekoile poisa utha manu khan bhi eneka kore nohoi?
Tumikhan khali tumi laga bhai khan he mane koile, etu kori kene tumi ki dangor kaam korise? Isor ke najana khan bhi dusra khan ke eneka kore nohoi?
Etu nimite, tumikhan ekdom thik hobo lage, jineka tumikhan laga sorgo Baba Isor thik ase.
Etiya bhal pora bujhi lobi, tumikhan manu ke dikha bole nimite bhal kaam na koribi, nohoile sorgote thaka Baba Isor pora tumikhan ke eku inam nadibo.
Jitia tumikhan kunba ke modot di ase koile, sob manu ke hunai kene hala na koribi, kele koile Pharisee khan bhi manu khan ke dikha bole nimite mondoli khan te aru rasta khan te hala kore. Hosa pora Moi koidi ase, taikhan laga inam taikhan paikena ase.
Kintu tumikhan jitia daan diye, tumi laga dyna hath ki kori ase tumi laga baya hath ke janibole nadibi,
titia tumi daan diya to kun bhi najanibo. Kintu tumi laga Baba jun sob sai ase tumike lukai kene inam dibo.
Jitia tumikhan prathana kore, kopoti khan kora nisena nahobi, kele koile taikhan mondoli khan te aru rasta kinar khan te dikha bole karone prathana kore. Hosa pora Moi koidi ase, taikhan laga inam to taikhan pabo.
Kintu, jitia tumikhan prathana kore, ghor bhitor dorja bondh koribi aru lukai kene tumi laga Baba ke prathana koribi. Titia tumi laga Baba jun tumike sai ase, Tai tumike inam dibo.
Jitia tumikhan prathana kore, Porjati khan nisena bisi kotha nakobi, kele koile taikhan bhabe eneka koile taikhan laga kotha huni lobo.
Taikhan nisena na koribi, kele koile tumi laga Baba tumi ki mangi bole ase etu age pora jani ase.
Etu nimite, eneka prathana koribi: ‘Amikhan laga Baba jun sorgote ase, Apuni laga naam pobitro hoi kene untcha hobi.
Apuni laga sorgo ahibole dibi. Apuni laga itcha hobole dibi, etu prithibi te jineka sorgote ase.
Amikhan ke hodai din laga kha luwa dibi.
Amikhan laga dhar khan maph kori dibi, Jineka ami pora amikhan laga dhar thaka khan ke maph kori dise.
Amikhan ke porikha te giri bo nadibi, kintu biya jon pora amikhan ke bachai lobi.’
Kilekoile jitia tumikhan pora dusra manu khan laga golti khan maph kore, tumi laga sorgote thaka Baba bhi tumikhan ke maph kori dibo.
Kintu jitia tumikhan dusra manu khan ke maph nakore, tumi laga sorgote thaka Baba bhi tumikhan laga golti maph nakoribo.
Jitia tumikhan upwas rakhe, kopoti khan kora nisena mon dukh laga chehera nadikhabi, kele koile taikhan to manu khan ke dikhabo nimite taikhan laga chehera biya kori kene dikhai, aru taikhan nijor laga inam pai loise.
Kintu, jitia tumi upwas rakhe, tumi nijor laga matha te tel hali lobi aru chehera ke dholai lobi,
titia manu khan tumike saikene najanibo tumi upwas kori ase, kintu khali tumi laga Baba he janibo; aru tumi laga Baba jun sob sai ase, Tai he tumike inam dibo.
Nijor nimite eku dhun joma na koribi, juntu jagate tumi laga sob dhun puka aru kira pora khotom kori dibo, aru jun jagate chor khan bhangai kene chor kori lobo.
Hoilebi, nijor laga sob dhun sorgote joma koribi, juntu jagate napuchibo aru pukakhan pora khotom nakoribo, aru chor khan bhanga bole na paribo.
Kilekoile jun jagate tumi laga dhun ase, ta te tumi laga mon bhi thakibo.
Suku to tumi laga gaw te saaki nisena ase. Etu nimite, jitia tumi laga suku to thik thakibo, tumi laga gaw purah te puhor thakibo.
Kintu jitia tumi laga suku te letera thakibo, tumi laga pura gaw bhi letera thakibo. Etu nimite, juntu pohor tumi bhitor te ase, etu to andhera ase koile, utu andhar to kiman bhi dangor ase!
Kun manu bhi duita malik ke sewa koribo na paribo, kele koile tai ekjon malik ke morom koribo aru ke ghin koribo, nohoile ekjon ke mon dibo aru dusra ke mon nadibo. Tumi Isor aru dhun ke sewa koribo na paribo.
Etu karone, Moi koi ase, nijor laga jibon nimite chinta na koribi, ki khabo nohoile- nohoile tumi laga gaw nimite, nohoile ki kapra pindhibo. Kha luwa pora bhi jibon to dangor nohoi naki, aru kapra pora bhi tumi laga gaw he dangor nohoi naki?
Akas uporte chiriya khan ke sabi. Taikhan kheti bhi nakore, aru kheti bhi nakate, nohoile taikhan laga ghor te joma nakore, kintu tumi laga sorgote thaka Baba pora taikhan ke sob khilai. Tumikhan etu chiriya khan pora bhi bisi dangor ase nohoi?
Kintu tumikhan jun bisi chinta kore, etu pora tumikhan laga jibon ke lamba koribo pare naki?
Tumikhan kele kapra nimite iman chinta kori ase? Kheti te phul thaka khan laga bhabi sabi, taikhan kineka phule. Taikhan eku kaam nakore, aru kapra bhi nabonai.
Titia bhi Ami koi ase, Solomon ekjon dangor raja hoi kene bhi, taike eitu khan nisena kapra lagai diya nai.
Kintu jodi Isor pora kapra pindhai dibole pare, etu kheti te thaka phul khan jun aji ase aru kali kati kene chulah te julai diye, titia hoile Tai tumikhan ke bhi bisi kapra pindhai dibo na paribo naki, tumi komti biswas thaka manu khan?
Etu nimite, bisi chinta kori kene eneka nakobi, ‘Amikhan ki khabo?’ Nohoile, ‘Amikhan ki pindhibo?’
Kilekoile Isor najana khan pora eitu khan he bisare, aru sorgote thaka Baba Isor pora tumikhan ki lage, Tai sob jani ase.
Kintu poila Tai laga sorgo rajyo aru dharmikta bisaribi aru eitu khan sob saman tumikhan ke Tai pora dibo.
Etu karone, kali nimite chinta na koribi, kele koile kali to tai nijor he chinta koribo. Hodai dinte tai nijor laga biya din thake.
Dusra ke bisar na koribi, tinehoile tumike bhi bisar nakoribo.
Ki kotha pora tumi bisar kore, tumike bhi etu pora bisar koribo, aru ki loi kene tumi hisab-kitab kore, tineka he tumike bhi hisab-kitab hobo.
Kintu kele tumi laga bhai laga suku te sukha pata chutu thaka to sai ase, hoilebi tumi nijor laga suku te dangor khuri thaka to nadikhe?
Nohoile kineka tumi laga bhai ke koi, ‘Amike tumi laga suku te sukha pata chutu thaka to sapha koribo dibi,’ jitia apuni nijor laga suku te ekta dangor khuri thaki kene?
Tumi kopoti khan! Poila nijor laga suku te dangor khuri thaka to sapha kori lobi, aru etu pichete tumikhan bhal pora dikhi kene bhai laga suku te sukha pata chutu thaka to sapha kori bole paribo.
Juntu pobitro ase eitu khan kutta khan ke nadibi, aru tumi laga heera moti loi kene jongol gahori khan ke nadibi. Kilekoile taikhan laga theng pora chipai dibo, aru ghurikena tumikhan laga gaw ke kamuri kene tukra kori dibo.
Mangi bhi, aru tumikhan ke dibo. Bisaribi, aru tumikhan pai jabo. Dorjate maribi, aru tumikhan nimite khuli dibo.
Kilekoile jun mange, taikhan pai; aru jun bisare, taikhan pai; aru jun dorjate mare, taikhan nimite khuli diye.
Nohoile bhi kunba manu ase naki tumikhan majote, jun laga bacha pora khabole roti mangile, tai laga baba pora pathor diye naki?
Nohoile bacha pora maas khabole mangile, tai laga baba pora saph dibo naki?
Etu nimite, tumikhan kiman biya hoilebi nijor bacha ke bhal saman khan diye, tinehoile tumi laga Baba kun sorgote ase, Tai aru bisi bhal saman tumikhan manga to nadibo naki?
Etu nimite, sob te, dusra manu khan pora tumi ki lage, thik eneka tumi bhi dusra khan ke koribi, kele koile etu to niyom pora aru bhabobadi khan pora koi diya ase.
Ekdom huru rasta pora ghusi bhi. Kelemane juntu dorja bisi dangor hoi, etu to khotom kori diya rasta te loijai, aru bisi manu etu rasta te jabole kore.
Kilekoile jibon laga rasta to bisi huru ase aru dorja ekdom chutu ase. Etu nimite khali kunba khan he etu rasta pai.
Misa bhabobadi khan pora hoshiar thakibi, jun khan mer nisena kapra pindhi kene dikhai, kintu bhitor te taikhan ekdom bhuk lagi thaka rong kutta janwar khan ase.
Taikhan laga kaam laga phol pora tumikhan jani jabo. Dusra manu kata ghas pora angur ke joma nakore, aru nohoile kata ghas pora dimoru khan ulai naki?
Etu nisena, sob bhal ghas khan bhal phol dhure, kintu biya ghas khan biya phol dhure.
Ekta bhal ghas pora biya phol dhoribo napare, nohoi lebi ekta biya ghas pora bhal phol dhoribo napare.
Juntu ghas bhal phol nadhure etu ghas ke katikena jui te phelai dibo lage.
Etu pichete, tumikhan tai laga phol pora jani jabo.
Sob manu jun Moike ‘Probhu, Probhu’ koi kene mate, taikhan sorgo desh te huma bole nohoi, kintu jun manu sorgote thaka Baba Isor laga itcha kore, taikhan he huma bole paribo.
Bisi manu khan utu dinte kobo, ‘Probhu, Probhu, amikhan Apuni laga naam te bhabobani kora nai naki, aru Apuni laga naam te biya atma khan ke khedai diya nai naki, aru Apuni laga naam te asurit kaam khan kora nai naki?
Titia Ami Khuli Kena taikhan ke koi dibo, ‘Moi tumikhan ke kitia bhi jana nai! Moi laga usor pora jai jabi, tumikhan biya laga niyom kora khan!’
Etu nimite, sob manu jun Ami laga kotha khan hune aru eitu khan sob mane, taikhan ekjon gyaani manu nisena ase jun pathor uporte ghor bonaise.
Bisi dangor hawa aru pani ahikena, aru purah pani pora bhorta kori loise, hoilebi etu ghor ke gira bole para nai, kele koile etu ghor to pathor uporte bonaise.
Kintu kun manu Ami laga kotha hune aru namane taikhan murkho manu ase jun balu laga uporte ghor bonai.
Dangor borkhon ahise, aru ban pani pora bhorta hoi jaise, aru hawa pora etu ghor ke hilai kene girai dise, aru pura ghor ke khotom kori diye.”
Etu pichete jitia Jisu etu kotha khan koi kene khotom korise, Tai pora sikhai diya kotha huni kene sob manu asurit hoi jaise.
Kilekoile Tai sikhai diya to niyom likha khan pora sikha nisena nohoi, kintu ekjon adhikar thaka manu nisena koi thakise.
Jitia Jisu pahar pora namikene ahise se, dangor manu laga bhir pora Tai laga piche korise.
Aru sabi, ekjon korhi bemar thaka manu Jisu laga usorte ahise aru Tai age te matha jhukikena eneka koise, “Probhu, Apuni itcha ase koile, Apuni moike sapha kori bole paribo.”
Jisu tai usorte jai kene taike chuikena koise, “Moi laga itcha ase. Sapha hobi.” Aru etu loge-loge tai laga bemar sapha hoi jaise.
Etu pichete Jisu taike koise, “Sabi, etu kunke bhi nakobi. Kintu jabi aru tumi laga purohit khan ke dikhai dibi aru Moses pora hukum diya kori lobi, titia etu dusra khan nimite tumi laga gawahi hobo.”
Jitia Jisu Capernaum jagate ahi loise, ekjon Rome laga henapoti Tai usorte ahise aru koise,
“Probhu, ami laga kaam kora nokor jothor bemar koi kene ghumai ase aru tai bisi dukh te ase.”
Jisu taike koise, “Moi ahibo aru taike bhal kori dibo.”
Kintu henapoti pora taike eneka jowab dise, “Probhu, Apnike ami laga ghor te mati bole sorom ase, kintu khali Apuni laga kotha koi dibi aru ami laga nokor to bhal hoi jabo.
Kilekoile ami bhi ekjon adhikari thaka manu ase, aru ami nichete sipahi khan ase. Ami taikhan ke eneka hukum diye, ‘Jabi’, aru tai jai, aru dusra ekjon ke, ‘Ahibi,’ aru tai ahe, aru nokor ke, ‘Eneka koribi,’ aru tai kore.”
Kintu jitia Jisu etu hunise, Tai asurit hoi jaise aru Tai laga piche aha manu khan ke koi, “Hosa pora Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, Moi kitia bhi etu nisena iman dangor biswas thaka manu purah Israel desh te dikha nai.
Kintu Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, purab aru paschim desh khan pora bisi manu ahibo, aru taikhan aram kori kene Abraham, Isaac, aru Jacob, usorte sorgo laga rajyote bohibo.
Kintu rajyo laga bacha khan ke andhera jagate phelai dibo, juntu jagate khali daat kamurikena kanda he thakibo.”
Titia Jisu etu henapoti ke koise,“Jabi! Jineka tumi biswas korise, etu nisena he hobo dibi.” Aru thik utu homoi te tai laga nokor bhal hoi jaise.
Jitia Jisu pora Peter laga ghor te ahise, Peter laga maiki laga ama bukhar pora bemar hoi kene ghumai thaka dikhise.
Jisu pora tai laga hath choise aru titia bemar taike chari kene jaise. Etu pichete tai uthikena Jisu ke kha luwa sewa kori bole shuru hoijai.
Jitia saam hoi thakise, manu khan Jisu usorte biya atma humai kene thaka manu khan ke loi kene anise. Tai laga kotha pora sob biya atma khan ke khedai dise aru sob bemar thaka manu khan ke changai kori dise.
Etu nisena juntu kotha khan bhabobadi Isaiah koi dise, eitu khan sob purah hoi jaise, “Tai nijor he amikhan laga sob bemar khan loi loise aru amikhan laga sob ghao khan nijor bukhi loise.”
Jitia Jisu pora Tai usorte dangor bhir joma hoi kene dikhise, Tai dusra khan ke Galilee laga Samundar laga dusra phale jai jabi koi kene hukum dise.
Etu pichete niyom likha manu Tai logote ahise aru koise, “Shika manu, Apuni kot jai ami bhi Apuni pichete jabo.”
Jisu taike koise, “Shial khan chenda bhitor te thake, chiriya khan pata pora bona ghor te thake, kintu Manu laga Putro nimite thaki bole jaga nai.”
Jisu laga ekjon chela pora taike koise, “Probhu, moike poila ekbar ghor te jai kene ami laga baba ke kobor dikena ahibole dibi.”
Kintu Jisu taike koise, “Moi laga piche koribi, aru mora manu khan ke taikhan nijorke kobor dibole dibi.”
Jitia Jisu naw bhitor te bohi loise, tai laga chela khan sob Tai piche korise.
Aru sabi, ekta dangor andhi nodi pora uthibole shuru hoise, aru purah naw to hawa aru pani pora hiliai thakise. Kintu Jisu to ghumai thakise.
Titia chela khan Tai usorte ahise aru eneka koi kene uthai dise, “Probhu, amikhan ke bacha bhi; amikhan mori bole ase!”
Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Tumikhan biswas komti thaka khan kele bhoi khai ase? Etu pichete Tai uthikena nodi aru hawa pani ke hukum dise. Titia sob chup-chap hoi jaise.
Kintu sob manu asurit koi kene koise, “Etu ki kisim laga manu ase, hawa aru pani tak Tai laga kotha mane?”
Jitia Jisu samundar paar kori kene Gadarene laga desh te punchise, duijon manu jun logote biya atma ghusikena thakise, Jisu ke lok korise. Taikhan koboristan pora ulaikena ahise aru bisi khechera huwa pora manu khan etu rasta pora nabira hoise.
Sabi, taikhan hala kori kene koise, “Amikhan Apuni ke ki kori dibo, Isor laga Putro? Apuni homoi napuncha age te aha laga motlob to amikhan ke bisi dukh dibole ase naki?”
Utu somoite dur nohoi kene kunba gahori dana khai thakisele.
Aru biya atma khan Jisu ke anurodh kori kene koise, “Apuni amikhan ke khedai dibole ase koile, amikhan ke gahori khan laga gaw te ghusi bo dibi.”
Titia Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Jabi!” Etu hukum diya pichete sob biya atma khan ulaise aru gahori laga gaw bhitor te ghusi jaise; aru sabi, etu sob gahori pahar upor pora polaikena nodi te girikena panite dubi mori jaise.
Kintu juntu gahori saithaka manu khan sheher te polaikena sob manu khan ke khobor dise.
Sabi, pura sheher laga manu khan Jisu ke lok kori bole ulai ahise. Jitia taikhan Jisu ke dikhise, taikhan Jisu ke anurodh korise aru etu jaga pora jai jabole koise.
Titia Jisu naw te uthi loise aru nodi paar korise, aru tai nijor laga town, Capernaum te ahi jaise.
Sabi, manu khan ekjon jothor bemar thaka manu ke chatai te ghumai thaka ke loi anise. Jitia Jisu taikhan laga biswas dikhise, tai jothor bemar manu ke koise, “Putro, mon dangor koribi. Tumi laga paap sob maph kori dise.”
Titia sabi, niyom likha manu khan taikhan majote koise, “Etu manu Isor laga biya kotha koi ase.”
Kintu Jisu taikhan laga bhabona janikena koise, “Tumikhan ki hisab te mon bhitor te biya kotha bhabona kori ase?
Kilekoile, kuntu he asan ase, ‘Tumikhan laga paapkhan sob maph kori dise,’ na, ‘Uthibi aru berabi’ etu thik ase?
Kintu tumikhan ke jonai dibole, Manu laga Putro ke etu prithibi te adhikar dikena ase manu laga paapkhan maph kori bole, ...” Etu pichete Tai etu manu ke koise, “Uthibi, tumi laga chatai lobi, aru nijor laga ghor te jabi.”
Titia etu manu uthise aru nijor ghor te jai jaise.
Jitia manu khan etu dikhise, taikhan asurit hoise aru Isor ke mohima dise, jun he manu khan ke eneka adhikar dise koi kene.
Jitia Jisu etu jaga paar hoi kene jai thakise, tai Matthew koi kene ekjon manu ke dikhise, jun poisa utha laga jagate kaam kori thakise. Tai pora taike koise, “Ami laga piche koribi.” Aru tai uthise aru Jisu laga piche korise.
Aru eneka hoise, jitia Jisu Matthew laga ghor te bohi kene bhat khabole hoise, sabi, bisi poisa utha manu khan aru dusra paapi manu khan bhi ahise aru Jisu aru tai laga chela khan sob eke logote khaise.
Jitia kunba Pharisee khan etu dikhise, taikhan Jisu laga chela khan ke hudise, “Kile apnikhan laga malik to poisa utha aru dusra paapi manu khan logote milikena khai ase?”
Jitia Jisu etu hunise, Tai koise, “Jun laga gaw sob thik ase, taike bemar bhal kora manu nalage, khali jun khan bemar ase taikhan ke lage.
Kintu tumikhan jabi aru sikhibi Isor laga kotha te etu laga motlob ki ase: ‘Ami to tumikhan boli diya to nalage, hoilebi daya kora to Moi laga itcha ase.’ Kilekoile Ami dhormik khan ke mati bole aha nohoi, kintu paapi manu khan karone ahise.’”
Aru ek din, John laga chela khan Tai logote ahikena koise, “Kile Pharisee aru amikhan upwas kore, kintu Apuni laga chela khan to nakore?”
Jisu taikhan ke jawan dise, “Shadi te aha khan mon dukh hoi kene shadi kora jon logote thake naki? Kintu utu din ahibo jitia shadi kora jonke taikhan pora loijabo, aru etu pichete taikhan upwas lobo.
Kun manu bhi ekta notun kapra ke purana kapra logote silai kene nalagai, kele koile etu kapra laga silakhan sob ulai jabo, aru bisi biya pora phati jabo.
Nohoi lebi manu khan purana angur ros ke notun chamra laga jola te nadhale. Nohoile, chamra jola to phati jabo, aru angur ros to pura giri jabo aru chamra jola pura biya hoi jabo. Hoilebi, taikhan notun chamra jola te notun angur ros hale, eneka hoile duita bhi bhal thakibo.”
Jitia Tai eitu khan taikhan ke koi thakise, sabi, ekjon sahab ahise aru Jisu age te matha jhukise. Tai koise, “Moi laga chukri etiya mori jaise, kintu Apuni ahibi aru tai uporte Apuni laga hath lagai dibi, aru tai jinda hoi jabo.”
Etu pichete Jisu uthise aru tai logote jaise, aru Tai laga chela khan bhi piche ahise.
Sabi, ekjon mahila jun baroh saal pora khun jai thaka bemar pora dukh pai thakise, tai Jisu laga piche ahikena Tai laga kapra kinar te chuise.
Kilekoile etu mahila pora tai nijorke koise, “Khali Tai laga kapra chuile, ami bhal hoi jabo.”
Kintu Jisu piche ghurise aru taike saikene koise, “Chukri, mon dangor kori lobi; apuni laga biswas pora bhal hoise.” Aru utu homoi te etu mahila ke changai paise.
Titia Jisu utu daruga laga ghor te punchise, aru Tai pora basuri baja manu khan aru dangor bhir joma hoi kene hala kori thaka dikhise.
Tai koise, “Jai jabi, kele koile etu chukri mora nai, kintu tai ghumai ase.” Kintu etu manu khan Jisu ke hasi di thakise.
Jitia joma koi kene thaka manu khan sobke bahar te pathai dise, Tai ghor bhitor te ghusi se aru etu chukri ke hath pora dhurise, aru etu chukri uthijaise.
Aru etu laga khobor utu desh sob te punchi jaise.
Jisu jitia berai jai thakise, duijon andha manu tai piche korise. Taikhan hala kori kene koise, “Amikhan ke daya koribi, David laga Putro!”
Jitia Jisu ghor te punchise, andha khan tai usorte ahise. Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Tumikhan biswas kore na nai ami etu koribo pare koi kene?” Taikhan koise, “Hoi, Probhu.”
Aru Jisu taikhan laga suku chuise, aru koise, “Tumikhan laga biswas hisab te hoi jabi,”
aru taikhan laga suku khuli jaise. Jisu pora taikhan ke kara pora hukum dikene eneka koise, “Sabi etu kotha khan kunke bhi janibo nadibi.”
Kintu etu duijon manu bahar te ulai jaise aru sob desh te etu laga khobor koi dise.
Tai duijon jai thaka somoite, sabi, ekjon bhoot atma ghumai kene ghunga thaka manu ke Jisu usorte anise.
Jitia bhoot atma ke khedai dise, tai kotha kori bole parise. Sob manu dikhi kene asurit hoise, aru koise, “Eneka asurit kaam to kitia bhi Israel desh te dikha nai!”
Kintu Pharisee khan eneka koise, “Bhoot atma laga cholawta huwa nimite, tai bhoot atma ke kheda bole pari ase.”
Jisu sob sheher khan aru bosti khan te berai kene jaise. Tai mondoli khan te jai kene rajyo laga susamachar khan sikhai thakise aru sob biya bemar khan ke bhal korise.
Jitia Tai manu joma koi kene thaka dikhise, Tai bisi morom lagise, kele koile taikhan bisi dukh aru chinta hoi kene thakise, jineka mer khan laga ekjon rokhiya nathaka nisena.
Etu pichete Jisu taikhan laga chela khan ke koise, “Dhan bisi pakki kene ase, kintu kati bole manu komti ase.
Etu nimite, joldi Probhu ke prathana kori bhi, titia Tai kaam kori bole manu khan ke pathai dibo.”
Jisu tai laga baroh ta chela khan sobke matise aru taikhan ke atma khan kheda bole aru sob bemar khan bhal kori bole adhikar dise.
Etiya etu baroh ta chela khan laga naam khan eneka thakise. Poila, Simon -junke Peter koi kene mate-, aru tai laga bhai Andrew; James, Zebedee laga chokra, aru tai laga bhai John;
Philip, aru Bartholomew; Thomas, aru Matthew ekjon poisa utha manu; James, Alphaeus laga chokra, aru Thaddaeus;
Simon ekjon Zealot, aru Judas Iscariot, jun Jisu ke thogabo.
Aru baroh ta jon chela khan ke Jisu pora pathai dise. Tai bujhai kene koise, “Porjati manu khan laga rasta te najabi, aru Samaria nogor bhitor te naghusi bhi.
Kintu harai ja-a mer khan jun ase Israel laga ghor, taikhan logot jabi;
aru jitia tumikhan jai, prochar kori kene kobi, ‘Sorgo laga rajyo usor ahi ase.’
Bemar khan ke bhal koribi, mora khan ke uthai dibi, kusto bemar thaka khan ke sapha kori dibi, aru biya atma khan ke khedai dibi. Eku daam naterai kene paise, eku daam noloikena dibi.
Suna, chandi, nohoile pitol khan eku nabukhibi.
Eku jola nadhuribi jai thaka somoite, nohoile duita kapra, nohoile chapal, nohoile lathi nadhuribi, kele koile kaam kora khan ke hajira pabo lage.
Kuntu sheher nohoile bhi bosti te tumikhan jai, utu jagate ekjon bhal manu ke bisaribi, aru jitia tak tumi chari kene najai, tai laga ghor te he thakibi.
Jitia tumi tai laga ghor te ghuse, taike salam koribi.
Aru etu ghor to thik hoile, tumikhan laga shanti ta te thakibo dibi. Kintu jodi ghor to thik nohoi, tinehoile shanti to wapas tumikhan laga hobo.
Judi utu ghor te tumikhan ke ghusibole nadiye, aru utu sheher manu khan pora tumikhan laga kotha nahune, tinehoile etu jaga chari bhi aru tumi laga theng te dhula khan jharikena jai jabi.
Hosa pora Moi koi ase, jitia Isor laga bisar kora din ahibo, etu dinte etu sheher to Sodom aru Gomorrah town khan pora bhi bisi lobole napara laga saja pabo.
Sabi, Ami tumikhan ke ekta mer nisena rong kutta janwar khan majote pathai ase, etu nimite saph nisena gyaani thakibi aru kabotar nisena norom thakibi.
Eneka manu khan pora hoshiar koi kene thakibi! Kilekoile taikhan tumikhan ke sabhakhan te loijabo, aru taikhan laga mondoli bhitor te tumikhan ke marikena sajai dibo.
Etu pichete Ami nimite tumikhan ke Governor aru raja khan laga age te anibo, dusra khan aru Porjati khan ke ekta gawahi nisena dikhai dibole.
Jitia taikhan tumikhan ke taikhan hathte di dibo, titia tumikhan ki kobo lage etu karone chinta na koribi, kele koile thik somoite ji kobo lage etu sob tumikhan ke koi dibo.
Kilekoile tumikhan pora nakobo, kintu Baba laga Atma pora he tumikhan nimite koi dibo.
Bhai pora he kokai ke phasai dibo, aru baba pora nijor bacha ke. Bacha khan ama baba khan logote jhagara koribo aru taikhan ke morai dibole koribo.
Moi laga naam nimite tumikhan ke sob pora ghin koribo. Kintu jun khan dukh digdar puwa homoi sob khotom nohua tak dhorjo kori kene thakibo pare, taikhan he bachibo.
Jitia taikhan pora etu sheher te tumikhan ke biya pora digdar dibo, dusra jagate polai jabi, kele koile Ami hosa pora tumikhan ke koi ase, Manu laga Putro naha age te tumikhan Israel laga sob sheher khan te jai kene khotom kori bole na paribo.
Ekjon chela tai laga guru pora dangor nohoi, nohoi lebi ekjon nokor malik pora dangor nohoi.
Ekjon chela tai laga guru nisena hoile etu he thik ase, aru ekjon nokor tai laga malik nisena hoile he thik ase. Judi taikhan etu ghor malik ke Beelzebul koi kene mate koile, kiman bhi biya pora tai laga ghor manu khan ke matibo!
Etu karone taikhan ke bhoi nakhabi, kele koile lukaikene thaka eku nai juntu ke janai nadibo, aru juntu janai dibole pare, etu ke lukai kene rakhibo na paribo.
Ji kotha Ami pora tumikhan ke andhera te koi ase, tumikhan pora dinte koi dibi, aru ji kotha tumikhan norom pora kan te huni pai ase, ghor laga sobse untcha jagate uthikena jor pora sobke hunai dibi.
Jun khan manu ke morai diye eitu khan ke bhoi na koribi kele koile taikhan tumikhan laga jibon ke morai dibole napare. Hoilebi, Isor ke bhoi koribi Jun he tumikhan laga gaw aru jibon ke bhi khotom kori dibole pare.
Ekta chutu chandi pora duita ghor chiriya ke kini bole napare naki? Titia bhi tumikhan laga Baba pora najanikena ekta chiriya bhi matite giribole nadiye.
Kintu tumikhan laga matha te chuli thaka khan sob ginti kori kene ase.
Etu karone bhoi na koribi. Tumikhan ke ghor laga chiriya pora bhi bisi morom kore.
Etu karone jun manu sob manu khan laga age te Moi laga naam shikar koribo, Ami bhi tai laga naam sorgote thaka Ami laga Baba age te shikar dibo.
Kintu jun manu pora sob manu laga age te Ami laga naam noloi, Ami bhi tai laga naam sorgote thaka Ami laga Baba age te nolobo.
Ami etu prithibi te shanti dibole aha nohoi. Ami shanti loi kene aha nai, kintu talwar loi kene ahise.
Kilekoile Ami aha to chokra ke tai laga baba pora alag kori dibole, aru ekjon chukri ke tai laga ama pora alag kori dibole, aru ekjon buari ke tai laga sasuma pora alag kori dibole ahise.
Ekjon mota laga dushman khan nijor ghor manu khan he hobo.
Jun manu tai nijor baba aru ama ke Ami pora bisi morom kore tai Ami laga chela hobo na paribo; aru jun tai njior chokra nohoi lebi chukri ke Ami pora bhi bisi morom kore, tai Ami laga chela hobo na paribo.
Jun manu tai laga nijor Cross to uthaikene moi laga piche nahe, tai Ami laga chela hobo na paribo.
Jun manu tai nijor jibon to bacha bole itcha kore tai harai jabo. Kintu jun manu Moi nimite tai laga jibon diye, tai to aru wapas pabo.
Jun manu tumike grohon kore, tai Moike bhi grohon kore, aru jun tumike grohon kore, Isor, jun pora Amike pathaise, Taike bhi grohon kore.
Jun manu ekjon bhabobadi khan ke grohon kore, tai bhabobadi laga inam pabo, aru jun manu dhormik manu ke grohon kore, tai dhormik manu laga inam pabo.
Jun khan etu chutu dukhiya ekjon ke Ami laga chela ase koi kene ek kup thanda pani khilai dibo, hosa pora Ami koi ase, tai to hosa pora bhi tai laga inam to naharabo.”
Eneka hoise jitia Jisu tai laga baroh jon chela khan ke niyom khan bujhai diya pichete, tai ta te pora ulaikena taikhan laga sheher te jai kene prochar kori bole aru sikhai dibole jai jaise.
Etu homoi te John bondhi ghor te thakise, tai Khrista laga kotha huni paise, aru tai tai laga chela khan ke ekta jankari dibole pathaise
aru Taike hudise, “Apuni ahibole thaka Jon ase naki, na amikhan dusra ke bisaribo?”
Jisu pora jowab dikene koise, “Jabi aru John ke koi dibi tumikhan ki hunise aru dikhise.
Andha manu khan dikhibole paise, lengera khan bera bole parise, kusto bemar thaka khan sapha hoi jaise, behera khan huni bole paise, morija khan jinda hoise, aru gorib manu khan susamachar huni loise.
Jun manu Amike dikhikena biya panai tai to asis paise.”
Jitia taikhan jaise, Jisu pora bhir ke John laga kotha kori bole shuru hoise, “Tumikhan balu laga jagate ki sabole jaise- panite ulai thaka ghas ke hawa pora hilai diya to?
Aru tumikhan ta te ki sabole jaise- ekjon manu norom kapra lagai kene thaka ke? Hosa bhi, jun khan norom kapra lagai, taikhan to raja khan laga ghor te he thake.
Aru tumikhan ki sabole ta te jaise- ekjon bhabobadi? Hoi, Ami tumikhan ke koi ase, tai ekjon bhabobadi pora bhi bisi ase.
Etu tai ase, jun karone eneka Isor kotha te likhi kene ase, ‘Sabi, Ami pora tumikhan laga chehera age te Ami laga khobor diya manu pathai ase, jun pora tumikhan nimite rasta taiyar koribo.’
Ami hosa pora tumikhan ke koi ase, tumikhan majote Baptizma diya John nisena kun ama pora bhi jonom diya nai. Hoilebi sorgo laga rajyote thaka sob pora kaam nathaka manu bhi tai pora bisi dangor ase.
Baptizma diya John laga din pora loi kene etiya tak, sorgo laga rajyo to mara-mari khan pora dukh paise, aru jhagara pora joborjosti kori kene chingi loise.
Kilekoile John naha age te sob bhabobadi khan aru niyom khan laga bhabobani hoi thakise;
aru jodi tumikhan lobole itcha ase koile, tai to Elijah ase jun ahibole thakise.
Jun laga kan khan ase, taikhan ke huni bole dibi.
Ki logote etu yug laga manu khan ke tulona koribo? Bacha khan bajar te bohi kene thaka nisena, jun ekjon pora ekjon ke mati thake
aru koi, ‘Amikhan pora apnikhan karone shadi laga basuri bajaise, aru apnikhan nacha nai. Amikhan mon dukh hoise aru apnikhan mon dukh laga suku pani bhi ula nai.’
Kilekoile John to pani aru kha luwa khaikena aha nohoi, aru taikhan koise, ‘Tai logot te bhoot ase.’
Manu laga Putro to pani aru kha luwa kori kene ahise aru taikhan koise, ‘Sabi, tai to bisi khai aru ekjon sharabi ase, poisa utha aru paapi manu khan laga sathi ase!’ Kintu gyaan to tai laga bacha pora he dikhai dibo.”
Pichete Jisu jun to jagate tai laga asurit kaam khan dikhai dise, etu sheher khan laga manu khan ke gali dibole shuru korise, kele koile taikhan mon ghuraikena thaka nai.
“Chorazin, tumike hai ase! Bethsaida, tumike hai ase! Juntu kaam tumikhan nimite korise, eneka kaam Tyre aru Sidon nimite korise koile, taikhan poila pora bosta laga kapra aru jui laga koila lagai kene mon ghuri lobole thakise.
Kintu Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, Isor pora bisar kora dinte tumikhan pora bhi Tyre aru Sidon nimite he bisi aram hobo.
Tumi, Capernaum, tumikhan ke sorgo uporte uthibole nadibo, na uthibo dibo? Tumikhan ke Hades te namai dibo. Kilekoile tumikhan ke koi diya nisena jodi Sodom te bhi asurit aru dangor kaam korise koile, taikhan aji bachikena thakibo thakise.
Kintu Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, bisar laga dinte tumikhan pora bhi Sodom nimite he aram hobo.”
Etu somoite Jisu pora jowab dise aru koise, “Ami Apuni ke mohima di ase, Baba, Sorgo aru prithibi laga Probhu, kele koile Apuni eitu khan gyaani aru buja manu khan pora lukaikene rakhise, aru chutu bacha khan ke dikhai dise.
Hoi, Baba, kele koile etu to Apuni laga suku age te thik ase.
Sob kaam khan moi laga bharosa te Baba pora rakhidise; aru kun bhi Putro ke najane khali Baba he nohoile, aru kun bhi Baba ke najane khali Putro he nohoile, aru utu manu junke Putro pora basikena dikhai dibo.
Ami usorte ahibi, jun manu etu prithibi laga dukh chinta bukhi bo napari kene dabi kene ase, aru Moi tumikhan ke aram dibo.
Ami laga kotha khan lobi aru Ami pora sikhibi, kele koile Ami laga mon to nomro aru shanti ase, aru tumi laga jibon nimite aram pabo.
Kilekoile Ami laga kotha khan aram ase aru ami laga boja bisi halka ase.”
Utu somoite, ek Bisram dinte, Jisu dhaan kheti paar hoi kene jai thakise. Tai laga chela khan bhuk lagi thaka pora dhaan laga guti ulaikena khabole shuru korise.
Jitia Pharisee khan etu dikhise, taikhan Jisu ke koise, “Sabi, Apuni laga chela khan Bisram nimite niyom te nathaka kaam kori ase.”
Kintu Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Tumikhan kitia bhi Isor kotha te purah nai David pora ki korise, jitia tai aru tai logot thaka manu khan bhuk lagise?
Tai Isor laga ghor te jaise aru Isor nimite rakhikena thaka roti khaise, juntu tai nimite nohoile tai logote thaka manu khan nimite khabole niyom te nai, kele koile khali purohit khan he ta te pora khabo pare.
Nohoile tumikhan Moses laga niyom te purah nai naki Bisram laga dinte mondoli te thaka purohit khan Bisram din laga niyom bhangai kintu taikhan ke etu golti ase koi kene nadhure?
Kintu Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, mondoli pora bhi dangor jon to yate ase.
Jodi tumikhan etu laga motlob janikena thaki ase, ‘Moi daya kora he itcha ase aru bolidan diya nohoi,’ koile tumikhan golti nathaka khan ke golti ase koi kene namatibo.
Kilekoile Manu laga Putro he Bisram Din laga Probhu ase.”
Etu pichete Jisu ta te pora ulaise aru taikhan laga mondoli te ghusi se.
Sabi, ta te ekjon manu thakise jun laga hath sukhikena thakise. Pharisee khan pora Jisu ke eneka koi kene hudise, “Bisram dinte bemar bhal kori diya to niyom ase naki?” Taikhan Jisu ke golti dibole nimite hudise.
Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Kun manu tumikhan majote ase, jun logote khali ekta mer he ase, aru jitia utu mer to Bisram dinte ekdom niche chenda te giri jai koile, tai utu mer ke nauthabo naki?
Tinehoile mer pora bhi manu khan kiman bhi kimti ase! Etu nimite Bisram dinte bhal kaam kora thik niyom ase.”
Etu pichete Jisu utu manu ke koise, “Tumi laga hath ke sida koribi.” Jitia tai hath sida korise, aru jineka dusra hath nisena, etu hath bhi bhal hoi jaise.
Kintu Pharisee khan ta te pora ulai jaise aru jai kene taikhan kineka kori kene Jisu ke morai dibo etu kotha khan kori thakise.
Jitia Jisu eitu khan janibole paise, Tai ta te pora ulai jaise. Bisi manu Tai piche korise, aru Tai sobke bhal kori dise.
Aru manu khan ke Tai janai dibole hoshiar kori dise,
titia Isor pora bhabobadi Isaiah dwara kowa kotha khan pura hobole karone eitu khan sob tineka he hoi jaise,
“Sabi, etu Ami laga noukar ase junke Ami basi loise; Ami laga morom thaka ekjon, junke Moi laga jibon pora khushi ase. Moi Tai uporte Moi laga Atma rakhidibo, Aru Tai pora Porjati khan ke ajad kori dibo.
Tai biya napabo nohoile bhi jor pora nakandibo; Nohoile bhi kun bhi rasta khan te Tai laga awaj nahunibo.
Tai ekta tera koi kene thaka pani-ghas bhi bhangai nadibo; Tai khotom hobole thaka jui ke bhi bhutibole nadibo, Jitia tak Tai bisar ke age loi kene jiti noloi,
aru Tai laga naam uporte he Porjati khan asha thakibo.”
Etu pichete kunba ekjon andha aru gunga, bhoot pora bandi kene thaka, Jisu usorte loi anise. Jisu pora taike changai kori dise, aru tai kotha kori bole aru sabole pari jaise.
Sob manu khan dikhikena asurit hoise aru koise, “Etu manu to David laga Putro ase nohoi?”
Kintu jitia Pharisee khan asurit kaam to huni bole paise, taikhan koise, “Etu manu to Saitan laga raja, Beelzebul laga takot pora kaam kori ase, nohoile bhoot khan khedai dibo na paribo.”
Kintu Jisu taikhan laga bhabona jani thakise aru taikhan ke koise, “Juntu rajyo taikhan nijor majote apatti thake, etu rajyo to bhangi jai, aru juntu sheher nohoile bhi ghor to nijor majote apatti thake, etu bhangi jai.
Etu nimite jodi Saitan pora Saitan ke khedai dile, tai nijor bhirodh te bhag koi kene ase. Kineka kori kene tai laga rajyo to khara koribo?
Aru jodi Moi Beelzebul laga hokti loi kene bhoot khan ke khedai, tinehoile ki hokti pora tumikhan laga bacha khan bhoot khan ke khedai? Etu karone, taikhan pora tumikhan ke bisar koribo.
Kintu jodi Ami Isor laga Atma pora bhoot khan ke khedai diye, tinehoile Isor laga rajyo tumikhan uporte ahikena ase.
Nohoile kineka ekta takot thaka manu ke age nabandi kene utu ghor te ghusi kene saman khan chor koribo paribo? Poila takot manu ke bandibo lagibo etu pichete he tai laga saman khan chor koribo paribo.
Jun Ami logote nohoi tai Amike apatti kore, aru jun Ami logote joma nakore taikhan sob ephale-uphale hoi jabo.
Etu karone Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, sob paap aru hinsa kotha kora khan maph kori dibo, kintu jun manu Atma ke hinsa kore taike maph nadibo.
Jun manu pora Manu laga Putro ke apatti koribo tai maph pabo. Kintu jun manu Pobitro Atma ke apatti koribo, tai kitia bhi maph napabo, etu yug te bhi, aru ahibole thaka yug te bhi.
Ekta bhal ghas to bhal phol dhuri bo, nohoile biya ghas pora to biya phol he dhuri bo, kele koile phol pora he ghas ke janibole pare.
Saph laga bacha khan, tumikhan biya hoi kene, kineka bhal kotha koi? Kilekoile mon bhitor te ki ase, mukh pora etu he koi.
Bhal manu laga monte bhal saman khan joma kora nimite bhal khan he ulai, aru biya manu laga monte biya saman khan joma kora nimite biya khan he ulai.
Moi apnikhan ke koi ase jun manu misa-misi kotha kobo, taikhan bisar dinte etu laga hisab-kitab dibo lagibo.
Tumikhan laga kotha para he tumi laga bisar hobo, aru tumi laga kotha pora he tumi bodnam hobo.”
Etu pichete kunba Pharisee aru niyom likha khan Jisu ke eneka koise, “Shika manu, Apuni pora ekta chihna amikhan sabole itcha ase.”
Kintu Jisu taikhan ke jowab dise aru koise, “Ekta biya aru biswas nathaka jamana laga manu khan he chihna sabole bisare. Kintu eku bhi chihna dikhai nadibo khali bhabobadi Jonah laga chihna he sabo dibo.”
Kilekoile Jonah to tin din aru tin rati ekta dangor maas laga pet bhitor te thakise, etu nisena Manu laga Putro bhi tin din aru tin rati prithibi laga bhitor te thakibo.
Nineveh sheher te thaka manu khan bisar dinte etu jamana laga manu khan logote khara koribo aru bodnam dibo. Kilekoile taikhan to Jonah laga kotha huni kene mon ghuraise, aru sabi, ekjon Jonah pora bhi bisi dangor yate khara ase.
Sheba laga Rani bisar dinte etu jamana laga manu khan logote uthi kene bodnam dibo. Tai prithibi laga sob pora dur jaga pora ahikena Solomon laga gyaani kotha huni bole ahise, aru sabi, ekjon Solomon pora bhi dangor yate khara ase.
Jitia ekta letera atma manu laga gaw pora bahar ulai jai, tai pani nathaka jaga pora paar kore aru aram kori bole bisare, kintu jaga napai.
Etu pichete tai koi, ‘Juntu jaga pora moi ulaikene ahise etu ghor te wapas jabo.’ Jitia tai ghuri ahe, tai ghor to khali aru sob sapha paise aru ghor te sob thik tak rakhi kene thaka dikhise.
Titia tai ta te pora ulaikene tai pora bhi bisi biya sat-ta atma khan ke loi kene ahise aru eke logote thaki jaise. Titia etu manu laga halat to poila pora bhi aru bisi biya hoijai. Thik etu nisena etu jamana laga manu khan ke bhi eneka hobo.
Jitia Jisu bhir khan ke kotha koi thakise, sabi, Tai laga ama aru bhai khan bahar te khara kori Jisu ke lok kori bole bisari thakise.
Ekjon Taike koise, “Sabi, Apuni laga ama aru bhai khan bahar te khara ase, Apuni ke kotha kori bole bisari ase.”
Kintu jun manu taike khobor disele Jisu taike koise, “Kun Moi laga ama ase aru kun Moi laga bhai khan ase?”
Titia chela khan phale Tai laga anguli ishara kori kene Jisu koise, “Sabi, eitu khan Ami laga ama aru bhai khan ase!
Kilekoile jun manu Moi laga sorgote thaka Baba laga itcha kore, etu he Moi laga bhai, aru Moi laga bhoini, aru Moi laga ama ase.”
Utu dinte Jisu ghor pora ulaikena nodi kinar te bohi thakise.
Dangor bhir joma hoi kene Tai usorte bohi jaise, etu nimite Tai naw uporte uthise, aru sob manu nodi kinar te khara korise.
Etu pichete Jisu taikhan ke dristanto khan bisi koise. Tai koise, “Sabi, ekjon kheti kora manu dhaan bijon hali bole jaise.
Jitia tai kheti te bijon phelai thakise, kunba bijon rasta kinar te girise, aru chiriya khan ahikena sob khai dise.
Kunba bijon to bisi pathor thaka jagate girise, aru joldi uthijaise, kele koile mati olop thakise.
Kintu jitia gham ulaise, etu ulai thaka ghas ke julai dise, kele koile etu ghas laga shikor thaka nai, etu karone sob sukhi jaise.
Kunba bijon khan kata ghas majot te girise. Aru etu ghas to olop dangor hoise, hoilebi kata ghas pora morai dise.
Kunba bijon khan bhal matite girise aru bhal ghas hoi kene bhal guti dhurise, kunba eksoh guti, kunba te saathi guti aru kunba te trista guti dhurise.
Jun manu laga kaan ase, taikhan ke huni bole dibi.”
Titia Jisu laga chela khan Tai usorte ahise aru hudise, “Apuni kele bhir khan ke dristanto pora kotha koi ase?”
Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Tumikhan ke sorgo rajyo laga bujhi bo napara kotha khan bujhi bole gyaan dikena ase, kintu taikhan ke diya nai.
Kilekoile jun manu logot olop ase, taike aru bhi dibo, aru tai logote bhorta thakibo. Kintu jun manu logote nai, tai logote ki ase etu bhi loi lobo.
Etu karone Moi taikhan ke dristanto pora kotha kore: Taikhan dikhi ase, kintu taikhan sabole napare; aru taikhan huni ase, kintu taikhan huni kene bhi bujhi bo napare.
Taikhan nimite to Isaiah laga bhabobani to purah hoise, juntu eneka koi ase, ‘Tumikhan hosa pora bhi hunibo, kintu janibole na paribo; Tumikhan hosa pora bhi dikhibo, kintu bujhi bole na paribo.
Kilekoile etu manu khan laga mon to khali hoise, Aru taikhan huni bole tan kori loise, Aru taikhan laga suku bondh kori loise, Eneka korile taikhan suku pora nasabo nimite, Nohoile taikhan kaan pora nahunibo nimite, Nohoile taikhan laga mon pora nabujibo nimite, Kilekoile eneka kori kene taikhan aru bhi mon naghurabo nimite, Aru Moi taikhan ke bhal kori nadibo nimite.’
Kintu asis te ase tumikhan laga suku, kele koile taikhan dikhi ase; aru tumikhan laga kaan, kele koile taikhan huni ase.
Moi hosa pora koi ase tumikhan ke bisi bhabobadi aru pobitro manu khan to tumikhan ki dikhi ase, eitu khan sabole mon thakise, hoilebi taikhan dikhibole panai. Tumikhan ki kotha huni ase, taikhan bhi huni bole mon thakise, kintu taikhan huni bole panai.
Etu nimite kheti kora manu bijon phela laga dristanto etu laga ki motlob ase huni bhi aru bujhibi.
Jitia kunba manu rajyo laga kotha hune kintu bujhi bole napare, tinehoile biya Jon ahe aru ki tai laga monte bijon hali kene ase etu chingi kene loijai. Etu bijon to rasta kinar te phelai diya bijon ase.
Juntu bijon pathor uporte phelaise, etu to eneka manu ase jun kotha huni loi aru loge-loge khushi pora grohon kore,
kintu kotha khan tai laga mon bhitor te najai, etu nimite khali olop somoi nimite he rakhe. Jitia etu kotha nimite biya aru dukh-digdar pa-a somoi ahe, tai ekbar te he giri jai.
Juntu bijon kata ghas khan majote phelaise, etu to eneka manu ase jun kotha to hune, hoilebi etu jamana laga kaam aru dhun sompoti ke mon diya nimite kotha ke dabai kene rakhe, aru etu kotha pora bhal guti nadhure.
Juntu bijon bhal matite phelaise, etu to eneka manu ase jun kotha to hune aru bujhi loi. Tai dangor koi kene bhal guti dhure, kunba te eksoh guti dhore, kunba te sathi aru kunba te trista.”
Jisu taikhan ke dusra dristanto koise. Tai koise, “Sorgo laga rajyo to ekjon manu nisena ase jun tai laga kheti te bhal bijon phelai.
Kintu jitia manu khan ghumai jai, tai laga dushman khan ahikena gehu laga kheti te biya ghas laga bijon khan phelai aru jai-jai.
Jitia kheti te gehu khan dangor koi kene guti ulabole shuru hoise, titia biya ghas khan bhi dangor hoijai.
Etu mati malik laga nokorkhan ahi kene taike koi, ‘Sahab, apuni to bhal bijon kheti te lagase nohoi? Nohoile kineka kori kene etu biya ghas khan ulaise?’
Etu pichete tai pora taikhan ke koise, ‘Dushman pora eneka kore.’ Nokorkhan taike koise, ‘To apuni itcha ase koile amikhan jai kene jongol khan sapha kori dibo?’
Mati malik pora taikhan ke koi, ‘Nai. Kilekoile jitia tumikhan biya ghas khan tanibo, tai logote gehu laga ghas bhi tani kene ulai dibo pare.
Etu nimite duijon ke bhi eke logote dangor koribo dibi, kheti kata somoi naha tak. Jitia kheti kata somoi hobo titia moi kata manu khan ke kobo, “Poila biya ghas khan tani kene ulai lobi aru eke logote bandhi kene rakhibi julai dibo nimite, kintu gehu khan ke dhaan ghor te joma kori rakhibi.’”
Etu pichete Jisu aru ekta dristanto taikhan ke koise. Tai koise, “Sorgo laga rajyo to ekta sorso laga bijon nisena ase jineka ekta manu pora loi kene kheti te phelai de.
Etu bijon to hosa pora bhi sobse huru ase sob bijon majote. Kintu jitia tai dangor hoi, bagan laga ghas khan pora bhi tai he dangor hoijai. Tai ekta dangor ghas hoijai, aru akas laga chiriya khan ahe aru etu ghas laga daal khan te ghor bonaikena thake.”
Jisu taikhan ke aru alag dristanto koise. “Sorgo laga rajyo to khomir nisena ase, jineka ekta maiki pora etu khomir ke loi kene tin bhag atta te milai diye jitia tak etu atta to phuli najai.”
Eitu khan sob kotha Jisu pora manu khan ke dristanto pora he koi dise; aru Tai ekta kotha bhi dristanto nacholai kene kowa nai.
Eitu khan sob age te bhabobadi pora koi diya kotha khan sob purah hobole nimite, Tai koi dise, “Dristanto khan pora he Moi mukh khuli bo. Ki kotha etu prithibi laga bhetimul te lukaikene ase eitu khan sob Moi koi dibo.”
Etu pichete Jisu manu khan ke chari kene ghor te jaise. Tai laga chela khan Tai logote ahikena, eneka koise, “Amikhan ke kheti te biya ghas laga dristanto to bujhai dibi.”
Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Jun bhal bijon to phelai, tai to Manu laga Putro ase.
Prithibi to kheti ase; aru bhal bijon khan to rajyo lage bacha khan ase. Biya ghas to biya jon laga bacha khan ase,
aru jun dushman pora biya hissi se eitu khan saitan ase. Kheti kata somoi to yug khotom huwa somoi ase, aru kheti kata manu khan to sorgodoth khan ase.
Etu karone, jineka biya ghas khan ke joma kori kene jui te julai dise, yug ses huwa dinte bhi eneka hobo.
