Titia olop dur jai kene, Jisu niche giri prathana korise, jodi parile etu somoi ke Tai pora dur kori dibole.
Aru Tai koise, “Abba, Baba Apuni to sob koribo pare. Moi pora etu kup hatai dibi. Hoile bhi Ami laga itcha nohoi kintu jineka Apuni laga itcha ase, eneka koribi.”
Titia Tai ahikena tinjon to ghumai thaka paise aru Peter ke koise, “Hey Peter, tumi ghumai jaise? Tumi ek-ghanta bhi rukhibo napare?
Tumikhan porikha te nagiribo karone na ghumai kene prathana kori thakibi, Atma to taiyar ase kintu gaw to komjur ase.”
Aru Tai jai kene age te kowa nisena koi kene prathana korise.
Aru jitia Tai wapas ahise, arubi tinjon ke ghumai thaka paise kelemane taikhan laga suku nindh pora bhorta asele. Aru Taike ki jowab dibo najana hoi thakise.
Titia tin-bar ahi kene taikhan ke koise, “Tumikhan etiya bhi aram pora ghumai ase? Hoise! Somoi ponchise. Sabi! Manu laga Putro ke dhori kene paapi khan laga hathte di dibole hoise.
Uthibi, amikhan jai jabo, sabi, Moike thoga manu usor ase.”
Aru tai etu kotha koi thaka somoite, Judas baroh jon te ekjon to, prodhan purohit, likha manu aru bura khan pora pathai diya talwar, lathi aru bisi manu loi ahise.
Taike thogai diya manu taikhan ke ekta chihna disele, “Junke moi chuma dibo, etu ase, Taike dhori lobi, aru dhuri kene loijabi.”
Aru jitia Judas ahise, tai joldi ahi kene Jisu ke koise, “Rabbi,” aru Taike chuma dise.
Titia taikhan ahi kene hath pora Taike dhori loise.
Aru ta te usorte khara thaka ekjon talwar ulaikene moha purohit laga nokor uporte cholai dise, aru tai laga kan kati dise.
Titia Jisu taikhan ke jowab dise, “Tumikhan Moike daku bhabi kene Moike dhori bole talwar aru lathi loi ahise?
Moi hodai din mondoli te tumikhan logote bohi prochar kori thakise, aru tumikhan Moike dhora nai, kintu Shastro te likha pura hobo karone eneka hoise.”
Titia Jisu laga chela khan sob Taike chari kene polai jaise.
Aru ekjon jawan chokra kapra napindi kene bodon te ekta mihin kapra lagai kene Jisu laga piche kori ahi thakise. Aru kunba manu khan pora taike dhori loise,
kintu tai pindhi thaka mihin kapra chari dise aru eku kapra napindhi kene polai jaise.
Aru taikhan Jisu ke loi kene moha purohit logote jaise, aru ta te prodhan purohit khan, niyom likha khan aru bura khan sob joma hoise.
Kintu Peter dur hoi kene Tai piche-piche ahi moha purohit laga veranda te nokorkhan logote jui thapi thakise.
Titia prodhan purohit aru sob maha sabha Taike morai dibole Jisu laga bhirodh misa kotha bisarise kintu eku pa-a nai.
Kelemane bisi manu Tai bhirodh te misa kotha koi dise, kintu taikhan laga kotha thik mila nai.
Titia kunba khara hoi kene Tai bhirodh te misa kotha di koise.
“Tai eneka kowa amikhan hunise, ‘Moi manu hath pora bonai rakha etu mondoli ke bhangai dikene, aru tin dinte dusra juntu hath pora bona nohoi, etu ke bonai dibo.”
Kintu titia bhi taikhan laga kotha thik milabo para nai.
Aru moha purohit taikhan majote uthi kene Jisu ke hudise, “Apuni eku bhi nokobo? Manu khan Apuni bhirodh te ki koi ase?”
Kintu Tai ekdom chup thakise. Aru eku jowab diya nai. Aru moha purohit Taike hudi koise. “Apuni Dhoinyo Jon laga Putro Khrista ase?”
Jisu koise, “Moi ase; Aru tumikhan dikhibo Manu laga Putro ke dikhibo Jitia Tai hokti laga dyna hath phale bohibo Aru akas laga badal pora ahi thaka dikhibo.”
Titia moha purohit bisi ghusa hoi kene tai laga kapra phatai kene koise, “Etiya amikhan ki gawah dibo lage?
Apuni khan bhi Isor laga ninda kowa hunise. Apuni khan ki bhabi ase?” Aru taikhan sob taike morai dibo lage koise.
Titia kunba Tai uporte thuki se, aru tai laga mukh dhakai dise, aru Taike marikena koise, “Bhabobani kobi!” Aru daruga khan bhi Taike loi jaise aru thapor marise.
Etu homoi te Peter nichete bohi asele aru moha purohit laga nokorni ta te ahise.
Aru taike koise, “Tumi bhi Nazareth Jisu logote asele nohoi?”
Kintu tai nohoi koise, “Moi najane, tumi ki koi ase moi bujhi panai.” Aru tai bahar ulai jaise.
Aru etu nokorni taike aru dikhi kene usor thaka khan ke koise, “Etu manu bhi taikhan logot ekjon ase!”
Kintu tai nohoi koi dise, aru olop, pichete ta te khara thaka ekjon pora Peter ke koise, “Hosa ase, tumi bhi taikhan majote ekjon ase, kelemane tumi bhi Galilee manu ase.”
Titia Tai shrap di kosom khai koise, “Apuni jun laga kotha koi ase moi etu manu ke najane.”
Aru titia dusra bar murga hala korise. Titia Peter Jisu kowa kotha ke bhabona korise, “Murga duibar hala kora age te tumi Moike tin-bar najane kobo,” aru titia tai etu kotha bhabi kene kandise.
Dusra din phojur huwa loge-loge mukhyo purohit khan pora niyom likha khan, bura khan aru pura sabha manu khan kotha milai kene Jisu ke bandi Pilate laga hathte di dise.
Pilate pora Jisu ke hudise, “Tumi Yehudi laga raja ase?” Tai jowab di taike koise, “Apuni kowa to ase.”
Aru purohit khan Taike bisi kotha te bodnam lagaise.
Titia Pilate Taike koise, “Apuni eku jowab nadibo? Sabi taikhan Tumi laga bhirodh te ki bodnam lagai ase?”
Kintu Jisu eku kowa nai, karone Pilate bisi asurit hoise.
Aru etu purbb somoi ekta manu bondhi te thaka ke chari dibole niyom thake, kunke taikhan chari dibole itcha kore.
Aru ta te Barabbas naam ekjon manu morai diya taikhan logote bondhi te asele aru jun he bhirodh kori kene manu morai disele.
Titia bhir pora taike binti korise jineka niyom kori ahise tineka kori dibi koi kene jor pora hala korise.
Kintu Pilate taikhan ke jowab di koise, “Moi tumikhan nimite Yehudi laga Raja ke chari dibo naki?”
Kelemane tai jani asele mukhyo purohit khan he Taike suku joli kene dhori taike di dise.
Kintu mukhyo purohit khan pora Barabbas taikhan ke dibi koi kene manu khan ke chukuli kori dise.
Aru Pilate koise, “Tinehoile moi tumikhan Yehudi laga Raja Taike ki kori dibo?”
Etu karone taikhan aru hala kori koise, “Taike Cross te mari dibi!”
Titia Pilate taikhan ke koise, “Kile, Tai ki biya kaam korise?” Kintu taikhan aru bisi jor pora hala kori kene koise, “Taike ke Cross te mari dibi.”
Karone Pilate bisi manu ke khushi kori dibo itcha pora Barabbas ke taikhan nimite chari dise, aru Jisu ke chabuk mari kene Taike Cross te mari bole di dise.
Titia sipahi khan Taike raja laga darbar -kuntu ke Praetorium koi- ta te loi jaise aru pura platon joma kori loise.
Aru taikhan begoni rong kapra Taike pindhai dise, aru katta thaka laga mukut bonai kene Tai laga matha te rakhidise.
Aru Taike eneka koi thakise: “Salam, Yehudi laga Raja!”
Titia taikhan ekta lathi loi kene Tai matha te mari thakise, aru Tai upor thuk phelaise aru athukari kene taike sonman kora nisena kori thakise.
Jitia Taike dhamali kori loise, Taike age te begoni rong kapra pindhai diya to ulaikene Tai nijor kapra lagai dise, aru Taike Cross te mari dibole bahar te loi jaise.
Titia taikhan Cyrene desh laga Alexander aru Rufus laga baba Simon, jun desh pora ahi asele, taike joborjosti Jisu laga Cross ke loi jabole dhori loise.
Aru taikhan Taike Golgotha- naam motlob ase, “Matha Hardi laga jaga”- ta te loi anise.
Taike tita pani draikha ros logot milai kene khabo dibole bisarise, kintu Tai etu khanai.
Aru Taike Cross te mari dise, aru chithi kheli kene Tai laga kapra bhag kori loise kun ki pabo koi kene.
Aru tin ghanta somoite taikhan Taike Cross te mari dise.
Aru Tai matha uporte Tai laga golti likhi dise, “Yehudi Khan Laga Raja” koi kene.
Aru Rome sipahi khan pora duita chor bhi Cross te mari dise, ejkon Tai dyna phale, aru dusra Tai laga baya phale.
Aru Taike golti thaka khan logote ginti kori loise koi kene Shastro te likhi diya kotha pura hoise.
Aru rasta te aha juwa kori thaka khan sob nijor laga matha hilai kene hinsa korise, “Ha! Tumi mondoli bhangai dikene, aru tin dinte bonai dibo kowa manu.
Cross pora niche nami ahi bhi aru nije ke bachai lobi!”
Tineka mukhyo purohit khan bhi niyom likha khan logote mili Taike hinsa kori koise, “Tai dusra ke to bachai thake, kintu Tai nije ke bachabo napare.
Israel laga Raja Khrista etiya Cross pora niche namibi, amikhan bhi dikhi kene biswas kori bole,” aru junke Tai logote Cross te disele taikhan bhi Taike ninda korise.
Aru titia choi ghanta somoi hoise, ta te pura desh te baroh baji pora tin baji tak andhera hoi jaise.
Aru tin baji laga homoi te Jisu jor pora hala kori koise, “Eloi, Eloi lama sabachthani?” Motlob ase, “Ami laga Isor, Ami laga Isor, kele Apuni Amike chari dise?”
Jun manu khan Tai usorte khara asele, taikhan etu huni kene koise, “Sabi Tai Elijah ke mati ase.”
Titia kunba ekjon polaikena spanj jinis ani kene tenga panite bhi jaise aru ekta nol pora Taike khabole dise, aru koise, “Tai ekla ke chari bhi aru sabi, Elijah ahikena Taike namai dibo na nai amikhan sabo!”
Aru Jisu jor pora hala kori Tai laga atma di dise.
Titia girja laga porda upor pora niche tak phati kene dui tukra hoise.
Ekjon henapoti Tai samne te khara thakisele. Jitia Jisu saas charikena morise, etu dikhi kene tai koise, “Hosa ase, etu manu he Isor laga Putro ase.”
Ta te kunba mahila khan asele jun dur pora sai thakise, Mary Magdalene, aru Mary -chutu James aru Joses laga ama,- aru Salome.
Jitia Tai Galilee te thakisele, eitu khan Tai laga piche-piche ahi Taike sewa kori thakisele, aru bisi mahila khan bhi asele, jun Tai logot te Jerusalem te ahise.
Aru saam hoise, etu Taiyar Din asele, Bisram din laga ek din age.
Arimathea nogor te thaka manu Joseph ahise. Tai sabha laga dangor manu asele, aru tai Isor laga rajyo aha rukhi thaka manu asele. Tai mon dangor pora Pilate logote jai kene Jisu laga gaw mangise.
Pilate asurit hoise, Tai joldi morise koi kene, aru henapoti ke mati ani kene Jisu morise na nai etu hudise.
Jitia tai henapoti pora jani loise, titia Jisu laga gaw Joseph ke dibole koi dise.
Aru Joseph pora Jisu laga gaw namai kene bhal norom kapra pora bandi kene, Taike pathor pora bona kobor te rakhidise, aru kobor laga dorjate ekta pathor pora bondh kori dise.
Aru Mary Magdalene aru Joses laga ama Mary bhi Jisu laga gaw kot te rakhise etu ahikena saise.
Jitia Bisram din khotom hoise, titia Mary Magdalene, James laga ama Mary aru Salome taikhan logot mitha sugandh thaka tel khan anise, Jisu ke abhishek kori dibole.
Aru hapta laga prothom din te ekdom phojurte suryo ula loge-loge taikhan kobor te ahise.
Aru taikhan majot eneka kotha koi thakise, “Kun pora amikhan nimite kobor laga dorja pora pathor hatai dibo?”
Kintu jitia taikhan ta te punchikena saise, etu dangor pathor to hati kene thaka paise.
Aru kobor bhitor te jai kene taikhan jawan manu ekjon lamba boga kapra pindhi kene dyna phale bohi thaka paise, titia taikhan bisi bhoi khaise.
Kintu tai taikhan ke koise, “Bhoi na koribi. Tumikhan Nazareth Jisu ke bisari ase, junke Cross te mari disele. Tai jee uthijaise. Tai yate nai. Taike kote rakhise etu jagah sabi.
Kintu tumikhan jai kene Tai chela khan aru Peter ke koi dibi, ‘Tai tumikhan laga age Galilee te punchi ase, ta te tumikhan Taike pai jabo, jineka Tai tumikhan ke koisele.’”
Karone taikhan kobor pora ulaikene polai jaise, kelemane taikhan kapi aru hairan hoise, taikhan kunke bhi eku kowa nai kelemane taikhan bhoi lagi sele.
Titia hapta laga prothom din te, Tai jee uthija-a pichete, Tai sob pora age Mary Magdalene, jun pora Tai sat-ta bhoot ulai disele, etu ke dikhai dise.
Aru Mary Magdelene jai kene Jisu laga chela khan ke koi dise, jun khan bisi mon dukh hoi kene kandi thakisele.
Aru jitia taikhan Jisu jinda hoise koi kene hunise, aru taike dikhise, kintu taikhan biswas kora nai.
Etu pichete Tai alag chehera hoi kene duijon chela ke dikhai dise, jitia taikhan dusra desh te jai asele.
Tai duijon Jerusalem te wapas jai kene taikhan ke koise, kintu taikhan pora duijon ke biswas kora nai.
Pichete jitia egaroh jon chela khan khabole bohi asele, Jisu ahi kene taikhan ke dikhai dise, aru taikhan mon tan huwa aru biswas nathaka karone taikhan ke galise. Kelemane Tai jee utha pichete jun khan pora Taike dikhise koise eitu khan laga kotha biswas kora nai .
Aru Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Tumikhan prithibi sob te jai kene sob sristi khan ke etu susamachar jonai dibi.
Jun manu biswas kore aru baptizma lobo, taikhan bachibo kintu jun biswas nokorile taike nosto kori dibo.
Aru biswas kora khan logote etu chihna thakibo, taikhan Moi laga naam te bhoot khan ke khedai dibo aru taikhan alag-alag bhasha te kobo.
Taikhan saph ke uthai lobo, aru taikhan jodi jeher khai le bhi eku biya nohobo, taikhan bemar manu uporte hath rakhile bhal hoi jabo.”
Titia Probhu Jisu taikhan logote kotha kowa pichete Taike sorgote uthai loi jaise, aru Isor laga dyna hathte bohi jaise.
Aru taikhan jai kene sob jagah te prochar kori jaise, aru Probhu pora taikhan logote ki kaam korise aru vachan dise, etu ke loi proman kori jai thakise.
Bisi manu khan pora kotha aru kaam khan laga khisa joma kori kene likhibo nimite kosis korise, juntu amikhan majot te pura hoise
jineka pora amikhan laga hathte dise jun khan shuru te nijor suku pora dikhise aru kotha laga noukar khan asele.
Etu nimite ami etu bisi bhal nisena dikhi ase, bhal pora bisari kene sob kotha aru kaam khan to shuru pora apuni ke hisab-kitab pora likhi ase mohan Theophilus,
eneka hoile tumi janibo etu bostu laga asol kotha juntu apuni ke sikhai dise.
Aru Herod pora Judea laga raja thaka somoite Abijah laga dol pora Zachariah naam laga ekjon purohit thakise. Tai laga maiki to Aaron laga khandan pora asele aru tai laga naam Elizabeth asele.
Aru tai duijon Isor usorte bisi bhal thakise, aru Probhu pora ki koi sob kotha to sapha pora mani thake.
Aru taikhan bacha thaka nai, kelemane Elizabeth to bacha pabole napara maiki thakise, aru tai duijon laga umor bhi bisi hoi jaise.
Etiya eneka hoise, jitia Zechariah tai Isor usorte tai laga purohit kaam khan kori asele, juntu kaan khan tai laga dol khan pora kore.
Titia, purohit laga niyom hisab te, taike Isor laga pobitro ghor bhitor te jai kene dhup aru dhona julabole chithi pora basi se.
Jitia dhona juli jaise etu homoi te sob manu khan bahar te prathana kori thakise.
Titia Probhu laga sorgodoth tai usorte ahise, aru jun jagate dhona julai se etu laga dyna phale khara korise.
Jitia Zechariah etu dikhise tai bisi chinta hoise aru tai uporte bisi bhoi ahi jaise.
Hoilebi, sorgodoth koise, “Bhoi na koribi Zechariah, tumi laga prathana huni loise. Tumi laga maiki Elizabeth pora ekjon chokra pabo. Aru tumi tai laga naam John rakhibo.
Aru tumikhan anond aru bhal lagibo, aru bisi manu khan tai laga jonom te khushi koribo.
Aru tai Probhu usorte bisi dangor hobo. Tai kitia bhi draikha-ros nakhabole lage, tai ama laga peth te thaka homoi pora he Pobitro Atma pora bhorta hoi jabo.
Aru tai Israel laga bacha khan ke Probhu Isor logote wapas anibo.
Elijah laga atma aru takot pora Probhu laga kaam te tai he age kori kene loijabo. Aru jun dharmikta laga kotha namani kene ase taikhan laga mon ghurai dibo nimite aru baba khan laga mon taikhan laga bacha khan phale ghurai dibole, aru jun Probhu ahibole ase Tai nimite rasta taiyar kori bole.”
Zechariah pora sorgodoth ke koise, “Moi etu hobo koi kene kineka janibo? Kelemane moi bura hoise aru moi laga maiki bhi umor bisi hoise.”
Aru sorgodoth taike jawab dikene koise, “Moi Gabriel ase, jun Isor usorte khara kore. Amike tumi logote kotha kobole pathaise, aru etu bhal khobor to tumike kobole nimite.
Aru etu nimite, sob kaam to nohua tak tumi chup thakibo aru kotha ulabo na paribo, kelemane tumi moi laga kotha biswas kora nai, etu sob to tai laga thik homoi te pura hobo.”
Aru manu khan Zechariah nimite rukhi thakisele, aru taikhan chinta-bhabona korise jitia tai mondoli ghor bhithor te deri korise.
Kintu jitia tai bahar te ulai ahise tai kotha kobole para nai, titia taikhan bhabise taike Isor pora kiba ekta dikhaise; aru tai manu khan ke ishara pora dikhai di thakise, aru kotha koribo naparikena he thaki jaise.
Aru etu sob to tai laga sewa kora homoi pura aru khotom hoise, titia tai ghor te jai jaise.
Aru etu din piche, tai laga maiki Elizabeth bacha bukhi se, aru pans mohina tak tai nije ke lukai kene rakhise, aru koi thakise,
“Isor ami uporte eneka korise, aru ami uporte Probhu he daya korise, manu usorte sorom nathakibo nimite.”
Aru Elizabeth peth te bacha bukha choi mohina huwa homoi te, Isor pora sorgodoth Gabriel ke Galilee, juntu ke Nazareth mate, etu jagate pathaise,
ekjon kumari mahila logote, jun Joseph koi kene ekjon manu logot shadi kori bole laga kotha milikena asele, aru jun David ghor manu asele; aru etu kumari laga naam Mary asele.
Aru tai logote ahikena, sorgodoth koise, “Salam tumike, jun uporte Isor laga morom ahise! Probhu tumi logote ase.”
Aru tai etu kotha khan huni kene chinta hoise aru tai bhabi thakise etu kineka laga salam ase.
Aru sorgodoth taike koise, “Bhoi na koribi, Mary, tumi to Isor usorte morom paise.
Aru tumi ekjon chokra bukhi bo, aru Tai laga naam ‘Jisu’ rakhibo.
Tai bisi mohan hobo aru Taike Sobse Mohan laga Putro eneka matibo. Aru Probhu Isor taike, tai laga purbo David laga singhason dibo.
Aru Tai hodai nimite Jacob laga ghor cholai thakibo, aru Tai laga rajyo kitia bhi khotom nahobo.”
Aru Mary pora sorgodoth logote koise, “Etu kineka hobo, kelemane moi kun manu ke bhi najane?”
Aru sorgodoth he taike koise, “Pobitro Atma tumi logote ahibo, aru Sobse Mohan takot pora tumike bondh kori dibo. Etu nimite juntu pobitro bacha jonom hobole ase, Taike Isor laga Putro matibo.
Aru sabi tumi laga ghor manu Elizabeth bhi tai laga buri umorte chokra pabole ase. Aru tai bacha bukha choi mohina chuli asele, tai junke dusra khan pora bacha bukhibo napara mahila koi thakisele.
Kelemane Isor nimite eku napara nai.”
Aru Mary koise, “Sabi moi Probhu laga ekjon mahila noukar ase. Apuni ki koi ase etu nisena hobole dibi.” Titia sorgodoth jai jaise.
Etu huwa pichete, Mary tara-tari kori kene pahar desh te jaise, Judah laga sheher ekta te.
Aru Zechariah aru Elizabeth laga ghor te ghusi kene salam dise.
Aru eneka hoise jitia Mary pora Elizabeth ke salam dise, tai laga pet bhitor te bacha thaka to khushi pora hili se, aru Elizabeth to Pobitro Atma pora bhorta hoise.
Aru tai khushi pora hala kori kene koise; “Sob maiki bhitor te tumi ekjon asirbad thaka ase, aru jun he apuni laga bhitor te ase etu bhi asirbad ase.
Aru etu moi logote kineka hoise, moi laga Probhu laga ama moi logote ahise.
Aru sabi, apuni laga salam jitia moi kan pora hunise, moi laga bhitor te bacha thaka to khushi pora hili se.
Aru etu manu asirbad ase jun to kotha khan purah hobo koi kene biswas korise, juntu kotha to Probhu pora taike koise.”
Titia Mary koise, “Moi laga jibon Probhu ke mohima kore,
Aru moi laga Atma khushi kori ase jun Isor he moi laga Tran-korta ase.
Aru Tai upor pora, sobse mamuli maiki ekjon, tai laga noukar ke saise. Aru sabi, etiya pora sob manu khan moike asirbad ase kobo.
Kelemane Mohan Isor pora moi nimite dangor kaam kori dise aru tai laga naam to pobitro ase.
Aru tai laga morom to etiya pora loi kene aha din tak jun manu taike bhoi kore tai logote ase.
Tai laga hath pora bisi dangor kaam korise. Aru jun manu tai laga monte phutani bhabona kore taikhan ke alag kori diye.
Aru taikhan bohi kene raj kora jaga pora nichete girai dise. Aru jun chutu hoise eitu khan ke uthaise.
Aru bhuka thaka khan ke bhal saman pora bhorta kori dise, Aru dhun manu khan ke khali kori dise.
Aru tai laga noukar, Israel ke modot korise, tai laga morom to yaad korise,
Aru tai kotha korise moi khan baba laga baba khan ke- Abraham aru tai laga bacha khan logote hodai nimite.”
Aru Mary Elizabeth logote tin mohina tak thakise aru etu pichete tai laga ghor te jai jaise.
Aru Elizabeth nimite bacha pabole laga homoi ahi jaise aru tai ekjon chokra ke jonom dise.
Tai laga ghor manu aru usorte thaka khan Probhu pora kiman dangor aru morom kaam korise etu dikhi kene tai logote khushi korise.
Aru bacha ath din hoi thaka homoi te taikhan bacha ke sunnot kori bole anise, aru tai laga baba Zechariah laga naam te rakhibole thakise.
Hoilebi tai laga ama pora koise, “Nohoi. Taike John laga naam pora he matibo.”
Aru taikhan koise, “Apuni laga ghor manu bhitor te kun bhi etu naam thaka manu nai.”
Aru taikhan tai laga baba ke hath dikhai kene ki mati bole mon ase etu hudise.
Tai laga baba pora likhi bole saman mangise aru likhise, koise, “Tai laga naam to John ase.” Titia taikhan sob asurit hoi jaise.
Aru achanak pora tai laga mukh khuli se aru tai laga jiba to hili se, aru tai Isor ke asirbad dise.
Sob Judea laga jagate etu laga kotha he koi thakise, aru jiman manu taikhan usorte thakise, taikhan sob bhoi hoise.
Jun manu etu kotha khan hunise etu sob taikhan nijor laga monte rakhise, aru koi thakise, “Etu bacha kineka hobo?” Kelemane Isor laga hath tai logote asele.
Titia tai laga baba Zechariah ke Pobitro Atma pora bhorta hoise aru tai koise,
“Asirbad hobo Probhu, Israel laga Isor, Kelemane Tai modot kori bole ahise, aru Tai laga manu khan nimite ki bhabise etu purah hoise.
Aru amikhan nimite Tai laga noukar David laga porial te ekjon mukti laga seing ulai dise,
Jineka tai purana homoi te pobitro bhabobadi laga mukh pora koisele.
Biya pora mukti pabo aru taikhan laga hath pora amikhan ke bachai lobo.
Tai eneka kori kene amikhan baba laga baba khan uporte morom to dikhai dibo. Aru tai laga ki pobitro vachan dise etu yaad koribo.
Aru juntu kosom Abraham amikhan baba laga baba khan logote khaise, etu dibo nimite
Aru amikhan ke dushman laga hath pora bachai kene ulai luwa nisena amikhan taike bhoi nakori kene tai laga sewa koribo,
Pobitrota te aru sapha pora taike hodai mohima koribo.
Aru apuni ke, oh bacha, sob pora dangor bhabobadi matibo kelemane apuni Probhu laga age te jabo aru rasta taiyar koribo.
Tai laga manu khan ke poritran laga gyaan dibole, taikhan laga paap pora maph pai ja-a dwara.
Aru etu sob to purah hobo kelemane amikhan laga Isor to morom aru nomro ase. Etu nimite uporte thaka ujala bhi amikhan ke modot kori bole ahibo,
Aru jun andhera te bohi ase aru mora-laga chaya te bohi kene ase taikhan uporte ujala thakibo; amikhan laga theng to shanti laga rasta te bera bole dibo.”
Aru bacha to dangor hoise aru atma te takot hoise, aru tai jongol te thakise jitia tak tai nijorke Israel manu usorte ahi dikhai diya nai.
Aru etu din khan te eneka hoise, Caesar Augustus pora ekta hukum ulaise dise, etu duniya laga manu khan sob sorkari kagos te naam likhi kene nijor laga ginti kori lobole.
Aru poila dinte hoile, jitia Quirinius pora Syria jaga laga governor thakise, etu homoi pora naam likha shuru hoise.
Aru sob manu nijor laga naam likhi bole nijor desh te jaise.
Aru Joseph bhi Galilee pora jaise, Nazareth aru Judea laga sheher pora, David laga sheher pora juntu ke Bethlehem mate, kelemane tai bhi David laga ghor manu ase aru tai laga khandan pora ahise.
Tai Mary ke loi kene naam likhi bole jaise, jun tai logote shadi kori bole laga kotha milai kene thakise, aru tai bacha bukhi thakise.
Aru jitia taikhan Bethlehem te thakise, bacha ke jonom hobole homoi ahi jaise.
Aru tai chokra ke jonom dise, tai laga poila bacha, aru kapra tukra khan pora bandi kene, taike khair te ghumai dise, kelemane aram kora ghor te taikhan thaki bole jaga thaka nai.
Aru etu jagate, kunba mer rokhiya khan thakise. Aru rati te taikhan kheti te mer khan ke rukhi thakise.
Aru Probhu laga sorgodoth taikhan usorte ahise, aru Probhu laga mohima taikhan uporte dise, aru taikhan bisi bhoi lagise.
Aru sorgodoth pora taikhan ke koise, “Bhoi na koribi, huni bhi, kelemane, moi dangor khushi kotha anise, aru etu sob manu nimite hobo.
Kilekoile aji laga dinte, David laga sheher Bethlehem te, tumikhan nimite, ekjon jonom hoise, jun Tran-korta Probhu Khrista ase!
Aru tumikhan ke etu chihna di ase: tumikhan ekjon bacha kapra laga tukra khan pora bandi kene khair uporte ghumai kene pabo.”
Aru achanak pora etu sorgodoth logote bisi duth khan ulaikena ahise, aru Isor ke dhanyavad dikena koi thakise,
“Sob pora untcha te thaka Isor ke mohima hobi, Aru prithibi te kun logot Tai khushi pai, Taikhan uporte shanti hobole dibi.”
Aru jitia sorgodoth khan sorgote jai jaise, rokhiya khan ekjon-ekjon ke koise, “Ahibi amikhan Bethlehem te jabo, aru ki hoise etu sabo, juntu kotha Probhu koi amikhan ke janibo dise.”
Aru taikhan joldi jai kene Mary aru Joseph ke lok paise aru khair te ghumai thaka bacha ke lok paise.
Aru jitia taikhan bacha ke sai loise, taikhan jai kene etu bacha laga sob kotha manu khan ke koise.
Jitia taikhan pora utu bacha laga kotha koise sob manu ke koise, etu huni kene taikhan sob asurit hoise.
Hoilebi Mary to etu kotha sob tai laga monte he rakhise.
Aru saguli roikhya khan, ki kotha taikhan ke sorgodoth khan pora koise aru taikhan ki hunise etu loi kene Isor ke dhanyavad dikene wapas jaise.
Aru jitia ath din pura hoise, tai laga sunnot niyom kora dinte, aru titia tai laga naam Jisu koi kene matidise, juntu naam sorgodoth pora matidise jitia Tai ama laga peth te hoi thakise.
Aru jitia sapha kora laga din paar hoise, Moses laga niyom hisab te, taike Jerusalem te Isor usorte dibole nimite anise.
-Aru etu Isor laga niyom te likhi kene ase, “Jiman mota ama laga pet pora ulai ahise, tai Probhu usorte pobitro matibo”-,
Aru boli dibole nimite juntu Probhu laga niyom te koise, “Ek jora kopu chiriya aru duita chutu kobutar.”
Aru sabi, Jerusalem te ekjon manu thakisele, tai laga naam Simon ase, tai dharmik jon asele aru Isor ke aradhana di thaka manu asele. Tai Israel nimite mon aram pabole bisara manu thakise; aru Pobitro Atma tai logote thakise.
Aru Pobitro Atma pora taike dikhai dise, tai mora nadikhibo, jitia tak tai Probhu laga Khrista ke nadikhibo.
Aru tai Atma te hoi kene mondoli te ahise; aru jitia Jisu laga ama baba pora taike anise; ki niyom ase etu hisab te tai uporte kori bole nimite.
Aru tai laga hathte bacha ke uthaikene Isor ke dhanyavad dise, aru koise,
“Etiya apuni laga noukar ke shanti pora etu prithibi chari kene jabole dibi Probhu, apuni laga kotha hisab te.
Moi laga suku pora apuni laga poritran dikhise,
Apuni sob to taiyar kori dise apuni laga manu khan usorte:
Porjati khan ke dikhai dibole nimite ekta ujala ahise, aru Israel manu khan nimite mohima hobole nimite.”
Aru tai ki koise etu huni kene tai laga ama aru baba asurit hoise.
Aru Simeon taikhan ke asirbad dise, aru bacha laga ama Mary ke koise, “Sabi, etu bacha ke Israel laga manu khan ke uthai dibo nimite rakhise; aru ek din asurit kaam to kotha namana khan ke dikhai dibo.
Aru ekta talwar apuni laga atma te maribo- kelemane bisi manu laga monte bhabona kosi thaka to ulai ahibo.”
Anna bhi ekta bhabobadini thakise, Phanuel laga chukri aru Asher laga jati pora asele. Tai umor bhi bisi hoi jaise, aru tai sat saal tak tai laga mota logote thakise,
Aru chaurasi saal tak tai ekjon bidhowa thakise. Tai kitia bhi mondoli chara nai, rati aru din tai prathana aru upas te he sewa kori thakise.
Aru jitia taikhan usorte ahise, tai Isor ke dhanyavad dibole suru hoise, aru sob manu khan ke etu bacha laga kotha koi dise, kelemane taikhan sob udhar pabo nimite Jerusalem te rukhi thakise.
Aru jitia Probhu laga niyom te sob kaam khotom hoise, taikhan Galilee te wapas jaise, juntu jaga Nazareth te asele, taikhan nijor laga bosti.
Aru bacha Jisu to dangor aru takot hoise, gyaan pora bhorta koi kene, aru Isor laga morom Tai laga uporte thakise.
Aru hodai saal, Tai laga ama baba Jerusalem te Nistar Laga Utsov nimite jai thake.
Jitia Tai baroh saal hoi jaise, taikhan hodai nisena, dhanyavad dibole nimite jaise.
Kintu jitia dhanyavad diya aru kha-luwa laga homoi to khotom koi kene paar hoise, jitia taikhan ghor te jai thakise, Jisu to Jerusalem te thaki jaise. Aru tai laga ama aru baba etu jana nai.
Kintu taikhan bhabise Jisu taikhan logote he eke logote jai ase, aru eneka pora ek din laga safar kori loise. Aru etu pichete taike ghor manu aru sathi khan majote bisari bole shuru hoise.
Aru jitia Taike pa-a nai taikhan aru Jerusalem te ghuri kene jaise aru taike bisari bole shuru hoise.
Aru tin din pichete Taike mondoli te paise, sikhai diya manu khan majote bohi kene taikhan ki koi ase etu huni thakise aru kiba kibi hudi thakise.
Aru jiman manu Tai laga gyaan aru kotha hunise, sob manu khan bisi asurit hoi jaise.
Aru jitia Taike dikhise, taikhan sob asurit hoi jaise, Tai laga ama pora koise, “Putro, amikhan ke kele eneka korise? Sabi, Apuni laga baba aru moi bisi chinta pora Apnike bisari thakise.”
Hoilebi Tai pora koise, “Kile Moike bisari ase? Apnikhan najane naki Moi laga Baba ghor te Moi thaki bole lage koi kene?”
Hoilebi Tai ki koise etu kotha taikhan bujhi bole para nai.
Etu pichete taikhan logote Nazareth te ahi jaise, aru taikhan laga kotha mani kene thakise. Tai laga ama to sob kotha tai laga mon bhitor te he rakhise.
Aru Jisu tai laga gyaan aru buddhi te bisi bari kene jaise, aru Isor aru manu logot te morom paise.
Jitia Tiberius Caesar pondro saal raj kori thaka homoi te, aru Pontius Pilate pora Judea laga governor thaka homoi te, aru Herod bhi Galilee laga ekjon sthaniya cholawta thakise, aru tai laga kokai Philip bhi eturaea aru Trachonitis laga cholawta thakise, aru Lysanias bhi Abilene laga ekjon cholawta thakise,
Jitia Annas aru Caiaphas, moha purohit thakise, titia Isor Zechariah laga chokra jongol te thaka homoi te, Isor laga kotha tai logote ahise.
Aru tai Jordan laga sob jagate jai kene prochar korise, baptizma pora mon ghura bole aru paap pora maph pabole nimite.
Aru Isaiah bhabobadi pora likha kotha kowa nisena, “Jongol pora ekta awaj mati ase, ‘Probhu nimite rasta taiyar koribi, aru Tai laga rasta to sidha koribi.
Sob bhoyam khan bhorta hoi jabo, Aru sob pahar khan ke niche anibo, Aru biya rasta khan sob sidha hoi jabo, Aru tan rasta khan norom hoi jabo,
Aru sob manu jati Isor laga poritran dikhibo.’”
Aru titia John pora baptizma lobole aha manu khan ke koise, “Saph laga khandan khan! Isor laga ahibole thaka khong pora polabole kun tumikhan ke polabole koise?
Etu karone, mon ghurai kene bhal phol ulabi, aru nijor logote koi nathakibi, ‘Moi khan logote baba Abraham ase,’ kelemane moi tumikhan ke koi ase, Isor to Abraham nimite etu pathorkhan pora bhi bacha khan uthabole pare.
Hoilebi etu kuthar to taiyar ase, ghas laga jor te laga bole nimite. Etu nimite, juntu ghas to phol nadhure etu kati kene jui te julai dibo.”
Titia manu khan taike hudibole shuru hoise, “Titia hoile amikhan ki kori bole laga?”
Aru taikhan ke koise, “Jun logote duita kapra ase ekta kapra to dusra ke dibi jun logote nai, aru jun logote kha luwa ase etu bhi eneka he koribi.”
Aru poisa utha manu khan bhi baptizma lobole ahise, aru taikhan pora koise, “Shika manu, amikhan ki kori bole lage?”
Titia taikhan ke koise, “Tumikhan ke kiman poisa uthabole nimite koise etu pora aru bisi nauthabi.”
Aru ta te kunba sipahi thaka khan pora hudise, “Aru amikhan ki kori bole lage?” Tai taikhan ke koise. “Tumikhan joborjosti pora kun logote bhi poisa nolobi, aru misa pora manu ke naphasa bhi, aru ki pai etu logote he khushi thakibi.”
Etiya manu khan bisi rukhi thakise aru monte John to Khrista hoi na nohoi etu asurit hoi kene bhabona kori thakise.
John he sobke koise, “Moi tumikhan ke pani pora baptizma dise, kintu moi pora bhi dangor ekjon ahi ase, moi Tai laga juta laga rusi khuli bole bhi layak nohoi. Tai he Pobitro Atma aru jui pora sobke baptizma dibo.
Dhaan laga katha Tai laga hathte ase. Etu pora ekdom sapha kori kene dhaan to dhaan ghor te joma koribo. Kintu chamra to jui thaka jui te phelabo.”
Aru taikhan ke kisim kotha sob te mon dangor kori dise aru John eneka Isor kotha prochar kori dise.
Aru jitia John pora Herod raja ke tai laga kokai Philip laga maiki Herodias logote golti kaam kora nimite kotha koise, aru tai ki biya kaam khan korise eitu khan sob koi dise,
Tai etu biya kaam khan logote aru etu bhi milai dise: John ke bondhi ghor te rakhidise.
Etu homoi ahi jaise, jitia sob manu baptizma loise, Jisu bhi baptizma korise, aru prathana kora homoi te sorgo khan khuli jaise.
Aru Tai uporte kopu chiriya nisena Pobitro Atma ahise, aru sorgo ekta awaj kotha koise, “Tumi Moi laga Putro ase, junke moi morom kore, Moi Tumi laga uporte bisi khushi ase.”
Etu homoi te Jisu tis-saal umor thakise jitia Isor kaam shuru korise. Tai Joseph laga chokra thakise,
Matthat laga chokra, aru Levi laga chokra, Melchi laga chokra, aru Jannai laga chokra, aru Joseph laga chokra,
Mattathias laga chokra, Amos laga chokra, Nahum laga chokra, Esli laga chokra, aru Naggai laga chokra.
Maath laga chokra, Mattathias laga chokra, Semein laga chokra, Josech laga chokra aru Joda laga chokra,
Joanan laga chokra, Rhesa laga chokra, Zerubbabel laga chokra, Salathiel laga chokra aru Neri laga chokra,
Melchi laga chokra, Addi laga chokra, Cosam laga chokra, Elmadam laga chokra aru Er laga chokra,
Joshua laga chokra, Eliezer laga chokra, Jorim laga chokra, Matthat laga chokra aru Levi laga chokra,
Simeon laga chokra, Judah laga chokra, Joseph laga chokra, Jonam laga chokra aru Eliakim laga chokra,
Melea laga chokra, Memna laga chokra, Mattatha laga chokra, Nathan laga chokra aru David laga chokra,
Jesse laga chokra, Obed laga chokra, Boaz laga chokra, Salmon laga chokra aru Nahshon laga chokra,
Amminadab laga chokra, Admin laga chokra, Arni laga chokra, Hezron laga chokra, Perez laga chokra aru Judah laga chokra
Jacob laga chokra, Isaac laga chokra. Abraham laga chokra, Terah laga chokra aru Nahor laga chokra,
Serug laga chokra Reu laga chokra, Peleg laga chokra, Eber laga chokra aru Shelah laga chokra,
Cainan laga chokra, Arphaxad laga chokra, Shem laga chokra, Noah laga chokra aru Lamech laga chokra,
Methuselah laga chokra, Enoch laga chokra, Jared laga chokra, Mahalaleel laga chokra, aru Cainan laga chokra,
Enos laga chokra, Seth laga chokra, Adam laga chokra, Isor laga chokra.
Aru Jisu, Pobitro Atma pora bhorta koi kene, Tai Jordan Nodi pora ghuri jaise, aru Pobitro Atma pora taike jongol te loi jaise.
Ta te Taike chalis din saitan pora porikha korise. Etu din khan te tai eku bhi khanai, aru porikha homoi khotom huwa pichete Tai bhuk lagise.
Saitan pora taike koise, “Tumi jodi Isor laga Putro hoi, titia etu pathor ke roti hobole hukum dibi.”
Jisu taike koise, “Etu Isor kotha te likha ase, manu to khali bhaat pora jinda nathakibo.”
Titia saitan pora Jisu ke uporte loi jaise aru ekbar te he Jisu ke duniya laga rajyo dikhai dise.
Aru saitan pora taike koise, “Moi tumike etu sob adhikar aru mohima dibo, kelemane etu sob moi loi loise aru moi junke itcha kore, moi taike dibo pare.
Jodi Tumi moike aradhana kore, etu sob Tumi laga hoi jabo.”
Kintu Jisu taike koise, “Isor kotha te likha ase, tumi khali Isor ke aradhana koribi, aru Tai laga kaam he koribi.”
Pichete saitan pora aru Jisu ke Jerusalem te loi jaise, aru mondoli uporte taike loi jaise aru koise, “Jodi Tumi Isor laga Putro hoi, yate pora niche giri jabi.
Kile etu likha ase, tai sorgodoth ke hukum dibo, Tumike bachabo karone.’
Aru, taikhan Tumi laga hath pora uthai lobo, etu pora Tumi laga theng to pathor te nagiribo.’”
Jisu taike koise, “Etu Isor kotha te likha ase, ‘Tumi Isor ke porikha na koribi.’”
Jitia saitan laga sob porikha khan khotom hoise, etu pichete saitan jai jaise, aru Taike gira bole bhal homoi rukhi thakise.
Pichete, Jisu Galilee te wapas Pobitro Atma laga hokti loi kene ahise, aru sob jagate Tai laga khobor huni loise.
Tai mondoli khan te Isor laga kotha sikhabole shuru korise, aru manu khan pora tai sikhai diya kotha khan huni kene bisi bhal paise.
Aru tai Nazareth te ahise, jun jagate Tai dangor hoise, aru Yehudi niyom te, tai Bisram dinte mondoli te ghumai se, aru awaj uthaikene jor pora poribole khara kori loise.
Aru Jisu ke Isaiah bhabobadi laga kagos poribole dise. Tai kagos Khuli Kena ki likha ase etu paise,
“Probhu laga Atma moi uporte ase, Tai moike tel hali dikene basi loise gorib khan ke susamachar prochar kori bole, Tai moike pathaise bandhi rakha khan ke khulai diya laga prochar kori bole, Aru andha manu khan dikhi bole, Dukh te dabai rakha manu khan ke bacha bole,
Aru Probhu laga dinte sob manu khushi pabole.”
Aru Tai kagos bondh kori kene cholawta ke wapas di dise aru bohise. Aru mondoli te thaka manu khan Taike he sai thakise.
Titia Tai pora taikhan ke koise, “Aji Isor kotha to purah hoise aru tumikhan huni loise.”
Sob manu Tai laga bhal koise aru asurit hoise aru Tai laga mukh pora ula kotha khan huni kene taikhan koise, “Etu Joseph laga chokra nohoi naki?”
Titia Tai koise, “Hosa pora tumikhan Moi etu kotha kobo, ‘Bemar bhal kora manu, nijorke bhal koribi. Tumi Capernaum te ki korise amikhan etu sob huni loise, aru eneka kaam khan nijor desh te bhi koribi.’”
Kintu, “Moi hosa kotha kobo, bhabobadi ke nijor desh te kun bhi sonman nakore.
Moi hosa pora tumikhan ke koi ase bidhowa bisi jon Israel te Elijah laga dinte thakise, jitia akas to tin saal choi mohina bondh thakise, jitia dangor dukh din etu desh te ahise.
Kintu Elijah ke taikhan kun logote te bhi pathai diya nai, hoilebi Zarephath, Sidon te ekjon mota nathaka maiki logote he pathaise.
Etu homoi te kusto-rugi laga bemar thaka manu Israel te bisi thakise. Elisha bhabobadi laga dinte, kintu kunbi bhal huwa nai, khali Syria desh laga Naaman ke chari kene.
Aru mondoli te thaka khan jitia etu kotha hunise, taikhan sob khong hoi jaise.
Taikhan khara hoise, aru Jisu ke tanikena nogor laga untcha pahar pora phelai dibole korise.
Kintu Taike manu khan majot pora loi juwa homoi te, Jisu alag rasta pora ulai jaise.
Etu pichete Jisu Capernaum te namise, juntu Galilee laga ekta sheher asele aru ta te sob manu khan ke Sabbath dinte Isor kotha hikai se.
Tai laga kotha huni kene taikhan bisi asurit hoise, kele koile Tai adhikar thakikena Isor kotha koi thakise.
Etiya mondoli te ekjon manu bhoot atma pora dhora thakise, aru tai jor pora hala korise aru dangor awaj te koise,
“Ha! Apuni logote amikhan ki kaam ase, Nazareth laga Jisu? Moi khan ke borbad kori bole ahise? Moi jane Apuni kun ase- Isor laga Pobitro Ekjon Ase!”
Jisu pora bhoot ke hukum dikena koise, “Chup thakibi, aru tai pora bahar ulai jabi!” Aru bhoot pora manu ke taikhan majote girai dise, aru manu ke eku nuksan nakorikena ulai jaise.
Manu khan saikene asurit lagise, aru ekjon-ekjon logote kotha patikena koise, “Etu ki kotha ase, juntu laga adhikar aru hokti pora Tai dusto atma khan ke hukum kore aru taikhan ulai jai?”
Aru etu khobor sob jagate punchikena bisi manu huni loise.
Pichete, Jisu mondoli chari kene Simon laga ghor te jaise. Etu homoi te Simon laga maiki laga ama bisi bemar thakise, etu nimite Taike ahikena anurodh korise.
Aru Jisu ta te jaise aru tai usorte khara hoi kene, bemar ke gali dise, aru bemar taike charise, aru tai uthikena taikhan ke sewa kori bole shuru hoise.
Jitia suryo nami jaise, jiman manu alag-alag bemar thakise, Jisu usorte loi kene ahise, aru Jisu ke taikhan uporte hath rakhi kene bhal kori dise.
Bisi jon pora bhoot khan hala kori kene ulaise, aru koise, “Tumi Isor laga Putro ase!” Hoilebi Jisu hukum dikene bhoot khan ke kotha kobo diya nai, kele taikhan jani thakise Tai Khrista ase koi kene.
Aru jitia din hoise, Jisu ulaikene manu nathaka jagate jaise, kintu manu khan dangor bhir hoi kene Taike bisari ahise. Taikhan ke Jisu pora chari kene najabo nimite manu khan kosis korise.
Kintu Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Moi aru bhi dusra sheher khan te bhi Isor laga rajyo laga susamachar prochar koribo lage, etu karone Moike duniya te pathaise.”
Aru Tai Judea desh laga jaga sob te mondoli te jai kene prochar korise.
Etiya eneka hoise, bisi manu Jisu pora Isor kotha kowa huni bole Tai usorte ahi thakise, etu homoi te tai Gennesaret laga pukhuri te rukhi thakise.
Aru Tai duita naw pukhuri kinar te ani thaka dikhise, kintu maas mara manu khan naw pora namikene taikhan laga jal dhulai thakise.
Aru Jisu ekta naw te uthise, etu Simon laga naw thakise, aru tai laga naw ke olop panite loi jabole koise. Aru Tai naw te bohi kene manu khan ke hikai se.
Jitia Jisu kotha koi kene khotom korise, Tai Simon ke koise, “Etu naw to pani bisi thaka phale loijabi aru tumi laga jal to ekbar panite phelabi.”
Simon koise, “Probhu, amikhan raat bhor jal marise aru eku bhi puwa nai, hoilebi apuni laga kotha te, moi jal phelabo.”
Aru jitia taikhan jal phelaise, taikhan bisi maas dhurise, aru taikhan laga jal phati jaise.
Dusra naw te thaka sathi khan ke modot mangise. Aru taikhan sob mili kene duita naw te maas khan bhorta korise, etu pora naw to panite dubi bole hoise.
Jitia Simon Peter etu dikhise, tai Jisu laga theng nichete girikena koise, “Ami usor pora jai jabi, kele moi ekjon paapi manu ase, Probhu.”
Etu kaam dikhikena Peter aru tai laga sathi khan,
aru etu nisena James aru John, Zebedee laga chokra khan, jun khan Simon laga sathi thakise taikhan sob kineka iman maas dhuri bo parise koi kene asurit hoise. Jisu pora Simon ke koise, “Bhoi nokoribi; tumikhan etiya pora manu khan dhora jal hobo.”
Jitia taikhan laga naw mati kinar te anise, taikhan sob chari kene Jisu laga piche korise.
Tai jitia ekta sheher te jaise, ekjon manu kusto-rugi bemar pora bhorta koi kene thaka dikhise. Aru jitia Jisu ke dikhise, tai Jisu laga theng te giri kene mangise aru koise, “Probhu, jodi Apuni itcha kore, Apuni moike sapha koribo pare.”
Jisu taike chuikena koise, “Moi itcha ase, sapha hobi.” Etu homoi te kusto-rugi bemar taike charise.
Aru Jisu pora taike koise kunke bhi nokobi, kintu “Purohit logote jai kene dikha bhi. Aru ekta sapha huwa laga boli koribi, Moses pora niyom diya nisena, etu pora he manu khan nimite ekta gawahi hobo.”
Kintu etu asurit kaam laga khobor to sob jagate punchise, aru bisi manu tai laga kotha huni bole aru bemar pora changai pabole ahise.
Kintu Tai manu nathaka jagate jai kene prathana kori thakise.
Eneka he, ek dinte, jitia Tai hikai thakise, Pharisee khan aru niyom hikai diya khan Galilee jaga, Judea desh aru Jerusalem sheher laga usorte thaka alag-alag bosti pora ahise aru taikhan bohi thakise. Changai kori bole Isor laga hokti Jisu logote thakise.
Titia manu khan he ekjon jothor bemar manu ke chetai te bukhi kene anise, Jisu jun jagate bohi thakise etu jagate anibole kosis korise.
Jitia taikhan manu bisi thaka karone taike anibo para nai, taikhan ghor uporte uthise, aru ghor laga chaat khuli kene Jisu usorte namai dise.
Taikhan laga biswas dikhi kene, Jisu koise, “Manu, tumi laga paapkhan maph hoise.”
Titia niyom likha khan aru Pharisee khan hudibole shuru hoise, “Tai kun ase eneka misa kobole? Kun he paap maph kori bole pare, khali Isor he nohoile?”
Kintu Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Tumikhan mon eneka kele bhabi ase?
Kuntu kobole asan ase, ‘Tumi paap to maph hoise’ na ‘Uthikena berabi?’
Kintu tumikhan janibole koi ase, Manu laga Putro logote prithibi laga paap ke maph dibole hokti ase” - aru Tai jothor thaka manu ke koise- “Moi koi ase, uthibi, tumi laga chatai uthabi, aru ghor te jabi.”
Aru etu loge-loge, etu manu khara hoi jaise, aru tai ghumai thaka chatai uthaise, aru Isor ke mohima dikena nijor ghor te jai jaise.
Sob manu khan asurit hoise, aru Isor ke mohima dise, aru manu khan bhoi hoise, aru koise, “Amikhan kitia bhi nadikha asurit kaam khan aji dikhise.”
Etu pichete, Jisu bahar te jaise. Aru Tai ekjon poisa utha manu, Levi koi kene naam thaka ke masul dikri laga tombu ghor te bohi thaka dikhise. Tai jai kene koise, “Moi laga pichete ahibi.”
Aru tai uthise aru sob chari kene, Jisu laga pichete jaise.
Aru Levi pora tai laga ghor te jai kene, ekta dangor ekta khana rakhise, Jisu nimite, aru ta te poisa utha manu khan aru dusra khan bhi eke logote mez usorte bohi thakise.
Kintu Pharisee khan aru niyom likha khan chela khan logote hala kori kene koise, “Tumikhan kele poisa utha manu aru dusra paapi khan logote khai ase?”
Jisu pora taikhan ke jowab dise, “Jun manu bhal ase taike bemar bhal kora manu nalage, kintu bemar manu ke he lage.”
Moi dharmik manu ke mati bole aha nai, kintu paapi khan mon ghura bole nimite ahise.”
Titia taikhan pora Taike koise, “John laga chela khan upwas aru prathana kore aru Pharisee khan laga chela bhi eneka he kore. Kintu Apuni chela khan, kha-luwa kore.”
Kintu Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Shadi te aha manu ke bhukha rakhibo pare naki, jitia tak taikhan logote shadi kori bole mota thaki ase?”
Kintu eneka din ahi ase, jitia shadi kora manu taikhan pora jai jabo, etu din pora taikhan upwas koribo.”
Aru Jisu taikhan ke ekta dristanto koise. “Kun bhi phata kapra logote notun kapra nasilai, jodi etu kore, notun kapra bhi phati jabo, aru notun kapra to purana kapra logote namilibo.
Kun bhi angur ros purana chamra jola te nadhale. Eneka korile, notun ros pora jola to biya kori dibo, aru etu borbad hoi jabo.
Kintu notun ros to notun chamra jola te halibo lage.
Jun manu bhi purana ros kha pichete notun ros khabole namange, kele tai koi, ‘Purana to he bhal ase.’”
Aru dusra Bisram dinte eneka hoise Jisu kheti majote jai thakise, aru chela khan dhaan guti ulaikene hath pora sapha kori kene khai thakise.
Kintu Pharisee khan hudise, “Tumikhan eneka kele kori ase, Bisram dinte eneka kori bole niyom nai nohoi?”
Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Tumikhan Isor laga kotha te pura nai naki David aru tai logote thaka manu khan bhuk laga homoi te taikhan ki korise?
Tai kineka Isor ghor bhitore jaise aru pobitro jagate bhaat rakha to loi kene khaise, aru tai logote thaka khan ke bhi dise, juntu niyom pora chubo aru khabo napare, khali purohitkhan he khabo pare.”
Tai taikhan ke koise, “Manu laga Putro to Bisram Din laga bhi Probhu ase.”
Aru ekta Bisram dinte eneka hoise, Tai mondoli bhitor te jai kene sikhai thakise. Ta te ekjon manu tai laga dyna hath to murjha asele.
Aru Bisram dinte, Jisu pora kunba ke bhal kore na nai, etu pora golti dhori bole nimite, niyom likha manu kunba aru Pharisee khan Jisu ke sai thakise.
Kintu Jisu taikhan laga bhabona jani jaise, aru jun laga hath murjha asele etu ke koise, “Uthibi, amikhan majote khara hoi jabi.” Etu manu uthi kene taikhan majote khara hoi jaise.
Pichete Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Moi tumikhan ke hudibo, Bisram dinte bhal kaam koribo lage na manu ke nuksan koribo lage, atma ke bachabo lage na, biya koribo lage?
Aru Jisu sob phale saikene etu manu ke koise, “Tumi laga hath to sidha koribi.” Tai korise, aru tai laga hath to bhal hoise.
Kintu cholawta khan khong pora bhorta hoise aru Jisu ke kineka phasabo etu kotha korise.
Aru eneka hoise dusra dinte Tai ulaikene tilla uporte prathana kori bole jaise, aru Tai pura rati Isor logote prathana kori thakise.
Aru jitia din hoise Jisu pora chela khan ke matise, aru baroh jonke basi loise, aru taikhan ke apostle naam dise.
Simon (junke Peter naam dise) aru tai laga bhai Andrew; James aru John; Philip aru Bartholomew;
Matthew aru Thomas; aru James Alphaeus laga chokra; aru Simon junke Zealot bhi mate;
Aru James laga chokra Judas; aru Judas Iscariot, jun he Jisu ke pichete dhoka dise.
Jitia Tai tilla pora namikene taikhan logote ahise, aru bisi dangor bhir manu joma hoi thakise. Aru Judea desh, Jerusalem sheher, aru samundar kinar Tyre aru Sidon sheher khan pora ahise bhi bisi manu ahise.
Taikhan Isor kotha huni bole aru bemar pora bhal hobole nimite ahise. Kunkhan dusto atma pora dhori thakise taikhan bhi bhal hoise.
Aru manu khan Jisu ke chubole kosis korise kelemane Tai pora changai laga hokti ulai thakise.
Titia Tai chela khan ke saise, aru koise, “Dhonyo ase dukhia manu khan, kelemane Isor laga rajyo to tumikhan nimite ase.
Dhonyo ase jun bhuk lagi ase, kele koile tumikhan bhorta hobo. Dhonyo ase kun etiya kandi ase, kele koile tumikhan hasibo.
Dhonyo ase jitia manu pora tumikhan ke ghin koribo, tumikhan ke chari dibo aru bodnam kori kene naam biya kori dibo, Manu laga Putro karone.
Etu din aha somoite khushi anondo pora nachibi, sabi, tumi laga inam to sorgote dangor ase. Kelemane taikhan baba laga baba khan bhi bhabobadi khan ke eneka he dukh dise.
Kintu dhun thaka manu khan, hai ase, kele koile tumikhan aram pai loise.
Hai ase kun manu etiya pet bhorta ase, kele koile tumi bhuk lagibo. Hai ase tumi kun etiya hasi ase, kele koile tumi dukh koribo aru kandibo.
Hai ase jitia manu pora tumikhan ke bhal ase koi, kele koile taikhan baba laga baba khan bhi misa bhabobadi khan ke bhi eneka koi thakise.
Kintu kun huni ase, tumikhan ke Moi koi ase, tumi laga dushman khan ke morom koribi aru jun khan pora tumikhan ke ghin kore, taikhan ke bhal kaam dikhai dibi.
Jun manu tumikhan ke shrap diye aru tumike digdar kore, tai nimite prathana koribi.
Jun manu tumike ekta thapor mare, taike aru alag gaal phale bhi mari bole dibi, jun manu tumi laga kapra ekta loijai, dusra ula bhi taike lobole dibi.
Tumike ki mange, etu di thaki bhi, aru jun manu tumi laga saman loijai, itu aru wapas namangibi.
Manu ki korile tumi khushi pai, tumi bhi eneka taikhan logot koribi.
Jodi apuni pora jun manu tumike morom kore, tumi bhi etu manu ke he morom korile, apuni nimite ki labh ase? Paapi manu bhi eitu khan ke he morom kore jun manu taikhan ke morom diye.
Jun manu tumi karone bhal kaam kore, aru tumi bhi etu manu nimite he bhal kaam kore, eneka hoile tumi nimite ki labh ase? Kile mane dusra paapi manu bhi eneka he kore.
Jun manu pora wapas pabole asha ase, taike he dile, tumi nimite ki labh ase? Dusra paapi manu pora bhi paapi manu ke dhar diye, taikhan bi etu sob pabole nimite.
Kintu dushman ke morom koribi aru bhal kaam to dikhai dibi, aru bodli te kiba pabo nimite bhabona nokoribi, eneka korile, tumi laga inam to dangor thakibo, aru tumi Sobse Mohan laga bacha khan hobo, kele koile paapi khan kun Isor ke dhanyavad nadiya, Tai pora eitu khan sobke morom kore.
Dayalu thakibi, jineka tumi laga Baba bhi dayalu ase.
Bisar nokoribi, tumike bhi bisar nokorile. Bodnam na koribi, aru tumike bhi bodnam nakoribo, maph dibi, tumi bhi maph pabo.
Di thaki bhi, tumi bhi pai thakibo: bhal pora dabai kene aru bhorta hoi kene dibi, aru bisi hoi kene tumi laga theng uporte giri bo. Ki hisab pora tumikhan dibo etu hisab te tumikhan bhi pabo.”
Aru Tai taikhan ke ekta dristanto koise. “Ekjon andha manu pora aru ekjon andha manu ke rasta dikha bo pare naki? Taikhan jai kene nalah te nagiribo naki?
Ekjon chela to guru pora dangor nohoi, kintu jun manu bhal kori kene sikhi loi tai guru nisena hoijai.
Tumi bhai laga suku letera ke kele sai thake, kintu tumi nijor suku laga dangor letera to nadikhe?
Tumi laga bhai ke etu kineka kobo, ‘Bhai, tumi laga suku te ki letera ase etu ami sapha kori dibo’; aru tumi laga suku te dangor letera thaka to tumi dikha nai? Kopoti khan! Poila tumi suku te letera thaka to ulabi, titia he tumi sapha pora tumi bhai laga suku te letera thaka to ulabole paribo.
Kelemane bhal ghas te biya phol naulai aru etu nisena biya ghas te bhi bhal phol naulai.
Sob ghas to tai laga phol pora he jani jai. Manu khan kata ghas pora dimoru nakate, aru jongol ghas pora angur phol nakate.
Bhal manu laga mon pora bhal bostu ulai diye, aru paapi manu bhitor pora biya he ulai diye. Kelemane mon bhitor te ki ase, tai mukh pora koi.
Tumikhan kele Moike ‘Probhu, Probhu,’ mate aru Moi ki koi etu nakore?
Aru jun manu Moi logote ahe aru Moi laga kotha to huni kene kore, Moi tumikhan ke dikhai dibo tai kineka ase.
Tai ghor bonai thaka ekjon manu nisena ase aru bhal kori kene pathor uporte ghor bonaise aru jitia ban-pani ahise, ghor to pani pora bhorta hoi jaise, kintu ghor ke hila bo para nai, kele koile etu ghor to bhal kori kene bonaise.
Kintu kun manu huni kene kaam nakore, etu manu eneka ase, jun ghor bonaise hoilebi bhetimul to bhal diya nai. Aru jitia etu ghor te dangor hawa pani lagise, achanak pora etu ghor to purah bhangikena pura barbad hoi jaise.”
Jitia Jisu sob kotha to koi dise aru manu khan ke hunai dise, Tai Capernaum town te jaise.
Aru Rome laga ekjon henapoti laga noukar, junke tai bisi morom kore, tai bemar pora mori bole hoi thakise.
Aru jitia henapoti pora Jisu laga kotha hunise, tai Yehudi laga bura manu khan ke Jisu logote pathaise, Jisu pora jai kene tai laga noukar ke changai kori bole.
Aru jitia taikhan Jisu usorte ahise, taikhan Jisu ke eneka anurodh korise, “Tai ekjon bhal manu ase aru apuni eneka koridile bhal ase,
kelemane tai moi khan laga desh ke morom kore, aru tai moi khan nimite synagogue bhi bonai dise.”
Etu pora Jisu taikhan logote jaise. Kintu Tai jitia ghor te punchibole usor hoise, etu henapoti pora manu ke pathaise, aru Taike koise, “Probhu, Apuni dukh nauthabi, kelemane Moi laga ghor bhitor te Apuni ahibole moi layak nohoi.
Etu nimite moi nijor bhi Apuni laga usorte ahibole layak nohoi, kintu Apuni ekta kotha koi dibi aru moi laga noukar changai pai jabo.
Moi nijor bhi ekta hukum chola manu ase, moi nichete sipahi khan ase. Moi ekjon ke kobo ‘Jabi’ aru tai jai; aru dusra ke kobo, ‘Ahibi’ aru tai ahe; aru moi laga noukar ke, ‘etu koribi,’ aru tai kore.”
Aru jitia Jisu etu kotha hunise, Tai bisi asurit hoise aru jun manu khan tai laga piche kori thakise, taikhan ke saikene koise, “Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, Israel te Moi eneka biswas thaka manu dikha nai.”
Aru jitia etu manu khan ke ghor te pathai dise, taikhan noukar to bhal hoi kene thaka dikhise.
Aru dusra dinte eneka hoise jitia Jisu Nain sheher te jaise, aru Tai laga chela aru dangor manu laga bhir bhi tai logote jai thakise.
Aru jitia tai sheher laga dorjate ponchise, ekjon mora manu ke uthai loijai thaka Tai dikhise. Mora manu to tai laga bidhowa ama laga ekjon he thaka bacha asele-, aru sheher laga manu khan tai logote thakise.
Jitia Probhu taike dikhise, Tai etu ama ke bisi morom lagise aru taike koise, “Nakandibi.”
Titia Jisu uthikena mora manu bukhi thaka chatai te chuise, aru mora manu ke bukhi thaka khan bhi ta te sidha khara hoi jaise. Titia Jisu koise, “Jawan manu, Moi tumike koi ase, uthi bhi.”
Aru titia mora manu to bohi kene kotha kobole shuru hoise, aru Jisu pora etu chokra ke tai laga ama logot di dise.
Aru etu dikhikene sob manu bhoi lagi jaise, aru Isor ke dhanyavad dibole shuru hoise, aru koise, “Ekjon dangor bhabobadi moi khan majote ahise” aru “Isor he manu uporte morom korise.”
Aru Jisu laga etu khobor to Judea desh aru usorte thaka bosti, nogor sob te bhi khobor to punchise.
Aru John laga chela khan etu sob khobor to jai kene John ke koise. Titia John pora tai laga diuta chela khan ke matise,
aru taikhan ke Probhu ke hudibole pathaise, “Ahibole thaka Masiha to apuni ase naki, na amikhan to aru dusra ekjon ke rukhibo?”
Aru jitia taikhan Jisu usorte ahise, manu khan koise, “Baptizma Diya John pora amikhan ke etu hudibole nimite pathaise, ‘Ahibole thaka Masiha to apuni ase naki, na amikhan to aru dusra ekjon ke rukhibo?’”
Etu homoi te Tai bisi manu ke bemar pora changai korise, biya atma pora dhora manu aru suku andha manu khan ke bhi changai korise.
Titia Jisu pora taikhan ke koise, “Tumikhan yate pora ja pichete, John ke jai kene tumikhan ki dikhise aru hunise etu kobi. Andha manu khan dikhi pai ase, lengra khan bera bole pari ase, korhi bemar thaka khan sapha hoi ase aru kaan benga khan huni ase, mora manu jinda hoi ase, aru gorib manu khan susamachar laga kotha huni bole pai ase.
Dhonyo ase jun manu moi uporte biya napai.”
Aru jitia John laga khobor bukha manu khan jai jaise, Jisu pora manu khan ke John laga kotha kobole shuru hoise, “Tumikhan balu jagate ki sabole jaise? Ekta hawa pora hilai diya jongol ghas to?
Kintu tumikhan bahar te ki sabole jaise? Ekjon manu norom aru daam kapra lagai kene thaka to? Sabi, jun manu daam kapra lagai ase, aru aram pora thaki ase taikhan sob raja laga ghorkhan te pabo.
Kintu tumikhan bahar te ki sabole nimite jaise? Ekjon bhabobadi? Hoi, moi tumikhan ke koise, tai to bhabobadi pora bhi dangor ase.
Etu tai ase jun nimite etu Shastro te likha ase, ‘Sabi, Moi ekjon manu ke pathai ase, tumi laga chehera usorte te, Jun he rasta to taiyar koribo.’
Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, jun manu ama pora jonom loise, kun bhi John nisena dangor nai, kintu jun Isor laga rajyote sobse chutu ase, tai pora bhi dangor ase.”
Aru jiman manu etu kotha hunise, poisa utha manu khan, aru John logote baptizma luwa khan sob Isor pora dharmik ase koi dise.
Kintu Pharisee khan aru niyom jana Yehudi khan Isor laga itcha namani kene baptizma luwa nai.
“Tinehoile, Moi, etiya laga jamana khan ke ki logote tulona koribo, taikhan ki nisena ase?
Taikhan bajar te thaka bacha khan nisena ase, bohi kene ekjon-ekjon ke mati kene koi, ‘Ami tumikhan usorte shadi laga basuri bojaise, tumikhan nach kora nai; moi khan mon dukh laga gana korise, hoilebi tumikhan kandia nai.’
Baptizma Diya John to ahikena bhaat aru angur ros bhi khanai, aru tumikhan koi ase, ‘Tai logote bhoot ase.’
Kintu Manu laga Putro ahikena kha luwa korise, aru tumikhan koi, ‘Sabi, taike, ekjon khakuwa aru nisa-pani kora, poisa utha khan aru dusra paapi manu laga sathi!’
Gyaan pora sob bhal aru biya to jani loi.”
Ekjon Pharisee pora Jisu ke tai logote khabole matise. Tai Pharisee laga ghor te punchise, aru Tai khabole bohise.
Etiya sabi, etu sheher te ekjon paapi mahila thakise. Jitia tai Jisu to Pharisee laga ghor te khabole bohi thaka dikhise, tai bhal gundh thaka bisi daam laga tel anise,
aru khara hoi kene Jisu laga theng usorte kandi kene tai laga suku pani pora Jisu laga theng bhi jai dise aru chuli pora mussi kene tai laga theng ke chumai dise, aru bhal gundh tel lagai dise.
Etu dikhikene, Jisu ke mata Pharisee tai nije ke koise, “Jodi etu manu hosa bhi bhabobadi ase koile, Tai janibo thakise etu jun taike choi ase, etu kineka mahila ase.”
Aru Jisu taike koise, “Simon, Moi tumike kiba kobole itcha ase.” Aru tai koise, “Koi dibi, Probhu!”
“Duita manu poisa dhar loise. Ekjon pansho denari aru dusra to pachas denari loi kene thakise.
Aru jitia taikhan logote wapas dibole poisa thaka nai, malik pora duijon ke maph kori dise. Etu nimite kun manu pora taike bisi morom koribo?
Simon koise, “Moi hisab te junke tai bisi dhar to maph korise.” Titia Tai taike koise, “Tumi thik bhabona korise.”
Aru titia Jisu etu mahila phale saikene Simon ke koise, “Tumi etu mahila ke dikhi ase. Moi tumi laga ghor te ahise. Tumi Moike theng dhula bole pani bhi diya nai, kintu tai laga suku pani pora moi laga theng bhi jai dise, aru tai laga chuli pora mussi dise.
Tumi Moike ekta chuma bhi diya nai, kintu Moi jitia pora yate ahise tai moi laga theng to chuma dibole chara nai.
Tumi Moi laga matha te tel dhala nai, kintu tai Moi laga theng te bhal gundh thaka tel pora mussi se.
Etu nimite Moi tumike koi ase, tai laga paap bisi thakise, etu sob maph kori dise- kelemane tai bisi morom korise, kintu jun manu olop he maph kore, tai olop he morom kore.”
Titia Jisu pora mahila ke koise, “Tumi laga paap sob khyama koridi ase.”
Jun manu khan ta te bohi thakise taikhan majote kobole shuru hoise, “Etu kun ase, jun paap bhi maph kori bole pare?”
Titia Jisu mahila ke koise, “Tumi laga biswas he tumike bachai loise. Shanti pora jabi.”
Aru eneka hoise, Jisu alag-alag sheher aru bosti te Isor laga rajyo laga kotha prochar kori kene jai thakise, aru Tai logote baroh jon chela khan bhi thakise,
aru kunba mahila khan bhi thakise jun khan dusto atma pora changai paise aru bemar pora bhal hoise. Mary, kunke Magdalene mate, jun laga gaw pora sat-ta bhoot khedaise;
aru Joanna, Chuza laga maiki, Herod raja laga imandar,aru Susanna; aru dusra manu khan kun Isor laga kaam nimite taikhan logote ki ase etu di thakise.
Aru jitia bisi dangor manu laga bhir joma hoi thakise aru manu khan alag-alag nogor pora ahise, Jisu dristanto pora taikhan ke koise:
“Ekjon kheti kora manu bijon hissi bole jaise. Aru jitia tai bijon halise, kunba rasta te girise, aru theng pora chipai dise, aru akas te chiriya thaka khan pora khai dise.
Aru kunba bijon pathor uporte girise, aru jitia dangor hoise, etu sukhi jaise, kelemane pathor uporte bisi patla mati thakise.
Aru kunba bijon to kata majote girise, aru dangor bhi hoise, hoilebi kata pora dabai dise.
Kintu kunba bijon to bhal matite girise, aru jitia etu dangor hoise, bisi dhan dhurise. “Etu kowa pichete, Tai awaj uthaikene koise, “Kun manu logot huni bole khan ase, tai huni lobi.”
Titia chela khan Taike hudise, “Etu dristanto laga ki motlob ase?”
Tai koise, “Tumikhan ke Isor he sorgo laga rajyo janibole dise, kintu dusra manu ke Moi dristanto pora koi, utu karone taikhan sai thakile bhi nadikha aru hunile bhi bujhi bole napare.’
Etiya dristanto laga motlob eneka ase: bijon to Isor laga kotha ase.
Rasta te gira bijon laga motlob kunba khan kotha hunise, kintu bhoot ahi kene mon pora bijon ke chingi loijai, etu pora taikhan biswas nokorile aru roikhya napabo.
Aru pathor uporte bijon gira to kunba Isor laga kotha khushi pora hunise. Kintu tai laga jor to bhitor te jabo napare, aru olop homoi nimite biswas kore, aru porikha aha homoi te giri jai.
Aru kata bhitor te gira bijon ase jun khan kotha hune, kintu duniya pora tani loi, dhun sampoti, rong tamash aru lalaj pora bandhi jai aru uthibole napare.
Kintu bhal matite gira bijon khan taikhan ase kunkhan mon dikena Isor kotha ke hunise aru monte rakhise, aru thik pora dhuri rakhise aru pichete bhal guti dhore.
Kun manu bhi saaki jolai kene bisna nichete narakhe. Kintu etu ke uporte rakhe, aru sob manu etu laga puhor dikhi bole pai.
Eku bostu lukai kene rakhibo na paribo, kele koile puhor pora sob bostu dikhai dibo.
Etu karone ki hune ase, jun manu logot bisi ase, tai arubi bisi pabo, aru kun manu logot komti ase, tai logote ki ase etu bhi loijabo.”
Pichete Jisu laga ama aru bhai khan Jisu usorte ahise, kintu taikhan Jisu thaka usorte jabo para nai kelemane manu laga bhir dangor thakise.
Jisu ke manu khan khobor dise, “Apuni laga ama aru bhai khan bahar te rukhi ase, Apnike lok kori bole rukhi ase.”
Kintu Jisu Khrista taikhan ke jowab dise, “Ami laga ama aru bhai eitu khan ase jun manu Isor kotha hune aru kore.”
Etu ek din eneka hoise, Tai chela khan logote ekta naw te uthise, aru taikhan ke koise, “Ahibi amikhan nodi laga dusra phale jabo.” Aru taikhan bohi kene jaise.
Naw te jai thaka homoi te Tai ghumai jaise. Etu homoi te dangor andhi ahise. Taikhan laga naw panite gushi bole shuru hoise aru taikhan moribo bhabi thakise.
Taikhan Jisu ke uthaise aru koise, “Probhu! Probhu! Moi khan sob mori bole ase!” Kintu Tai uthikena hawa pani ke hukum korise, aru bisi shanti hoi jaise.
Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Tumikhan laga biswas to kot te ase?” Aru taikhan bhoi pora asurit hoi kene majote ke koise, “Etu kun ase, Tai hawa aru pani ke hukum dise, aru taikhan manise?”
Pichete taikhan nodi paar kori kene Gerasenes, Galilee nodi usorte jaise.
Aru jitia Jisu matite namise, ekjon manu bisi bhoot pora dhora sheher pora ahi kene Jisu ke lok paise. Bisi din pora tai gaw te kapra nalagai kene, ghor te bhi thakibo napari kene, koboristan te he thaki asele.
Aru jitia tai Jisu ke dikhise, tai jor pora kandise, aru Tai age te girise aru jor pora hala kori kene koise, “Apuni moi logot ki kaam ase, Jisu, jinda Isor laga Putro? Moi anurodh kori ase, moike dukh nadibi.”
Jisu he dusto atma ke etu manu pora ulai jabole hukum dise. Bisi bar itu manu ke morai dibo nisena korise, loha laga rusi pora bandhi kene thakile bhi, manu khan pora bandhi rakhile bhi, sob rusi khan bhangai kene taike bhoot pora jongol te loijai thake.
Titia Jisu pora taike hudise, “Tumi laga naam ki ase?” Tai jowab dise, “Legion,” kelemane bisi bhoot khan tai bhitor te thakise.
Aru taikhan ke mora manu thaka jagate jabole hukum nadibi koi kene Taike anurodh korise.
Aru etu usorte gahori khan tilla kinar te dana khai thakise, etu pora biya atma khan gahori bhitor te jabole nimite anurodh korise. Jisu pora eneka hobole dise.
Aru bhoot khan manu pora ulaikene gahori bhitor te ghumai jaise, aru gahori sob pahar nichete giri kene mori jaise.
Gahori pala manu khan etu dikhi kene sheher te polaikene khobor dise.
Aru manu khan ki hoise etu sabole ahise, aru jun laga gaw pora biya atma ulai jaise, taike Jisu laga theng usorte bohi thaka dikhise, sapha kapra lagase aru bhal hoise aru etu saikene manu khan bhoi lagise.
Aru jitia taikhan dikhise kineka bisi bhoot pora dhora manu to bhal hoise, taikhan pora jai kene itu laga khobor sobke dise.
Aru Gerasenes laga sob manu khan bhoi lagi kene Jisu ke etu jaga pora jai jabole koise. Etu pichete, Tai naw te bohi kene wapas jai jaise.
Jun manu pora biya atma khan ulaikene jaise, tai Jisu logote jabole anurodh korise, kintu Jisu pora taike wapas pathai kene koise,
“Tumi nijor ghor te jabi aru Isor ki kori dise etu jai kene koi dibi.” Tai pichete tai ghor te jaise, sob sheher te Jisu pora tai nimite ki kori dise etu prochar kori dise.
Jitia Jisu ahise, sob manu khan taike salam korise, kelemane taikhan Taike rukhi thakise.
Aru ta te ekjon manu thakise tai laga naam Jairus asele, tai mondoli laga cholawta thakise. Tai Jisu laga theng te giri jaise, aru Jisu ke tai laga ghor te ahibole anurodh korise.
Tai laga ekjon baroh saal chukri mori bole asele aru jitia tai rasta te jai thakise, bisi manu khan tai logote joma hoi jaise.
Ekjon mahila baroh saal pora khun jai thakise, tai dawai diya manu logote sob taka poisa kharcha korise, kintu kun bhi taike bhal kori bole pora nai.
Tai piche pora jai kene manu majot pora Jisu laga kapra chuise, aru etu loge-loge te tai laga khun jai thaka rukhi jaise.
Titia Jisu koise, “Kun pora Moike chuise?” Jitia sob manu chup thakise, Peter koise, “Probhu, bisi manu khan ahi kene Apuni ke chui ase.”
Kintu Jisu he koise, “Kunba Moike chuise, Moi jani ase, Moi pora hokti ulai jaise.”
Jitia mahila to luka bole napara hoise, tai bhoi pora kapi kene Jisu usorte girise. Sob manu usorte tai koi dise ki nimite tai Jisu ke choise, aru kineka tai ekbar pora bhal hoise.
Jisu pora taike koise, “Swali, tumi laga biswas pora tumi bhal hoise. Shanti pora jabi.”
Aru Tai kotha koi thaka homoi te, synagogue laga kunba cholawta ghor pora ahise, aru koise, “Tumi laga swali to mori jaise. Sikhai diya manu ke aru dukh nadibi.”
Kintu jitia Jisu etu hunise, Tai eneka taike koise, “Bhoi na koribi; khali biswas koribi, aru tai changai hoi jabo.”
Aru jitia tai ghor te ahise, Tai kunke bhi bhitor te ahibole diya nai, khali Peter, John aru James, aru bacha laga ama aru baba ke he ahibole dise.
Aru sob manu monte dukh kori kene tai nimite kandi thakise, “Nakandibi, tai mora nai, kintu ghumai ase.”
Kintu taikhan Taike hasi dise, swali to morise bhabikena.
Kintu Jisu, tai laga hath to dhorise aru matikena koise, “Bacha, uthibi!”
Titia tai laga atma wapas ahise aru tai uthikena kiba khabole mangise.
Tai laga ama aru baba asurit lagise, kintu Jisu pora taikhan ke ki hoise etu kunke bhi nakobi eneka koise.
Aru jitia Jisu baroh jon chela khan ke matise, Tai pora chela khan ke bhoot khan ke kheda bole aru bemar ke bhal kori bole laga hokti aru adhikar dise,
aru Tai taikhan ke pathaise, bemar manu ke changai kori bole aru Isor rajyo laga kotha kobole nimite.
Aru Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Eku loi najabi- tumi laga jola, lathi, poisa aru bhaat, duita kapra bhi loi najabi.
Juntu ghor te ghusi bo, ta te he thakibi, jitia tak etu jaga to nachare.
Jun jagate tumikhan ke namate, etu sheher pora ula homoi te, tumi laga theng pora dhuli to hatai dibi, etu he taikhan bhirodh te ekta sakhi hobo.”
Aru taikhan alag hoi kene bosti khan phale jai jaise, Isor laga kotha prochar kori kene, sob jagate changai kori kene jaise.
Jitia Herod raja pora etukhan sob hunise, tai bhoi hoi kene bhabona korise, kelemane kunba pora koise John to mora pora jinda hoise,
aru kunba koise Elijah he ahise, aru kunba pora koise, poila laga bhabobadi ekjon jinda hoise.
Kintu Herod koise, “Moi John laga matha alag kori dise, kintu etu kun ase jun laga moi iman kotha huni ase?” Aru tai Jisu ke sabole kosis kori thakise.
Aru jitia apostle khan wapas ahise, taikhan ki korise etu sob Jisu ke koi dise. Titia Jisu pora taikhan ke loi jaise, aru ekdom chup-chap pora Bethsaida sheher te taikhan sob jai jaise.
Kintu jitia manu laga bhir khan etu hunise, taikhan bhi Jisu piche korise. Titia Tai sobke matise aru Isor laga rajyo kotha taikhan logote koise, aru jun manu changai lage, taikhan ke changai korise.
Etiya saam hobole homoi hoise, baroh jon chela khan Tai usorte ahikena koise, “Manu laga bhir khan ke pathai dibi, taikhan usor bosti te jai kene ghuma bole aru khabole bisaribo, kelemane moi khan eku napai-a jagate ase.”
Kintu Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Tumikhan manu khan ke kiba khabole dibi.” Kintu taikhan koise, “Moi khan logote pasta roti aru duita maas he ase- jodi moi khan jai kene sob manu nimite khana kina nai koile.”
-Ta te panch hajar manu thakise.- Titia Tai pora chela khan ke koise, “Taikhan ke ekta bhag te pachas manu kori kene bohibo dibi.”
Aru taikhan eneka korise aru sobke bohi bole dise.
Pasta roti aru duita maas to hathte loi kene, Tai sorgo phale saise, dhonyabad dise aru bhangaikena chela khan ke dibole dise.
Taikhan sob khai kene bhorta hoise, aru bachi juwa sob uthaise- aru baroh ta tukri te uthaise.
Aru ek din eneka hoise jitia Jisu Tai ekla pora prathana kori thakise, aru chela khan bhi Tai logote thakise, aru Tai taikhan ke hudise, “Manu khan pora Moi kun ase koi?”
Taikhan koise, “Baptizma Diya John Aru kunba koi Elijah, aru dusra khan pora koi purana homoi pora jinda huwa bhabobadi ekjon.”
Titia Tai taikhan ke koise, “Kintu tumikhan Moi kun ase koi?” Titia Peter he koise, “Isor laga Khrista.”
Kintu Tai pora taikhan ke etu kotha kunke bhi nokobole koise.
Tai koise, “Manu laga Putro bisi dukh pabo aru cholawta khan Taike swekar nakoribo, mukhyo purohit khan aru niyom likha khan pora bhi golti dhoribo aru Taike morai dibo, kintu Tai tin dinte arubi jinda hobo.”
Aru Tai sobke koise, “Kunba manu Moi pichete ahibole itcha thakile, tai nijorke pahoribo lage aru hodai cross uthaikene moi pichete ahibo lage.
Jun manu tai laga jibon to bacha bole kaam koribo tai harai dibo; kintu jun manu moi nimite jibon dibo, tai jibon pabo.
Jibon te ki labh ase, sob duniya to paile bhi, nijor jibon to nuksan korile?
Kun manu moi laga kotha aru moi nimite sorom kore, jitia Manu laga Putro Tai nijor laga mohima aru Baba laga mohima aru pobitro sorgodoth khan laga mohima pora wapas ahibo, etu homoi te etu manu nimite moi bhi sorom hobo.
Kintu moi hosa kotha koi ase, kunba manu khan yate rukhi ase, taikhan Isor laga rajyo nadikha tak namoribo.”
Etu kotha khan kowa ath din pichete, Tai tilla uporte prathana kori bole jaise, Peter, John aru James khan ke loi kene.
Jitia Tai prathana kori thakise, Tai laga chehera bodli hoise, aru Tai laga kapra to asurit laga boga hoise.
Aru sabi, duijon manu Tai logote kotha koi thakise, Moses aru Elijah thakise,
Mohima pora taikhan ahise, tai jabo laga kotha to patise, juntu Jerusalem te pura hoi jabo.
Jitia Peter aru sathi khan ghumai thakise, aru uthise, taikhan Tai laga mohima dikhise, aru duijon manu Tai logote khara hoi thaka dikhise.
Pichete eneka hoise, jitia duijon manu Jisu usor pora jai thakise, Peter Taike koise, “Probhu, amikhan yate tinta khamba bonabo, ekta apuni nimite, ekta Moses karone, aru ekta Elijah karone.” -Tai ki koi thakise tai najane.-
Kintu jitia tai etu koise, ekta badal ahikena taikhan ke lukai dise, aru taikhan bhoi lagise.
Aru akas pora ekta awaj ahise, “Etu Ami laga Putro ase, junke Moi basi loise; Tai laga kotha huni bhi.”
Jitia etu kotha khotom hoise, taikhan Jisu ekla thaka dikhise. Taikhan chup thakise aru ki dikhise kunke bhi kowa nai.
Aru ek dinte eneka hoise, jitia taikhan pahar upor pora nichete ahise, dangor bhir ke lok paise.
Aru sabi, ekjon manu majot pora hala kori, koise, “Sikhai diya manu, moi anurodh korise, ami laga bacha ke sabi, tai moi laga ekjon bacha he ase.
Sabi, ekjon atma achanak pora dhori kene tai laga mukh pora letera thuk ulaise. Aru taike jokhom kori kene ulai jaise.
Moi Apuni laga chela khan ke atma kheda bole anurodh korise, kintu taikhan kheda bole para nai.”
Titia Jisu taikhan ke jowab dise, “Biswas nathaka aru biya rasta te jai thaka manu khan, Moi tumikhan logote kiman din thakibo? Tumi laga chokra ke yate anibi.”
Jitia chokra ke ani thakise, atma pora taike matite girai kene bisi hilai dise. Kintu Jisu pora dusto atma ke gali dise, aru chokra ke bhal kori dise, aru tai baba logot di dise.
Taikhan Isor laga asurit kaam to dikhise. Kintu jitia manu khan ki hoise etu dikhise taikhan asurit lagise, Jisu tai laga chela khan ke koise,
“Etu kotha tumikhan mon bhitor te jabole dibi: kele koile Manu laga Putro ke manu laga hathte thogai pora di dibole ase.”
Kintu taikhan etu kotha bujhi bole para nai. Etu kotha taikhan pora lukai kene thakise, etu karone taikhan bujhi bole para nai, aru taikhan Jisu ke etu kotha hudibole bhoi lagise.
Pichete chela khan majote kun he sob pora dangor hobo itu laga kotha ulaise.
Kintu Jisu taikhan laga monte ki bhabona kori ase etu jani loise, aru ekjon chutu bacha ke Tai usorte uthai loise,
aru taikhan ke koise, “Jun manu etu bacha ke Moi laga naam pora grohon kore, tai Moike grohon kore; aru jun manu Moike grohon kore, jun Moike pathaise Taike bhi grohon kore. Kun manu nijorke chutu koribo, tai he dangor hobo.”
John koise, “Probhu, amikhan dikhise kunba manu Apuni laga naam pora bhoot khedai se aru amikhan taike rukhai dise, kele koile tai moi khan logot nohoi.”
Kintu Jisu pora taikhan ke koise, “Taikhan ke narukhabi, jun manu tumikhan bhirodh te nai, tai tumikhan logote ase.”
Etiya, Taike sorgote uthai loi jabole laga din to usorte hoise, Tai Jerusalem te jabole bisi mon hoise.
Tai poila ekjon chela ke pathaise, aru taikhan Samaria bosti bhitor te punchi kene sob kaam taiyar korise.
Kintu ta te thaka manu khan Taike grohon kora nai, kelemane tai Jerusalem te jabole he mon thakise.
Aru jitia chela khan James aru John ke dikhise, taikhan koise, “Probhu, amikhan sorgo pora jui ahi kene taikhan ke khotom kori bole kobo naki?”
Kintu Tai ghuri kene taikhan ke gali dise,
aru taikhan ta te pora alag bosti te jaise.
Taikhan rasta te jai thaka homoi te, kunba ekjon Jisu ke koise, “Apuni kun jagate jabo moi bhi apuni logote jabo.”
Jisu taike koise, “Siyal khan laga bhi gath ase aru akas te chiriya khan laga bhi ghor ase, hoile bhi Manu laga Putro laga matha rakhibole eku bhi jaga nai.”
Titia Jisu aru ekjon ke koise, “Moi laga piche ahibi.” Kintu tai koise, “Probhu, poila moi jai kene moi laga baba ke kobor dikene ahibo.”
Kintu Tai koise, “Mora khan pora mora khan ke kobor dibo. Kintu tumi, jai kene Isor laga rajyo prochar koribi.”
Aru ekjon koise, “Moi bhi Apuni laga piche ahibo, Probhu, kintu moi poila jai kene sob ghor manu ke jai ase kobo.”
Kintu Jisu koise, “Jun manu kheti te hal dhori kene pichete nasai, tai he Isor laga rajyo nimite thik ase.”
Aru jitia etu sob kaam pura hoise, Probhu pora aru bhi bahatar manu ke mati kene Isor kaam nimite asirbad korise, aru duijon-duijon kori kene taikhan ke pathaise jun jagate Jisu nijor bhi jabo thakise.
Tai koise, “Kheti to bhorta hoise, kintu kaam kora manu olop he ase. Etu nimite kheti laga Probhu ke kobi, kaam kora manu pathai dibole nimite.
Nijor rasta te jai thakibi, sabi, Moi tumikhan ke ekta mer khan nisena rong kutta usorte pathai ase.
Poisa laga jola nolobi, rasta te jabole laga jola bhi nolobi, aru nijor chapal bhi nolobi, aru rasta te jai thaka homoi te kunke bhi salam nadibi.
Jun to ghor te poila ghusi bo, poila kobi, ‘Shanti etu ghor te thakibi!’
Jodi shanti laga chokra ta te ase koile, titia tumi laga shanti tai uporte thakibo; jodi nohoi, etu shanti tumi logote wapas ahijabo.
Etiya etu ghor te he thakibi, ki kha luwa di ase etu khai kene thakibi, kelemane ki kaam kori ase, etu laga labh to pabole lage. Aru ekta ghor pora alag ghor te jai nathaki bhi.
Tumikhan juntu sheher te jabo, jodi taikhan tumike grohon kore, titia tumikhan ke ki khabole diye, etu he khabi.
Aru jun manu bemar ase taike changai koribi, aru taikhan ke kobi, ‘Isor laga rajyo tumikhan usorte ahise.’
Kintu jun sheher te tumikhan ke namate etu laga rasta te ulaikene kobi,
‘Juntu dhuli moi khan laga theng te lage etu bhi sapha kori ase tumikhan bhirodh te! Kintu etu jani lobi, Isor laga rajyo to usorte ahise.’
Moi tumikhan ke koi ase etu dinte tumikhan Sodom aru Gomorrah te dukh pa pora bhi bisi dukh pabo.
Hai ase tumi, Chorazin sheher! Hai ase tumi, Bethsaida sheher! Jintu dangor kaam tumikhan nimite kori dise, etu kaam Tyre aru Sidon sheher khan nimite korise koile, taikhan poila pora mon ghurai kene thakibo.
Kintu Tyre aru Sidon pora bhi bisi dukh tumikhan pabo, juntu dinte tumikhan logote Isor laga bisar hobo.
Aru tumi Capernaum town, tumike sorgote uthai loi najabo na, na uthai loijabo? Tumikhan ke ekdom niche, Hades te phelai dibo.
Jun manu tumikhan laga kotha hune, taikhan Moike hune aru jun tumikhan ke ghin kore taikhan Moike ghin kore, aru jun Moike grohon nakore, tai kun pora Moike pathaise, Taike bhi grohon nakore.”
Aru titia bahatar jon khushi pora jai kene koise, “Probhu, bhoot khan bhi Apuni laga naam te amikhan laga kotha mane.”
Titia Tai koise, “Moi sai thakise Saitan sorgo pora bhijili nisena girise.
Sabi, Moi tumikhan ke saph aru bhichoo khan ke khotom kori bole nimite takot dise, aru jiman dushman laga takot ase etu sob khan ke khotom kori bole nimite dise, aru eku pora bhi tumikhan ke jokhom kori bole napari bole dise.
Hoilebi tumikhan etu dusto atma khan pora tumikhan laga kotha mani ase koi kene he khushi na koribi, kintu khushi koribi ki karone tumikhan laga naam sorgote likha ase.”
Aru etu homoi te Jisu ke Pobitro Atma pora bisi khushi korise aru koise, “Moi Apuni ke dhanyavad di ase Baba, sorgo aru prithibi laga Probhu, kelemane Apuni etu sob kotha to gyaani aru bujhi bole pora manu khan logote lukai kene rakhise, aru etu sob kotha to chutu bacha khan ke janibole dise. Hoi Baba, etu sob Apuni usorte sabole bhal dikhe.”
Etu sob kaam aru kotha to Moi laga Baba pora Moike dise, aru kun bhi najane Putro to kun ase, khali Baba he jane, aru kun Baba ase etu khali Putro pora he jane, aru kunke Putro pora mati lobo taike he sob to dikhai dibo.”
Titia Tai chela khan ke ghuri kene saise aru aste pora koise, “Dhonyo ase etu sukukhan, manu nadikha tumikhan ke sabo dise.
Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, bisi bhabobadi aru raja khan tumikhan ki dikhise etu sabole nimite bisi itcha korise, kintu taikhan etu dikha nai, aru tumikhan ki hunise taikhan etu huni bole mon korise kintu taikhan huni bole panai.”
Aru sabi, ekjon Yehudi laga niyom jana manu Jisu ke porikha kori bole nimite khara hoise aru, koise, “Probhu moi anonto jibon pabole nimite ki kori bole lage?”
Titia Jisu he taike koise, “Niom hisab te ki likha ase? Tumi etu kineka porhe?”
Titia tai koise, “Tumi Probhu Isor ke pura mon pora morom koribi, aru tumi laga jibon pora, aru takot pora, aru tumi laga bhabona pora, aru tumi usorte thaka manu ke tumi nijorke kineka morom kore etu nisena morom koribi.
Titia Jisu taike koise, “Tumi thik kotha koise. Eneka koribi, aru tumi jinda thakibo.”
Kintu tai nijorke thik dikha bole nimite, Jisu ke koise, “Moi laga usorte thaka manu to kun ase?”
Titia Jisu taike jowab dikene koise, “Ekjon manu Jerusalem pora Jericho phale jai thakise. Taike chor aru dokait khan pora dhuri kene marise aru tai laga kapra phatai khan phatai dise aru taike adha mora chari kene polai jaise.
Titia achanak pora ekjon purohit etu rasta pora jai thakise, aru jitia tai etu manu ke dikhise, tai dusra phale jai jaise.
Etu nisena, ekjon Levi, jitia tai etu jagate ahikena manu ke dikhise, tai bhi dusra phale jai jaise.
Kintu ekjon Samaria laga manu, tai safar kori thaka homoi te, etu manu usorte ahise aru jitia taike dikhise, tai bisi mon dukh hoise aru morom lagi jaise.
Aru jitia etu manu usorte punchise, tai laga gaw te jokhom khan tel aru angur ros pora sapha kori kene bandi dise. Aru etu pichete, tai laga janwar uporte uthai dise, aru ekta ghor te loi jaise, aru taike bhal pora sai dise.
Aru dusra dinte tai duita denari ulaikene ta te thaka manu khan ke dise aru koise, “Taike bhal pora sabi, aru ki khorcha korile bhi, jitia moi aru wapas ahibo, etu homoi te moi sob di dibo.’
Tumi ki bhabe, taikhan tinjon bhitor te kun he tai laga asol usor thaka manu ase junke dokait aru chor khan pora mari kene chari dise?”
Titia tai koise, “Taike morom kora jon pora.” Titia Jisu taike koise, “Jabi aru tumi bhi eneka he koribi.”
Aru taikhan jai thaka homoi te, Tai ekta bosti te ghusi se, aru ta te Martha koi kene ekjon mahila thakise, tai pora Jisu ke tai laga ghor te matise.
Tai laga ekjon bhoini Mary koi kene thakise, aru tai Jisu laga theng usorte bohi kene Tai ki kotha koi ase etu huni thakise.
Kintu Martha olop biya lagise kelemane tai sob kaam to ekla kori thakise, etu karone tai jai kene koise, “Probhu, Apuni eku chinta nakore naki moi laga bhoini moike kaam kori bole ekla chari dise? Etu nimite moike modot kori bole nimite taike kobi.”
Titia Probhu pora Martha ke jowab dise, “Martha, Martha, tumi bisi alag kaam nimite chinta kori ase,
