kintu khali ekta kaam he bisi dorkar ase. Aru Mary pora etu bhal kaam bisari loise, aru etu tai logot pora kitia bhi loi najabo.”
Aru ek din eneka hoise, Jisu ekta jagate prathana kori thakise, jitia khotom hoise, ekjon chela Taike hudise, “Probhu, amikhan ke prathana sikhai dibi jineka John tai laga chela khan ke sikhaise.”
Tai chela khan ke koise, “Jitia tumikhan prathana koribo eneka kobi, ‘Sorgote thaka amikhan laga Baba, Apuni laga naam honmanio hobole dibi, Apuni laga rajyo ahibole dibi.
Hodai laga kha luwa amikhan ke dibi.
Amikhan laga paap pora amikhan ke maph kori dibi, Amikhan bhi dusra laga paap maph diya nisena Jun khan amikhan ke baki ase. Amikhan ke porikha te giribole nadibi.’”
Aru Tai taikhan ke koise, “Tumikhan logote kun sathi ase, aru tai logote rati te jai kene koi, “Sathi, moike tinta roti dhaar dibi,
kele koile moi laga ekjon sathi dusra jaga pora berai kene etiya ahise, moi taike dibole eku nai’?
Titia tai bhitor pora amike eneka kobo pare, ‘Moike etiya digdar nokoribi. Dorja to bondh hoise, aru moi aru bacha khan etiya ghumai ase. Moi etiya uthi kene tumike eku dibo na paribo.’
Moi tumike koi ase, jodi bhi tai uthi kene tai laga sathi ke dibole mon nai, hoilebi tai mangi thaka karone, tai ji hoilebi uthi kene taike jiman lage etu di dibo.
Moi aru bhi tumike koi ase, mangibi, aru tumi pabo; bisaribi, aru tumi pai jabo, dorjate khat-khata bhi, etu khuli jabo.
Jun manu mange tai pai; jun manu bisare tai pai; aru jun manu khatai, taike khuli diye.
Tumikhan majote kun baba eneka ase naki, jodi tai laga bacha pora maas mangile, taike saph dibo?
Aru jodi anda mangile, taike bhichoo dibo naki?
Etu karone, tumikhan biya manu hoilebi nijor bacha ke bhal saman he dibole jane, tenehoile sorgote thaka Baba Isor ke kun manu pora mange, taike Pobitro Atma nadibo naki?”
Ek din, Jisu ekta gunga kori diya bhoot ke khedai thakise. Aru jitia bhoot to ulai jaise, etu manu kotha kobo parise, aru ta te thaka manu khan asurit hoise.
Kintu kunba manu khan koise, “Tai bhoot ke Beelzebul laga naam pora khedai ase jun he bhoot khan laga raja ase.”
Aru dusra manu khan, Jisu ke porikha kori kene koise, sorgo pora ekta asurit kaam dikha bole koise.
Kintu, taikhan laga bhabona jani kene Jisu pora koise, “Juntu rajyo alag-alag bhabona hoi kene ase, etu bhangi jabo, aru ekta ghor alag-alag bhabona hoile, etu ghor bhangi jabo.
Aru jodi Saitan bhi alag-alag hoijai, eneka hoile tai laga rajyo kineka khara hobo? Tumikhan koi ase Moi Beelzebul laga takot pora bhoot khan ke khedai.
Jodi Moi bhoot khan ke Beelzebul takot pora khedai ase koile, titia hoile tumikhan laga chela khan kun laga atma pora bhoot khan ke khedai? Etu karone, eitu khan he tumikhan ke bisar koribo.
Jodi Moi bhoot khan ke Isor laga anguli pora khedai, titia hoile Isor laga rajyo to tumikhan usorte ahise.
Jitia ekta takot thaka manu pora hathiar loi kene ghor to rukhi thake, tai laga ki ase etu naharai.
Kintu tai pora bhi bisi takot thaka manu taike hamla korile, taike harai dibo, tai laga hathiar bhi loi lobo, jun uporte tai bharosa kore, aru ji dhun sompoti tai laga ase, sob bhag hoi jabo.
Kun manu Moi logote nathake, Moi laga bhirodh te ase, aru kun manu Moi logote nathake, tai alag hoijai.
Jitia ekta dusto atma ekjon manu pora ulai jai, tai sukha jagate aram pabole karone berai thake, aru koi, ‘Moi poila kot pora ulaise ta te aru bhi wapas jai jabo.’
Aru jitia tai ahe, tai sob sapha aru bhal kore kene rakhi thaka dikhe.
Tai jai kene tai pora bhi aru bisi biya sat-ta dusto atma loi kene etu manu bhitor te ghusi jai. Aru poila pora bhi etu manu laga jibon to bisi biya hoijai.”
Etiya eneka hoise, jitia Tai etu kotha koi thakise, ekjon mahila awaj uthaikene manu khan usorte Jisu ke koise, “Dhonyo ase etu ama jun Apuni ke jonom dise aru dudh khilai se.”
Kintu Tai koise, “Hoilebi, asishit hobo jun manu Isor kotha huni kene mani thake.”
Manu laga bhir jitia bisi hoise, Tai kobole shuru hoise, “Etu manu khan paap laga khandan ase. Taikhan kiba ekta sabole bisari thake, kintu, asurit kaam to taikhan ke nadikhabo, khali Jonah laga chihna he nohoile.
Jineka Jonah to Nineveh sheher laga manu khan nimite ekta chihna hoise, etu nisena Manu laga Putro bhi manu khan nimite eneka hobo.
Dakshin laga Rani bisar dinte uthi kene etiya laga manu khan ke bisar koribo, kele tai duniya laga kona pora Solomon raja laga gyaan kotha huni bole ahisele aru sabi Solomon pora bhi mohan ekjon yate ase.
Nineveh sheher laga manu khan uthaikene etiya laga manu khan ke bisar koribo, kelemane taikhan mon ghuraise Jonah prochar kora homoi te aru sabi, Jonah pora bhi mohan ekjon yate ase.
Kun bhi saaki to jolai kene lukai narakhe kintu saaki rakha jagate rakhe, aru kun manu ghor bhitor te ahe, puhor to dikhi pai.
Tumi suku to gaw laga diya ase. Jitia tumi laga suku bhal thake, tumi laga pura gaw to pohor pora bhorta hoi. Kintu jitia biya hoi jaise, tumi laga gaw bhi pura andhar hoijai.
Etu karone, bisi hoshiar hoi jabi etu pora tumi laga jibon to andhar nohobo nimite.
Jodi tumi laga gaw to ujala pora bhorta hoijai, aru kun jagate bhi andhar nai, titia etu puhor pora bhorta hoi jabo, jineka tumi uporte puhor to bhorta hoi thakibo.”
Jitia Tai kotha kora khotom hoise ekjon Pharisee pora Taike khana khabole matise. Aru Jisu tai logote khabole bohise.
Aru Pharisee khan etu dikhi kene asurit hoise, kelemane Jisu to bhaat kha age te, Tai laga hath Yehudi niyom hisab de thaka nisina dhula nai.
Kintu Probhu taike koise, “Tumi Pharisee khan kup aru borton laga bahar to sapha kore, kintu tumikhan mon bhitor te biya aru lalchi pora bhorta thake.
Murkho manu khan! Jun he tumi laga bahar to bonaise, tai he tumi laga bhitor bhi bonaise nohoi?
Kintu tumi bhitor laga morom to dikhai dibi, aru sabi, tumi laga jibon te sob to sapha hoi jabo.
Kintu Pharisee khan, tumikhan ke hai ase. Tumikhan kheti laga sobji aru bagan te thaka pata khan loi kene dos bhag diye, kintu Isor laga morom to namane. Kintu etu kori bole dorkar ase, aru dusra bhal kaam bhi nacharibo lage.
Pharisee khan, tumikhan ke hai ase. Tumikhan mondoli te sobse bhal jagate bohi bole mon kore aru bajar te manu bhoi pora salam diya to khushi pai.
Tumikhan ke hai ase, tumikhan nadikha laga kobor nisena ase, etu uporte manu khan najanikena berai thake.”
Titia ekjon niyom jana manu Jisu ke koise, “Probhu, etu koi kene, Apuni amikhan ke sorom khilai ase.”
Titia Jisu jowab dise, “Hai tumikhan, niyom laga hikhok khan! Tumikhan manu khan ke bhari bhar bukhi bole diye juntu taikhan bukhi bole napare, kintu tumikhan laga anguli pora nijor bhi etu bhar to bukhi bole mon nai.
Tumikhan ke hai ase, bhabobadi khan laga kobor to bonaise, hoilebi tumikhan baba laga baba khan pora he taikhan ke moraise.
Hosa koile, tumikhan baba laga baba khan pora ki korise etu laga tumikhan sakhi ase, taikhan pora morai dise aru tumikhan kobor khan bonaise.
Etu karone Isor laga gyaan pora sob koi dise, ‘Moi taikhan logot bhabobadi khan aru apostle khan ke pathabo, aru taikhan pora Moi patha khan ke dukh dibo aru kunba ke morai dibo.’
Etu karone, duniya shuru pora jiman bhabobadi khan laga khun giraise, sob laga bisar etiya laga jamana khan logote koribo.
Abel laga khun pora shuru kori kene Zechariah laga khun tak, junke pobitro jagate moraise. Hoi, Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, etu sob hisab to etiya laga jamana pora dibo lagibo.
Kanun hikhok khan ke hai ase. Tumikhan Isor ke janibole gyaan laga chabi to loi kene rakhise; tumikhan nijor bhi etu bhitor te najai aru kun manu jabole mon kore, tumikhan pora taikhan ke bhi jabo nadiye.”
Jitia Jisu ta te pora ulai jaise, niyom likha khan aru Pharisee khan etu sob kotha to huni kene khong uthise aru Tai logote jhagara korise,
taikhan rukhi thakise, Jisu kiba ekta golti kotha koile, Taike phasabo koi kene.
Eneka homoi te, hajar-hajar manu eke logote joma hoise, eneka somoite hazar manu joma huwa karone manu khan ekjon-ekjon uporte girise, Tai chela khan ke poila koise, “Pharisee khan laga chalaki pora hoshiar hobi, kelemane taikhan chalak ase.
Eku kotha lukai rakhibole na paribo, kintu bhitor te thaka kotha to sob ulai jabo.
Etu karone ki kotha andhar te koise, ujala te sob hunibo aru tumi ghor bhitor te ki kotha khan ki koise etu kotha ghor uporte awaj uthaikene kobo.
Moi tumikhan ke koi ase moi laga sathi khan, bhoi nakori bhi jun manu tumi laga gaw to morai dibo, aru etu pichete taikhan eku koribo na paribo.
Kintu Moi tumikhan ke koi dibo Isor ke tumikhan bhoi kori bole lage. Morai diya pichete, norokte phela bole jun laga takot ase, taike bhoi koribi. Hosa Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, Isor ke he bhoi koribi.
Aru pansta ghor laga chiriya khan ke dui poisa pora bikiri nakore naki? Hoilebi eitu khan ke bhi Isor napahore.
Tumikhan matha laga chuli bhi ekta-ekta pora ginti kori kene ase. Bhoi nokoribi. Tumikhan to ghor te thaka chiriya pora bhi bisi daam laga ase.
Moi aru bhi tumikhan ke kobo, jun manu Moike manu khan usorte paap shikar kore, Manu laga Putro bhi sorgodoth usorte taikhan ke shikar koribo,
kintu jun pora manu khan usorte Moike namatibo, Moi bhi sorgodoth usorte taike namatibo.
Jun manu Moi laga bodnam koribo tai maph pabo, kintu kun manu Pobitro Atma ke bodnam koribo tai kitia bhi maph napabo.
Etu karone jitia taikhan tumikhan ke mondoli khan te, aru cholawta khan aru adhikari khan usorte loijabo, titia tumikhan laga safai te ki kobo lage etu karone chinta nokoribi,
tumikhan ki kobo lage Pobitro Atma pora etu homoi te sob sikhai dibo.”
Titia kunba ekjon manu majot pora Jisu ke koise, “Probhu, moi laga bhai ke kobi tai laga dhun sompoti bhag kori kene moike dibole.”
Kintu Jisu taike koise, “Manu, tumikhan uporte bhag aru bisar kori bole Moi kun koise?”
Tai manu khan ke koise, “Lalchi aru biya itcha pora nijorke bachai kene rakhibi, sob thakile bhi manu laga jibon dhun sompoti bisi thaka para nohoi.”
Jisu taikhan ke ekta dristanto koise, “Ekjon dhuni manu laga mati ke bhal kheti ulaise,
etu manu monte bhabikena korise, moi ki koribo, kheti bisi bhal hoise aru rakhibole jaga nai?’
Kintu tai koise, ‘Moi eneka koribo: dhaan ghor to bhangai kene dangor ghor bonabo aru ta te moi laga dhaan aru sob bhal saman rakhibo.
Aru moi laga mon ke kobo, “Oh mon, bisi saal nimite kha luwa joma kori kene rakhise. Kha luwa kori kene, khushi koribi.’”
Kintu Isor he taike koise, ‘Murkho manu, aji rati tumi laga atma uthai lobo, aru ki dhun sompoti tumi joma kori kene rakhise, etu kun laga hobo?’
Eneka he hobo utu manu logote jun nijor nimite dhun sompoti joma kore, kintu Isor phale dhuni nohoi.”
Titia Jisu tai laga chela khan ke koise, “Etu nimite Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, nijor laga jibon nimite chinta nokoribi, ki khabo aru ki pindhibo, nijor gaw nimite chinta nokoribi.
Kelemane jibon to kha luwa pora bhi dangor ase, aru tumi laga kapra pora bhi dangor to tumi laga gaw ase.
Sabi akas te uri thaka chiriya khan ke, taikhan kheti bhi nakate. Aru taikhan laga dhaan rakhibole jaga bhi nai, kintu Isor he taikhan ke khabole diye. Tinehoile tumikhan chiriya pora bhi daam laga ase.
Kintu tumikhan majot te kun he chinta kori kene jibon to lamba kori bole paribo?
Aru jodi tumikhan etu chutu kaam bhi kori bole napare koile, tenehoile dusra kaam nimite kele chinta kori ase?
Sabi kheti te lili phul to kineka dangor hoi. Taikhan kheti bhi nakore aru joma bhi nakore. Hoilebi Moi tumike koi ase, Solomon ekta dangor raja hoilebi lili phul nisena sundur hobo para nai.
Kintu kheti laga ghas khan juntu aji ase aru kali to chulah te phelai dibo, hoilebi sabi, Isor pora eitu khan sundur pora bonaise, O biswas natakha manu khan, eitu khan pora bhi tumikhan ke sundur nabonabo naki!
Aru tumikhan ki kha luwa koribo etu nimite chinta nokoribi.
Etu prithibi manu kunkhan Isor najane, taikhan he eitu khan pichete berai thake, kintu etu tumi nimite dorkar ase koi kene Baba Isor he sob jane.
Poila Isor laga rajyo bisaribi, titia sob tumikhan ke hali dibo.
Komti manu khan, bhoi nokoribi, kelemane Baba pora tumikhan ke rajyo dibole khushi ase.
Tumikhan logote ki ase sob bikiri kori kene gorib khan ke de dibi. Jun jagate chor nahibo aru puka pora nakhabo, sorgote tumi laga dhun sompoti joma kora to kitia bhi naharabo.
Kilekoile jun jagate tumi laga dhun sompoti thake, etu jagate mon to hodai thake.
Tumi laga komor to bandhi lobi, aru saaki to jolai rakhibi,
aru eneka manu khan nisena hobi jun khan malik ke shadi pora wapas ahibole rukhi thake, aru jitia tai ahi kene dorwaja te mare, taikhan phot kori dorwaja to khuli bole pare.
Asirbad ase etu noukar khan jun malik aha homoi te rukhi kene thake. Hosa pora moi tumikhan ke koi ase, Tai laga pet te kapra bandi kene taikhan ke khabole jagate bohai dibo, aru Tai ahikena nijor pora taikhan ke kha luwa khabole dibo.
Aru malik adha rati te, nohoile bisi phojurte ahile bhi, tai noukar khan pora rukhi thaka dikhile, etu noukar to asirbad ase.
Kintu etu jani lobi, jodi malik to tai laga ghor te chor kitia ahibo etu jani loi, titia tai kitia bhi ghor te chor hobole nadibo.
Tumikhan bhi taiyar kori thakibi, kelemane Manu laga Putro ki homoi te ahibo tumi kobo napare.”
Titia Peter koise, “Probhu, Apuni etu dristanto moi khan ke koi ase na, sobke bhi koi ase?”
Probhu koise, “Tinehoile kun taikhan majote gyaani imandar noukar ase junke malik pora basi lobo tai laga dusra nokorkhan ke sabole, taikhan laga kha luwa thik homoi te dibole?
Asirbad ase etu noukar jitia tai laga malik ahikena taike kaam kora dikhe.
Moi hosa koi ase tai etu noukar ke tai laga sob dhun sompoti to sabole di dibo.
Kintu jodi noukar tai laga monte bhabe, ‘Moi laga malik to ahibole bisi homoi loi ase,’ aru noukar khan ke mari bole shuru hoi, aru kha luwa kori kene, aru nisa te giri thake,
aru titia tai laga malik achanak pora ahijai, jun to homoi te tai bhabona kori thaka nai, titia malik pora taike kati phelai dibo aru tai laga bodli dusra bhal ke kaam to di dibo.
Aru jun noukar tai malik laga itcha to jane, kintu malik laga itcha nisena eku kori kene nathake, titia hoile taike marikena bisi dukh dibo.
Kintu jun manu eku najane, hoilebi mar kha laga kaam to kori thakise taikhan olop he mari khabo. Kintu jun manu ke bisi dikena ase, taikhan logote pora bisi pabo lage, aru jun manu ke kaam bisi dikena ase, tai logote pora etu sob kaam laga hisab mangibo.
Moi etu duniya te jui phela bole ahise, aru Moi etu he itcha ase etu shuru hoijai kene thakibo nimite.
Moi baptizma pora baptizma kori bole ase, aru Moi chinta te ase jitia tak etu pura nohoi!
Tumikhan bhabise naki Moi etu prithibi te shanti dibole ahise? Nohoi, Moi hosa koi ase, kintu sob bhag hoi jabo.
Etiya pora ghor te pans jon bhi bhag hoi jabo- tinjon bhitor te te duijon aru duijon bhitor te tinjon dushman hoi jabo.
Taikhan alag hoi jabo, baba pora bacha khan ke chari bo, aru bacha khan bhi baba ke chari bo; ama pora chukri ke chari bo aru chukri bhi ama laga dushman hobo, saas pora buari ke chari bo aru, buari bhi saas ke chari bo.”
Etiya Jisu manu khan ke koise, “Tumikhan jitia paschim phale badal utha dikhe, ‘Borkhon ahise, aru etu ahijai.
Aru jitia dakshin laga hawa mare, tumikhan koi, ‘Bisi gorom ahibo, aru etu hoijai.
O Dhungi khan! Akas prithibi te ki dikhe etu kobole jane, kintu kele tumikhan aha dinte ki hobole ase etu kobo napare?
Aru tumikhan nijor bhi hosa to ki ase etu bisar nakore?
Tumi dushman logote bisar kori bole ja homoi te, rasta te he etu jhagara to faisla kori bole itcha koribi, nohoile tumike tanikena bisar ghor te loijabo, tumike daruga hathte di dibo, aru daruga pora tumike bondhi ghor te hali dibo.
Moi tumike koi ase, tumi poisa laga sob hisab kitab pura nakora tak tumi etu koidi ghor pora ulabole na paribo.”
Titia kunba manu khan etu homoi te Jisu ke eneka khobor dise ki Pilate pora bolidan kora homoi te tai Galilee manu khan ke morai dikena taikhan laga khun bhi milai dise.
Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Tumikhan bhabise naki etu Galilee manu khan dusra Galilee manu khan pora bhi bisi paapi khan ase kelemane taikhan eneka dukh paise?
Nohoi, Moi tumikhan ke hosa kobo. Jodi tumikhan mon naghurai, tumikhan bhi eneka he khotom hoi jabo.
Aru atharo jon manu kunkhan uporte Siloam laga minar giri kene mari dise, tumikhan bhabise naki Jerusalem te thaka manu khan pora bhi taikhan he bisi paapi thakise?
Nohoi, Moi tumikhan ke koi ase. Jodi tumikhan mon naghuraile, taikhan nisena khotom hoi jabo.”
Titia Jisu ekta dristanto koise, “Ekjon manu tai laga bagan te dimoru ghas rupaisile, aru tai etu ghas te phol bisarikena jaise, kintu eku pa-a nai.
Titia tai bagan sa-a manu ke koise, ‘Sabi, tin saal moi etu ghas te phol bisari kene ahise, kintu eku pa-a nai. Etu ke kati dibi. Etu mati to kele nuksan koribo?’
Titia noukar pora malik ke eneka jowab dise, ‘Probhu, etu saal nimite chari dibi, moi aru ekbar bhal pora etu ghas to mol dikene sabo.
Jodi etu ghas pora etu somoi nisena te phol diye, to bhal ase, kintu jodi etu pora bhal phol diya nai koile, apuni etu ghas to kati dibi!’”
Aru ek Bisram dinte Jisu mondoli khan te hikai thakise,
Aru ta te ekjon mahila atharo saal pora komjur laga atma thakise, tai laga komor to tera thakise aru ekdom sidha koribo napari kene thakise.
Aru jitia Jisu taike dikhise, Tai usorte mati kene koise, “Mahila, tumi laga komjur pora tumi mukti paise.”
Titia Jisu tai laga hath etu mahila uporte rakhise, aru etu homoi te tai sida hoi jaise aru tai Isor ke dhanyavad dise.
Kintu mondoli te thaka cholawta khan bhal pa-a nai aru Jisu pora Bisram dinte changai kaam kora nimite manu khan ke koise, “Choi din tak kaam kori bole dorkar ase. Etu homoi te he bhal hobole ahibi, kintu Bisram dinte nahibi.”
Kintu Probhu taikhan ke koise, “Dhongi khan! Tumikhan Bisram dinte tumikhan laga guru, saguli khan ke tai laga ghor pora ulaikene pani khabole loi najai naki?
Etu mahila, Abraham laga khandan pora ahise, junke Saitan para atharo saal tak bandhi kene rakhise, tenehoile taike Bisram dinte khuli nadibo lage naki?”
Jitia Tai etu kotha kori kene khotom hoise, jun Jisu ke ghusa kori thakise taikhan sorom lagi jaise, kintu sob manu khan khushi kori kene dhanyavad di thakise juntu kaam Tai kori kene dikhai diya karone.
Titia Jisu koise, “Isor laga rajyo to kineka ase, aru Moi etu ke ki logote tulona koribo?
Etu ekta sorso dana nisena ase jineka ekjon manu pora loi kene tai laga kheti te phelaise, aru etu dangor ghas hoi jaise, aru ta te chiriya khan bhi ahikena ghor bonaise.”
Aru Tai koise, “Isor laga rajyo to ki logote tulona koribo?
Ekjon mahila pora tin kilo atta te khomir hali dise, jitia tak etu phuli najai.”
Aru Jisu nogor aru bosti khan te jai kene hikai thakise aru Jerusalem te jabo nimite taiyar kori thakise.
Etiya ekjon pora Taike hudise, “Probhu, jun poritran pai ase taikhan olop jon he ase naki?” Titia Tai taikhan ke koise,
“Etu chutu rasta te jabole nimite dukh koribi, kelemane Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, bisi manu etu te ghusi bole kosis koribo, kintu ghusi bole na paribo.
Jitia ghor laga malik pora dorwaja to bondh kori dibo, titia tumi dorja to marikena kobo, ‘Probhu, moi khan nimite khuli bhi.’ Kintu tai tumikhan ke kobo, ‘Moi tumikhan ke najane, aru tumikhan kot pora ase.’
Titia tumi he kobo, ‘Amikhan Apuni logote bohi kene eke logote khai sele, aru Apuni amikhan laga jagate ahikena sikhai dise.’
Titia Tai kobo, ‘Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, Moi tumikhan kot pora ahise najane. Moi usor pora dur hoi jabi sob biya kaam kora khan!’
Etu jagate, kanda he thakibo, aru dath chababo aru jitia Abraham, Isaac aru Jacob aru sob bhabobadi khan ke Isor laga rajyo to dikhibo, kintu etu pora tumikhan ke bahar te phelai dibo.
Taikhan purab, paschim, uttor aru dakshin pora ahikena Isor laga rajyote bohibo.
Aru sabi, kun manu pichete thakise taikhan age te ase, aru kunba jun age te ase, taikhan pichete hoi jabo.”
Etu homoi te, kunba Pharisee khan Tai usorte ahikena koise, “Amikhan ke chari bhi aru yate pora jai jabi, kelemane Herod tumike morai dibole bisari ase.”
Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Jai kene utu siyal Herod ke kobi, ‘Sabi, Moi bhoot khan ke khedai dise aru bemar khan ke aji aru kali bhal korise, aru tin din pichete Moi laga lakshya punchi jabo.’
Jineka hoile bhi Moi kaam kori thakibo, aji, kali aru aha dinte bhi, kele koile Jerusalem te bhabobadi khan harai ja-a to bhal nai.
Oh Jerusalem, Jerusalem, kun he bhabobadi khan ke morai diye aru tumikhan usorte ahile pathor pora mari kene pathai diye. Moi kiman itcha korise tumikhan laga bacha khan ke eke logote rakhibole nimite jineka ekta murgi tai laga bacha khan ke pakhi nichete rakhe. Kintu tumikhan etu itcha nakore.
Sabi, tumikhan laga ghor to khali hoi jaise. Kile Moi kobo, tumikhan Moike aru nadikhibo etu homoi naha tak, jitia tumikhan kobo, ‘Asirbad pabo jun Probhu laga naam te ahise.’”
Aru eneka hoise, Jisu ekjon Pharisee khan laga ghor te Bisram dinte bhaat khabole jaise, aru Jisu ki kori ase etu sob bhal pora taikhan sai thakise.
Aru ta te ekjon manu thakise jun gaw phula bemar pora dukh pai thakise.
Titia Jisu Pharisee khan aru Yehudi niyom jana manu khan ke hudi kene koise, “Bisram dinte changai kori bole pare na nai?”
Kintu taikhan eku kowa nai, titia Jisu taike dhorise aru changai kori dise, aru taike pathai dise.
Titia Tai pora taikhan ke hudise, “Tumikhan majote kunba tai laga bacha nahoile bhi tai laga janwar Bisram dinte panite giri le jai kene phot uthai nolobo naki?”
Taikhan etu kotha te eku jowab dibo para nai.
Titia Tai arubi taikhan ke ekta dristanto koise, jun khan ke khabole mati sele, taikhan kineka kori kene bhal jagate bohi bole pabo, etu kosis kori thakise.
Jitia tumikhan ke shadi te khabole mate, tumikhan bhal jagate nabohibi, kele koile tumikhan pora bhi kunba bisi sonman thaka manu ke mati kene thakibo pare,
aru jitia tumi aru dusra manu junke khana te matise, tai tumikhan ke kobo, ‘Tumi laga jaga to taike dibi,’ aru titia sorom pora taike etu jaga to dikene tumi chutu jagate he bohi jai.
Jitia, tumike mate, jabi aru sobse chutu jagate he bohibi, jitia jun pora tumike matise tai ahibo, tai tumike kobo, ‘Sathi, uporte ahibi.’ Titia tumi laga sonman to dusra manu bohi thaka usorte bisi hoijai.
Jun manu nijorke dangor kori bole bisare tai chutu hoi jabo, aru jun manu tai nijorke chutu kore taike uthai dibo.”
Titia tai etu manu ke kobo jun he taike matise, “Jitia tumi kha luwa koribo, tumi laga bhal sathi khan, bhai khan aru dhuni manu ke namatibi, nohoile taikhan bhi tumike matibo, aru tumi taikhan nimite ki korise etu he apuni pabo.
Kintu jitia tumi kha luwa kore, gorib khan, bera bole napara, andha aru bemar manu khan ke mati bhi,
aru tumikhan asirbad pabo, kelemane taikhan tumike ghurai kene eku dibole na paribo. Kintu tumikhan ke Jisu Khrista wapas lobole aha homoi te biswasi khan logote sob kaam laga inam dibo.”
Jitia jun ekjon mez te bohi thakise aru eitu khan huni thakise, tai Jisu ke koise, “Dhonyo ase jun Isor laga rajyote roti khabo!”
Titia Jisu pora taikhan ke ekta dristanto koise, “Ekjon manu dangor kha luwa bonai kene manu khan ke matise.
Aru jitia khabole homoi ahise, tai laga noukar khan ke pathai kene jun manu khan ke matise taikhan ke koise, ‘Ahibi, sob to taiyar hoi jaise.’
Kintu mata khan sob nijor bahana kori bole shuru hoise. Poila ekjon pora koise, ‘Moi ekta kheti kinise, aru moi ta te jai kene sabo lagibo. Morom pora biya napabi.’
Aru ekjon pora koise, moi pansta guru kinise, moi taikhan ke kheti te loijai kene ekbar sabo. Morom pora biya napabi.’
Aru dusra ekjon pora koise, ‘Moi ekjon maiki logote shadi korise, aru etu nimite moi ahibole na paribo.’
Titia noukar khan sob kotha to tai laga malik ke ahikena koise. Ghor laga malik khong uthi kene, noukar khan ke koise, ‘Bahar te joldi jabi aru bosti rasta pora gorib manu, bera bole napara, suku andha aru bemar manu ke loi anibi.’
Sewak pora etu kaam kori kene tai koise, ‘Probhu Apuni ki koise eneka kori dise, aru bhi alohi manu bisi karone jaga ase.’
Titia malik tai laga noukar khan ke koise, ‘Bahar te jabi aru rasta kinar aru jun jaga pora hoile taikhan ke mati kene loi anibi, Moi laga ghor to bhorta hobo lage.
Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, jun manu khan ke Moi poila mati sele taikhan Moi ki kha luwa bonaise etu khabole napabo.’”
Aru bisi manu khan Jisu laga pichete jai thakise, aru Tai ghuri kene taikhan ke koise,
“Jun manu Moi logote ahibole itcha ase kintu tai nijor laga baba, ama, maiki, bacha, bhai, bhoini aru nijor jibon to ghin nakore, tai Moi laga chela hobole na paribo.
Jun manu tai nijor laga Cross uthaikene Moi pichete nahe tai Moi laga chela hobole na paribo.
Jun manu ekta ghor bona bole itcha kore, poila tai bohi kene, tai logote thaka poisa pora ghor bona khotom koribo paribona nai koi kene ginti nakore naki?
Jitia, tai ghor laga bhetimul to uthai dibo, aru ghor to khotom kori bole naparile, sob manu saikene taike hasi dibo,
aru kobo, etu manu ghor to bona bole shuru korise kintu khotom kori bole para nai.’
Aru ekjon raja, dusra raja logote lorai kori bole ase, tai poila bohi kene nasabo naki, tai laga dos hajar manu pora dusra raja laga bis hajar logote lorai koribo paribona nai?
Kintu, tai dur te thaka homoi te, ekjon manu ke shanti pora kotha kori kene lorai to rukhai dibo.
Etu nisena, jun manu tai laga sob dhun sompoti chari kene nahile, tai Moi laga chela hobole na paribo.
Etu nimite nimok to bhal ase, kintu nimok laga swadh harai dile kineka etu ke aru swadisht bonabo?
Etu ke mati nimite bhi aru kheti te mol bona bole bhi kaam nathake. Taikhan etu ke phelai dibo. Jun manu logote huni bole kan ase, taikhan huni bhi.”
Aru ek din poisa utha manu khan aru dusra paapi manu khan Jisu laga kotha huni bole nimite ahise.
Kintu Pharisee khan aru niyom likha khan ekjon-ekjon logote koi thakise, “Etu manu paapi khan ke mate, aru taikhan logote bohi kene khai.”
Titia Jisu he etu dristanto taikhan ke koise,
“Yate kun ase, jun logote eksoh mer ase kintu tai ekta haraise koile, tai ninyanve ke jongol te chari kene jun to haraise etu ke bisari bole najabo?
Aru jitia tai etu mer to pai jai, tai laga pithite uthaikene khushi pora loi ane.
Jitia tai ghor te ahijai, tai sobke mate, tai laga sathi aru usorte thaka manu khan ke koi, ‘Moi logot khushi koribi, moi laga harai ja-a mer paise.’
Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, sorgote bhi eneka khushi koribo jitia ekjon paapi manu mon ghurai kene ahibo, etu ninyanve thaka pora bhi bisi khushi hobo, kele koile taikhan to mon ghura bole eku nai.
Aru kun mahila, jun logote dosta chandi poisa thakise, jodi ekta harai diye, titia tai saaki jolai kene ghor jharu marikena sob sapha kori bisaribo nohoi jitia tak etu poisa napai?
Aru jitia tai pai loi, tai laga sathi aru ghor usorte thaka manu khan ke matikena, koi ‘Moi logote khushi koribi, kelemane moi laga harai juwa poisa to moi paise.’
Etu nisena he, Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, aru Isor laga sorgodoth majote bhi khushi hoi jitia ekjon paapi manu mon ghurai kene ahe.”
Titia Jisu he koise, “Ekjon manu laga duita chokra thakise,
aru chutu chokra pora baba ke koise, ‘Baba, moi laga dhun sompoti te ki bhag ase etu moike dibi.’ Titia tai laga baba pora dui bhag kori kene duijon ke di dise.
Aru bisi din nohoi kene, chutu chokra tai laga ki ase etu sob joma kori kene dur jagate jai jaise, aru ta te tai laga sob dhun sompoti cholai kene khotom kori dise.
Jitia tai logote ki thakise etu sob khotom hoi jaise, titia etu pura desh te dangor akaal ahi jaise, aru tai bisi dukh paise.
Titia tai kaam bisari kene ekta manu laga ghor te jaise, aru etu manu pora taike kheti te gahori ke dana khila bo nimite pathai dise.
Tai bisi bhuk laga pora gahori dana hoilebi khabo bhabi kene jaise, kintu tai khabole eku pa-a nai.
Jitia tai nijor laga halat dikhise, tai nijorke kotha korise, ‘Moi laga baba ghor te kiman jon hajira kora manu khan ase taikhan bhi pet bhorta kha-luwa khabo pai, kintu moi yate bhuk pora mori bole ase!
Moi tayar kene moi laga baba ghor te jabo, aru taike kobo, “Baba, moi sorgo aru apuni age te paap korise.
Moi apuni laga chokra kobole layak nai; moike bhi apuni laga ekjon hajira manu nisena he bonai kene rakhibi.’”
Titia tai uthi kene baba laga ghor te jaise. Jitia tai dur te he thakise, tai laga baba pora dikhise aru morom pora bhorta hoi jaise, aru polaikene taike dhurise aru chuma dise.
Titia chokra pora koise, ‘Baba, moi sorgote thaka Isor aru apuni usorte paap korise. Moi apuni laga chokra kobole layak nai.’
Kintu baba pora tai laga noukar khan ke koise, ‘Sobse bhal kapra joldi anibi, aru taike lagai dibi, aru tai laga anguli te anguthi lagai dibi, aru notun chapal bhi lagai dibi.
Aru sobse bhal guru laga bacha to ani kene maribi, aru moi khan sob kha luwa kori kene khushi koribo!
Kelemane moi laga chokra to mori jaisele, kintu etiya jinda hoise; tai harai jaise, kintu etiya pai loise.’ Titia taikhan sob khushi korise.
Etu homoi te tai laga dangor chokra kheti te thakise. Jitia tai ghor usorte ponchise, tai manu khan gana kori kene nachi thaka awaj hunise.
Titia tai ekjon noukar ke matikena ki hoi ase etu hudise.
Titia noukar pora koise, ‘Tumi laga bhai wapas ahise aru tumi laga baba pora sobse bhal guru laga bacha katise. Kelemane baba pora tumi laga bhai ke bhal kori kene wapas pai loise.’
Kintu dangor chokra to khong uthise aru bhitor te jabole mon kora nai, etu karone tai laga baba bahar te ulaikene taike ahibole nimite matise.
Kintu dangor chokra pora tai laga baba ke koise, ‘Sabi, iman saal moi apuni nimite kaam korise, aru kitia bhi niyom bhanga nai, hoilebi apuni moike ekta chutu saguli bhi diya nai ami laga sathi khan logote jai kene khushi kori bole,
kintu jitia apuni laga etu chokra ahise, jun he apuni laga dhun sompoti sob to biya kaam kori kene phelai dise, tai nimite apuni sobse bhal guru laga bacha to katise.’
Titia baba taike koise, ‘Bacha, tumi hodai moi logote ase, aru etu sob to tumi laga he ase.
Kintu etu kha luwa kori kene khushi kori bole nimite dorkar thakise, kelemane tumi laga etu bhai jinda ase; tai harai jaisele, hoilebi etiya taike pai loise.’”
Titia Jisu chela khan ke koise, “Ekjon dhuni manu thakise aru tai laga ekjon imandar thakise, kintu tai malik laga poisa khorcha kori ase koi kene kunba pora malik ke koi dise.
Titia dhuni manu taike mati kene hudise, ‘Eneka kotha khan tumi laga moi kele huni ase? Tumi ki kaam korise etu sob hisab kitab moike dibi, kelemane tumi etiya pora moi nimite kaam kori bole na paribo.’
Titia etu imandar tai nijorke koise, ‘Moi etiya ki koribo, moi laga malik pora kaam to moi pora loi lobole ase? Moi iman takot nai mati khundikena kaam kori bole aru moi bhik mangi bole sorom lage.
Moi ki kori bole lage moi jane, jitia moike kaam pora ulai dibo, manu khan taikhan laga ghor te moike matibo.’
Titia noukar pora jiman manu malik pora dhar loi kene thakise sobke tai matise, aru poila ekjon ke hudise, ‘Tumi moi laga malik ke kiman dibole ase?’
Tai koise, ‘Moi eksoh botol oliv tel dibole ase.’ Titia tai koise, ‘Tumi laga hisab lobi aru joldi bohi kene yate pachas eneka likhibi.’
Aru baki luwa dusra ke hudise, ‘Aru tumi kiman dibole ase?’ Tai koise, ‘Eksoh jola chawal.’ Taike koise, ‘etu hisab lobi, aru joldi pora likhibi assi dhan bosta.’
Titia malik pora etu biya imandar jun chalaki pora kaam korise, taike bhal paise. Kilekoile, etu yug laga chokra khan to taikhan nijor yug laga chokra khan, jun khan jyoti laga ase, taikhan pora bhi bisi chalak ase.
Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, paap laga dhun sompoti pora sathikhan bonai, aru jitia etu pora eku kaam nadiye, taikhan pora tumikhan ke kitia bhi khotom nohua jagate grohon kori lobo.
Jun manu olop te bhi biswas hoi kene thake tai bisi te bhi eneka he thake, aru jun manu olop te bhi thoga baji kore tai bisi te bhi eneka he kore.
Jodi tumikhan etu sapha nathaka dhun to bhal pora cholai kene rakhibo napare, tenehoile etu hosa dhun to tumikhan ke kun pora dibo?
Aru tumikhan dusra manu laga dhun to bhal kori kene nacholaile, titia tumi nijor laga dhun to kineka chola bo?
Ekjon nokor pora duita malik laga kaam koribo na paribo, eneka korile tai ekjon ke ghin koribo aru ekjon ke morom koribo, aru nohoile ekjon ke chari kene dusra ke jai jabo. Tumikhan Isor aru dhun sompoti eke logote sewa kori bole na paribo.
Aru jitia poisa morom kora Pharisee khan etu kotha khan hunise, taikhan Jisu uporte biya paise.
Titia Jisu pora taikhan ke koise, “Tumikhan manu usorte nijorke bhal dikhai, kintu Isor he tumikhan laga mon to jane. Jun manu usorte dangor hobole bisare tai Isor usorte komjur hoijai.
Bhabobadi khan aru niyom khan John laga homoi tak he thakise. Etu homoi para Isor laga rajyo laga susamachar prochar hoise, aru sob manu etu janibo nimite joborjosti jaise.
Sorgo aru prithibi harabo nimite asan ase, kintu niyom te ki likhi kene ase, etu laga ekta chutu bhag bhi naharabo.
Kun manu tai laga shadi maiki ke chari diye aru dusra maiki ke shadi kore, tai bebichari kaam korise, aru jun manu mota pora chari diya maiki logote shadi kore, tai bhi bebichari kaam kori ase.
Aru ekjon dhuni manu thakise, tai daam begoni rong kapra aru bhal mihin kapra lagai kene thakise, aru hodai din khushi aru moja pora thake.
Kintu ekjon gorib manu Lazarus koi kene tai laga mukhyo diwar te thakise aru tai laga gaw pura te biya ghaw pora bhorta koi kene thake,
aru etu dhuni manu laga thali pora ki gire eitu khan khabole nimite rukhi thake. Kintu kutta khan bhi ahikena tai laga ghaw to chati thake.
Etiya etu gorib manu to mori jaise, aru tai laga atma ke sorgodoth pora Abraham laga usorte loi jaise. Aru etu dhuni manu bhi mori jaise aru taike kobor te di dise,
aru mora manu laga desh pora tai laga suku to uthaikene Abraham ke dikhise aru tai laga usorte Lazarus ke bohi thaka dikhise.
Titia etu dhuni manu kandi kene koise, ‘Baba Abraham, moi uporte morom koribi aru Lazarus ke yate pathai dibi, tai laga anguli pora hoilebi moike pani dikene jiba ke thanda kori dibole, kelemane moi etu jui te juli kene dukh pai ase.’
Kintu Abraham pora koise, ‘Bacha, yaad koribi tumi laga jibon te sob bhal saman he paise, aru Lazarus to sob biya he paise. Kintu etiya tai yate aram pora ase, aru tumi dukh te ase.
Etu sob to charikena, tumi aru amikhan majote ekta dangor khai ase, etu thaka pora manu yate pora tumi logote jabo na paribo aru taikhan bhi ta te pora yate ahibo na paribo.’
Titia dhuni manu koise, ‘Moi apnike anurodh kori ase, baba, apuni kunba ke moi laga baba ghor te pathai dibi-
kele koile moi laga pans jon bhai ase, taikhan ke hoshiar kori dibi, taikhan bhi etu dukh khotom nohua jagate nahibo nimite.’
Kintu Abraham koise, ‘Taikhan logote Moses pora likha aru dusra bhabobadi khan pora likha bhi ase; taikhan ke taikhan laga kotha hunibo dibi.’
Kintu dhuni manu pora koise, ‘Nohoi Baba Abraham, kintu kunba mora pora uthi kene jaile he, taikhan mon ghura bo.’
Kintu Abraham taike koise, ‘Jodi taikhan Moses pora likha aru dusra bhabobadi khan pora likha kotha mana nai koile, mora manu uthi jaile bhi taikhan mon naghurabo.’”
Aru ek din Jisu pora chela khan ke koise, “Paap koribi dibole porikha to ahibo, kintu jun manu eitu khan loi kene ahe, taike hai ase!
Eneka manu dusra ke dukh diya pora nijor gola te pathor bandhi kene pani nichete phelai dile he bhal hobo.
Nijorke bhal pora sai lobi. Jodi tumi laga bhai paap kori ase, tinehoile taike rukhai dibi; aru jodi tai mon ghurai loile, taike maph dibi.
Jodi bhi tai tumi logote sath bar paap kaam kore ek dinte, aru sath bar wapas ahi kene koi, ‘Moike maph dibi, titia tumi taike maph koribo lage!”
Apostle khan pora Probhu ke koise, “Moi khan laga biswas dangor kori dibi.”
Titia Probhu he koise, “Tumikhan laga biswas ekta sorso dana nisena thakile bhi, tumikhan etu mulberry ghas ke kobo, ‘Nijor laga niche shikor pora ulai jabi, aru jai kene samundar te ulabi,’ aru tumi laga kotha manibo.
Aru yate kun manu tai laga noukar kheti te kaam kori thaka homoi te, nohoile bhi saguli rukha homoi te taike kobo, ‘Joldi ahikena kha luwa koribi’?
Kintu, tai etu manu ke eneka nokobo naki, ‘Moi kiba khabole nimite taiyar koribi, aru tumi laga kapra ke peti bandi lobi jitia moike kha luwa di ase, aru etu pichete tumi kha luwa koribi’?
Tai laga noukar ke ki hukum dise etu tai kori diya nimite malik pora taike dhanyavad dise naki?
Etu nisena tumikhan bhi, jitia tumikhan ke ki hukum diya sob kori loise, tumikhan eneka kobo lage, ‘Moi khan layak nathaka noukar ase. Moi khan ke ki koise etu he korise.’”
Aru etu homoi te jitia Jisu Jerusalem sheher te jaise, Tai Samaria aru Galilee jaga khan phale pora jai thakise.
Jitia tai ekta bosti te ponchise, dos jon kusto-rugi bemar thaka khan ke lok paise. Taikhan durte khara kori thakise.
Aru taikhan awaj uthaikene, koise, “Jisu, Probhu, amikhan uporte morom koribi.”
Jitia Tai taikhan ke dikhise, Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Jabi aru nijorke purohit khan ke dikhabi.” Aru jitia taikhan jai thakise, taikhan sob sapha hoi jaise.
Titia ekjon taikhan majot pora, bhal howa dikhi kene ghuri kene saise aru jor awaj pora Isor ke mohima korise.
Tai Jisu laga theng nichete giri jaise, aru Taike dhanyavad dise. Tai Samaria laga manu thakise.
Titia Jisu taike hudise, “Dos jun manu bhal huwa nai naki? Nou jun to kot te ase?
Taikhan majote aru Isor ke dhanyavad dibole kun bhi wapas aha nai naki, khali etu manu he nohoile jun alag desh pora ase?”
Jitia Jisu he taike koise, “Uthibi aru jabi. Tumi laga biswas pora tumike bhal korise.”
Pharisee khan pora Jisu ke Isor laga rajyo kitia ahibo eneka hudise, Tai jawab dise, “Isor laga rajyo to koi kene nahe.
Aru eneka nokobo, ‘Sabi, yate ase!’ Nohoile ‘Ta te ase!’ Kintu sabi, Isor laga rajyo to tumikhan majote ase.”
Titia Jisu laga chela khan ke koise, “Eneka din ahibo, jitia tumikhan Manu laga Putro ke sabole itcha koribi, kintu tumikhan dikhi napabo.
Titia taikhan pora tumike kobo, ‘Sabi ta te!’ Nohoile ‘Sabi yate!’ Tumi taikhan laga pichete napola bhi,
jitia akas te bhijili mara homoi te ekta jaga pora dusra jagate ujala dikhe etu nisena Manu laga Putro bhi Tai wapas aha homoi te eneka hobo.
Kintu poila Tai bisi dukh pabo lagibo etu jamana manu khan hath pora.
Jineka Noah laga homoi te hoisele, eneka din Manu laga Putro laga homoi te bhi eneka hobo.
Taikhan kha luwa kori thakise, shadi kori thakise, aru jibon to duniya laga khushi pora moja kori thakise, utu din tak jitia Noah dangor naw bhitor te ghusi jaise, aru dangor hawa pani ahi kene manu ke khotom kori dise.
Aru eneka din Lot laga homoi te bhi hoise- taikhan kha luwa nisa-panite moja kori thakise, ekjon-ekjon logote luwa-diya kori thakise, kunba ghor bonai thakise aru kunba kheti kori thakise:
kintu jitia Lot Sodom pora ulai ahise, akas pora jui ahi kene sob manu ke khotom kori dise.
Aru eneka he din ahibo jitia Manu laga Putro wapas ahibo aru sob manu Taike dikhi pabo.
Aru etu dinte, jun manu ghor uporte ase aru tai laga saman khan ghor te ase, taike etu saman lobole nimite nichete jabo nadibi; aru jun manu kheti te kaam kori ase, etu ke ghuri kene pichete sabole nadibi.
Lot laga maiki ke yaad koribi.
Jun manu tai laga jibon bacha bole bisare tai harai dibo, kintu jun manu nijor jibon to Isor nimite harai diye tai bachibo.
Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, etu rati te duijon ghumai thakibo. Ekjon ke uthai lobo, aru ekjon ke chari jabo.
Aru etu nisena duita mahila eke jagate dhaan khundi thakibo. Ekjon ke uthai loijabo aru ekjon ke chari jabo.
Duijon manu kheti te kaam kori thakibo, ekjon ke loijabo aru ekjon ke chari jabo.”
Titia taikhan pora Jisu ke koise, “Kot te Probhu?” Aru Tai pora taikhan ke koise, “Jun jagate manu laga gaw thake, ta te pucha mangso kha chiriya khan bhi joma kori kene thake.”
Ek din Jisu pora chela khan ke dristanto pora hikaise kineka taikhan prathana kori thakibo lage aru kitia bhi mon chutu nokorile lage.
Aru koise, “Ekta sheher te ekjon niyom chola manu thakise aru tai Isor ke bhoi nakore aru manu khan ke bhi hisab nakore.
Aru etu sheher te ekta bidhowa mahila thakise, aru tai, etu manu usorte hodai ahi thake, aru koi, ‘Moi laga dushman khan logot pora moike niyai dibi.’
Bisi din pora tai etu mahila laga kaam kori dibo mon thaka nai, kintu etu mahila bisi kowa nimite tai nijorke koise, ‘Moi Isor ke bhoi nakore aru manu ke hisab nakore,
kintu etu mahila moike hodai digdar diya nimite, moi tai nimite niyai kori dibo, eneka kori dile tai aru hodai ahi kene moike digdar nokorile.’”
Titia Probhu pora aru koise, “Huni bhi etu thik nathaka ukil pora ki koise.
Etiya Isor junke bachai loise taike sajai nadibo naki? Jun tai usorte din aru rati kandi thake? Taikhan laga kotha hunibo nimite deri rukhi thakibo naki?
Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, tai joldi pora niyai to ani dibo. Jitia Manu laga Putro ahibo, Tai etu duniya te biswas pabo na napabo?”
Aru Tai etu dristanto bhi koise jun taikhan nijorke dharmik manu ase koi thake aru dusra ke ghin kori thake,
“Duijon manu prathana kori bole nimite jaise- ekjon Pharisee, aru ekjon poisa utha manu.
Aru Pharisee to tai alag phale khara kori kene tai nijor logote eneka prathana kori thakise, ‘Isor, moi Apnike dhanyavad di ase moi dusra manu khan nisena nohoi- chor, biya manu, paap kaam kori kene thaka manu aru poisa utha manu khan nisena bhi nohoi.
Moi hapta te duibar upwas loi. Moi ki pai etu laga dos bhag bhi diye.’
Kintu poisa utha manu, durte khara kori kene, tai nijor matha bhi sorgo phale sa nai, kintu tai laga chati to marikena prathana korise, ‘Isor, moi uporte daya koribi, moi paapi manu.’
Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, etu Pharisee, jun poisa utha manu thakise, tai Isor usorte mohima paikena nijor ghor te jaise. Kelemane jun manu tai nijorke untcha uthabole bisare tai chutu hoi jabo, kintu jun manu nijorke chutu kore taike uthai dibo.”
Ek din kunba manu khan Jisu usorte bacha khan ke loi kene anise,Jisu laga hath taikhan uporte dikene asirbad dibole nimite. Kintu jitia chela khan pora etu dikhise, taikhan ke ahibo diya nai.
Kintu Jisu taikhan ke matise aru koise, “Chutu bacha khan ke Moi usorte ahibo dibi, aru taikhan ke narukhabi. Kelemane Isor laga rajyo to taikhan nisena nimite ase.
Moi hosa pora tumikhan ke koi ase, jun pora ekta bacha nisena hoi kene Isor rajyo ke swekar nakore, tai ji hoilebi ta te gusibo na paribo.”
Aru ekjon Yehudi cholawta manu Taike hudise, “Bhal hikhok, moi anonto jibon pabo nimite ki koribo lage?”
Titia Jisu taike jowab dise, “Moike kele bhal koi ase? Kun bhi bhal nai, khali Isor he bhal ase.
Isor laga niyom tumikhan jane bebichar nokorile, manu ke nomorabi, chor nokoribi, manu laga misa kotha nokobi, baba, ama ke morom koribi.”
Kintu cholawta manu he koise, “Moi jawan pora etu sob manikena ahise.”
Jitia Jisu tai kowa kotha hunise, Tai koise, “Ekta kotha etiya bhi tumi mana nai: Tumi laga ki ase etu sob bikiri kori dibi aru gorib khan ke bhag kori dibi, titia tumi laga dhun sompoti sorgote thakibo- aru Moi laga pichete ahibi.”
Jitia cholawta manu Jisu laga kotha hunise, tai bisi mon dukh paise kele koile tai bisi dhuni manu thakise.
Titia Jisu taike saikene koise, “Dhuni manu sorgote jabole kiman digdar ase!
Biji laga chenda pora ekta uth jabole asan ase, hoilebi dhuni manu Isor laga rajyote jabole nimite asani nohoi.
Jun etu kotha hunise taikhan koise, “Tinehoile kun he poritran pabo?”
Kintu Jisu koise, “Juntu kaam manu napare, Isor he pare.”
Titia Peter he koise, “Sabi amikhan sob chari kene Apuni laga piche ahise.”
Titia Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Hosa pora Moi tumikhan ke koi ase jun manu tai laga ghor, maiki, bhai, ama, baba, bacha ke Isor laga rajyo nimite charise,
etu duniya te aru bisi napabo- aru ahibole duniya te, anonto jibon pabo.”
Titia Tai baroh jonke alag kori kene koise, “Sabi, amikhan Jerusalem te jabo, aru bhabobadi khan pora Manu laga Putro nimite Isor kotha ki likhise, etu sob purah hobole ase.
Karone Taike Porjati khan hathte di dibo, aru Taike bodnam koribo, aru bisi sorom khila bo, aru Tai uporte thuk phelabo.
Aru Taike chabuk pora maribo, aru morai dibo, aru tisra dinte, Tai aru bhi jee uthijabo.”
Kintu chela khan etu kotha bujhi panai, aru etu kotha taikhan pora lukai rakhise, aru ki kotha koise etu bujhi bo para nai.
Etiya eneka hoise, jitia Jisu Jericho sheher te ahise, ekjon andha manu rasta kinar te bohi kene bhik mangi thakise.
Tai manu khan hala kori kene jai thaka to hunise, tai hudise etu ki hoi ase.
Taikhan andha manu ke koise, “Nazareth laga Jisu etu rasta pora jai ase.”
Titia tai kandikena jor pora koise, “Jisu, David laga Putro, moi uporte morom koribi.”
Jun manu Jisu age te jai thakise khong pora taike chup thaki bole koise. Kintu tai bisi hala kori thakise, “David laga Putro, moi uporte morom koribi.”
Titia Jisu khara kori kene etu manu ke usorte anibole koise. Aru jitia tai usorte ahise, Jisu taike hudise,
“Moi tumi nimite ki kori bole tumi itcha ase?” Tai koise, “Probhu, moi suku pora sabole itcha ase.”
Titia Jisu he taike koise, “Tumi laga suku khuli bhi. Tumi laga biswas pora tumi bhal hoise.”
Etu homoi te tai sabo parise aru Jisu pichete jaise, Isor ke mohima dikene, sob manu khan jitia etu dikhise, taikhan Isor ke stuti dise.
Aru titia Jisu ahise aru Jericho sheher phale jaise.
Etiya ekjon manu Zacchaeus koi kene thakise, aru tai poisa utha manu khan majote sobse dangor aru dhuni manu thakise.
Tai Jisu kun ase koi kene sabole itcha korise, kintu bhir dangor huwa pora sabo para nai, aru tai khata manu thakise.
Titia tai Jisu ke sabole nimite polai jai kene ekta sycamore ghas te uthise, kelemane Jisu etu rasta pora he jabo thakise.
Jitia Jisu etu jagate ahise, Jisu taike saikene koise, “Zacchaeus, joldi namikene ahibi, aji Moi tumi laga ghor te jai kene thakibo.”
Titia tai joldi kori kene nichete nami ahise, aru khushi pora Jisu ke tai laga ghor te ahibole matise.
Jitia manu khan etu dikhise, taikhan sob biya paise aru apaste koi thakise, “Jisu ekjon paapi manu laga ghor te jaise.”
Aru titia Zacchaeus uthikena Probhu ke koise, “Sabi, Probhu moi laga adha saman khan gorib ke di dibo, aru jodi moi kunba ke thogaise, tai laga bhag pora bisi aru char bhag milaikena dibo.”
Titia Jisu taike koise, ‘Aji poritran etu ghor te ahise, kelemane tai bhi Abraham laga khandan pora ase.
Kelemane Manu laga Putro to harai kene thaka manu khan ke bisari bole aru bacha bole ahise.
Aru taikhan etu kotha huni thakise, Jisu ekta dristanto kobole shuru hoise, kelemane tai Jerusalem te jabole nimite usor hoise, aru taikhan bhabise Isor laga rajyo to ta te joldi ahibole ase.
Titia Tai koise, ekta bhal ghor te jonom huwa manu dur ekta desh te tai laga rajyo pabo nimite jaise, aru etu pichete tai wapas ahi jabole thakise.
Etu karone tai laga dosta noukar khan ke matise, aru taikhan ke dosta mina dikene koise, ‘etu mina loi kene tumikhan ki kaam koribo pare etu kori kene thakibi moi wapas naha tak.’
Kintu manu khan taike bhal panai aru tai laga pichete ekjon ke pathai kene taike koise, ‘etu manu moi khan uporte raj kora to moi khan nalage.’
Aru jitia tai rajyo paikena wapas ahi jaise, titia tai koise jun manu ke tai poisa dise taikhan ke mati kene tai usorte loi anibole, ta te tai sabo kun pora bisi kaam kori kene labh paise.
Poila ekjon tai usorte ahi kene koise, ‘Malik, apuni pora diya poisa loi kene moi aru etu laga dos bhag dise kori dise.’
Titia etu bhal manu pora taike koise, ‘Bisi bhal korise, bhal noukar. Kelemane tumi olop diya te bhi bhal kaam kori kene thakise, tumi etu dosta sheher uporte adhikar chola bo.’
Aru dusra jon bhi ahise, aru koise, ‘Malik, apuni pora panch poisa diya to moi pans bhag bisi kori dise.’
Titia etu bhal manu taike koise, ‘Tumi bhi bhal kaam korise etu nimite pansta sheher uporte tumi adhikar chola bo.’
Aru tisra noukar ahise, aru koise, ‘Malik, etu apuni diya laga poisa ase, moi etu loi kene kapra pora bandhi rakhise,
kele koile, moi apnike bhoi lagi thakise. Kelemane apuni hisab kitab thik rakha manu ase. Apuni ki joma nakore etu uthai aru ki narupai etu he kate.’
Titia etu manu pora taike koise, ‘Tumi laga mukh pora he moi tumike bisar koribo, tumi biya noukar! Tumi jani thakise naki moi ekjon joborjosti kori thaka manu ase, aru moi ki joma nakore etu loi, aru ki nadhale etu kata manu ase?
Titia hoile tumi etu poisa to kele poisa-ghor te joma kora nai, aru jitia moi ahibo, etu homoi te bisi labh hobo thakise?’
Titia tai jun manu usorte khara kori thakise taikhan ke koise, ‘Tai logot pora poisa to loi lobi, aru jun logote dos bhag ase taike di dibi.’
Kintu taikhan koise, ‘Malik, tai logote dos bhag ase.’
‘Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, jun manu logote bisi ase taike aru bhi bisi dibo, kintu jun manu logote eku nai, ki tai logote ase etu bhi loi lobo.
Kintu etu moi laga dushman khan, jun manu moike taikhan uporte raj kori bole dibo mon thaka nai, yate loi kene anibi aru moi usorte morai dibi.’”
Etu sob pichete, Jisu aru chela khan sob Jerusalem phale jaise.
Aru jitia Tai Bethphage aru Bethany nogorkhan usorte ahise, Olivet kuwa ekta pahar te, Tai duijon chela ke pathaise,
aru koise, “Tumikhan etu age te thaka bosti te jabi. Jitia ta te punchibo, tumikhan ta te kun pora bhi naboha ekta ghora laga bacha ke bandi kene thaka dikhibo. Etu ke Khuli Kena yate loi anibi.
Jodi kunba tumikhan ke hude, ‘Kile etu ke khuli ase?’ Tumikhan etu kobi, ‘Probhu ke etu dorkar ase.’”
Aru jun khan ke etu karone pathaise, taikhan pora thik eneka he dikhi paise.
Jitia taikhan etu ghora bacha ke khuli thakise, malik ahikena taikhan ke koise, “Kile etu ghora bacha ke khuli ase?”
Titia taikhan pora koise, “Probhu ke etu dorkar ase.”
Titia taikhan Jisu usorte anise, aru taikhan laga kapra gadha uporte phelai dise aru Jisu ke gadha uporte bohi bole dise.
Aru jitia taikhan jai thakise, manu khan kapra ulaikene rasta te rakhidise.
Jitia Jisu Oliv pahar usorte ahi ponchise, aru chela aru manu khan dhanyavad dibole shuru hoise. Manu khan Jisu laga dangor kaam khan dikhi kene hala kori kene Isor ke mohima dikena
koise, “Dhonyo ase etu raja jun manu Probhu laga naam te ahise! Sorgote shanti hobo aru sob untcha jagate mohima dibo!”
Kintu kunba Pharisee manu khan majot pora koise, “Shika manu, Apuni laga chela khan ke chup thaki bole kobi.”
Titia Jisu koise, “Moi tumikhan ke koi ase jodi taikhan chup thake, pathor khan pora he hala kori jabo.”
Aru jitia Jisu Jerusalem sheher usorte ponchise, Tai kandise,
aru koise, “Aji tumikhan pora kineka shanti ahe etu jani thakile! Kintu tumikhan laga suku pora lukaikene ase.
Tumikhan uporte eneka din khan ahibo jitia dushman khan pora tumikhan ke sob phale pora dhori rakhibo aru dewar bonai kene tumikhan ke sob kinar pora dabai dibo.
Tumi aru tumi laga bacha khan ke matite girai dibo. Taikhan ekta pathor bhi tumikhan uporte nacharibo, kelemane etu laga homoi te ki dikhai dise, etu tumikhan janibole para nai.”
Jitia Jisu mondoli bhitor te ghusi se, Tai bhitor te bajar kori thaka manu khan ke khedai se,
Taikhan ke koise, “Etu Isor kotha te likha ase, ‘Moi laga ghor to prathana laga ghor hobo,’ kintu tumikhan chor laga ghor bonai dise.”
Aru Jisu mondoli te sikhai thakise. Etu homoi te mukhyo purohit khan aru niyom likha khan aru Pharisee khan Jisu ke mora bole rukhi thakise,
kintu kineka pora Taike dhoribo etu taikhan koribo para nai, kelemane sob manu Jisu laga kotha to huni kene bohi thakise.
Ek din jitia Jisu ekta jagate manu khan ke mondoli te sikhai thakise aru susamachar prochar kori thakise, mukhyo purohit khan aru niyom jana manu aru cholawta khan Tai logot ahise.
Taikhan pora Taike eneka hudise, “Amikhan ke kobi ki adhikar pora Apuni etu kori ase, aru kun ase jun pora etu kori bole Apuni ke adhikar dise.”
Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Moi bhi tumikhan ke ekta kotha hudibo, aru tumikhan Moike kobi.
John laga baptizma: Isor pora hoise na manu pora hoise?”
Taikhan ekjon-ekjon logote kotha patikena, koise, “Jodi moi khan koi, ‘Isor pora ase,’ Tai kobo, ‘Tenehoile tumikhan taike kele biswas kora nai?’
Kintu amikhan jodi koi, ‘Manu pora ase’ koile, sob manu amikhan ke pathor maribo, kele koile taikhan John to ekjon bhabobadi ase koi kene biswas kore.”
Taikhan Jisu ke koise etu kot pora ahise taikhan najane koi kene.
Titia Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Moi bhi tumikhan ke nokobo ki adhikar pora Moi eitu khan kori ase.”
Titia Tai manu khan ke etu dristanto koise, “Ekjon manu kheti te angur ghas hali se, aru tai etu kheti kora manu khan ke di dise, aru tai dusra desh te bisi din nimite jai jaise.
Aru jitia homoi ahise tai ekjon noukar ke kheti kora khan logot pathaise, kheti te angur ulaikene thakile, tai nimite pothabole. Kintu kheti kora manu khan etu noukar ke marise aru khali hath pathai dise.
Aru dusra manu ke pathaise, kintu taike bhi marise aru bisi sorom khilai dise, aru taike khali hath pathai dise.
Titia aru ekjon ke pathaise, kintu taike bhi jokhom kori kene bahar te phelai dise.
Titia kheti laga malik pora nijorke koise, ‘Moi ki koribo? Moi bisi morom kori thaka bacha ke pathai dibo. Eneka korile taikhan taike adar koribo pare.’
Kintu jitia kheti kora manu khan pora taike dikhise, taikhan ekjon-ekjon logote kotha patise, aru koise, ‘Etu uttoradhikari ase. Ahibi taike morai dibo, titia etu sob kheti to moi khan laga hoi jabo.’
Aru taikhan pora chokra ke kheti pora bahar te phelai dise aru taike morai dise. Titia hoile kheti laga malik pora taikhan ke ki koribo?
Kheti malik to ahi kene etu kheti kora manu khan ke khotom kori dibo aru etu kheti to dusra manu khan ke di dibo.” Kintu jitia manu khan etu hunise, taikhan koise, “Eneka kitia bhi hobo nadibo!”
Titia Jisu taikhan ke saikene koise, “Tinehoile Isor kotha te etu likhi kene rakha to ki ase: ‘Juntu pathor ghor bona manu khan pora phelai dise, etu pathor he ghor ke khara kori kene rakha pathor hoi jaise’?
Jun manu etu pathor te giribo, tai bhangi kene tukra hoi jabo. Kintu jun manu uporte etu gire, taike mihin kori dibo.”
Titia niyom likha aru mukhyo purohit khan etu homoi te Tai uporte hath laga bole bisarise, kelemane taikhan jani jaise Jisu to etu dristanto taikhan nimite he koise. Kintu taikhan manu khan ke bhoi kori thakise.
Etu karone Taike taikhan bhal kori kene sai thakise, aru Tai pichete manu lagai dise, jun dharmik thaka nisena dikhai thakise kintu Jisu laga kotha khan te golti bisari thakise, aru taikhan laga cholawta khan laga aru governor laga hathte di dibole karone.
Titia, Yehudi cholauta khan pora manu potha khan to ahi kene Jisu ke hudise, “Probhu, moi khan jane Apuni hosa kotha he sikhai, aru kun logote bhi alag pora bebohar nakore, aru Apuni Isor laga kotha to hosa pora sikhai.
Moi khan ke koi dibi, Caesar ke poisa diya to niyom te thik ase na nai?”
Kintu Jisu taikhan laga chalaki jani jaise, aru taikhan ke koise,
“Moike etu denarius dikha bhi. Kun laga chehera aru kotha ta te likha ase?” Titia taikhan koise, “Caesar laga.”
Titia Tai koise, “Etu nimite ji to Caesar laga ase etu Caesar ke dibi aru ji to Isor ke dibo lage etu Isor ke dibi.”
Etu kotha pora taikhan Jisu ke manu majot pora dhori bole para nai, kintu Jisu laga jowab te sob asurit hoi thakise, aru taikhan chup-chap hoi jaise.
Titia kunba Sadducee khan, kunkhan jun jee utha te biswas nakore, Jisu usorte ahikena hudise,
“Probhu, Moses pora moi khan ke likhise, jodi kunba laga bhai ase aru tai maiki chari kene mori jaise, aru tai bacha nai, tenehoile etu morija laga bhai to maiki ke lobo pare aru tai laga morija bhai naam te bacha jonom kori kene khandan ulabo pare.
Ta te sat-ta bhai thakise, aru dangor wala pora maiki ke shadi korise, kintu bacha nathakikena mori jaise;
aru dusra pora etu maiki ke loise kintu tai bhi bacha nathaki kene mori jaise.
Aru tisra jon pora bhi maiki ke loise, kintu tai bhi eneka he mori jaise, aru etu nisena sath jon bhi maiki ke loise, kintu tai bhi bacha nathaki kene mori jaise.
Aru hekh te maiki bhi mori jaise.
Etu nimite jee utha dinte, tai kun laga maiki hobo? Kelemane tai sat jon laga bhi maiki thakise.”
Titia Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Etu yug laga manu khan shadi kore aru shadi koribo nimite di diye.
Hoilebi jun khan etu yug te thaki bole nimite layak hoise, aru mori kene jee uthibo, taikhan to shadi bhi nakore, aru shadi te bhi nadiye;
kelemane taikhan kitia bhi namoribo, taikhan sorgodoth hoi jabo; aru taikhan jinda thaka Isor laga bacha khan ase kobo, kelemane taikhan jee utha laga chokra khan ase.
Aru Moses pora bhi juli thaka ghas pora morija uthai diya dikhai dise, jitia tai Probhu ke Abraham laga Isor, Isaac laga Isor aru Jacob laga Isor matise.
Etiya Tai to mora laga Isor nohoi kintu jinda khan laga ase, kelemane moi khan sob tai logote jinda ase.”
Titia kunba niyom likha khan pora Jisu ke koise, “Probhu, Apuni bhal pora koise.”
Kelemane taikhan aru Taike hudibole himot kora nai.
Titia Jisu pora taikhan ke hudise, “Taikhan kineka kobo pare, Khrista to David laga chokra ase?
David nijor pora Bhajan Geet laga kitab te likhise, Probhu pora moi laga Probhu ke koise, ‘Moi laga dyna hathte bohibi,
Jitia tak moi dushman khan ke tumi laga theng nichete giribole nadiye.’
David tai nijor pora Khrista ke ‘Probhu’ mate, tinehoile Tai kineka tai laga chokra hobo?”
Jitia sob manu khan huni thakise, Jisu pora chela khan ke koise,
“Etu niyom likha khan pora hoshiar thakibi, jun khan lamba kapra te bera bole bisare, aru bajar te sob pora bhal jaga bisare, aru mondoli te sob pora untcha jagate bohi bole bisare, aru kha luwa jagate bhi bhal he bisare.
Bidhowa khan laga ghor khan khotom kori diye aru dikha bole nimite lamba prathana kore. Eitu khan nisena pichete dangor sajai pabo.”
Etiya Jisu uporte saise aru dhuni manu khan pora taikhan laga dhun laga daan khazana te di thaka dikhise.
Aru titia Tai ekjon gorib bidhowa aha dikhise aru tai logot duita poisa thaka ke daan te di dise.
Titia Jisu pora chela khan ke koise, “Hosa pora Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, etu gorib bidhowa he sob pora bisi daan dise.
Jiman manu daan dise taikhan logote bisi thaka hisab te dise. Kintu etu bidhowa, tai logote eku nai, hoilebi tai ki ase etu sob di dise.”
Aru jitia kunba manu khan mondoli laga kotha koi thakise, kineka sundur pathorkhan aru manu khan laga daan pora mondoli ke bonaise, Tai koise,
“Etu tumikhan etiya dikhi thaka to, eneka din ahibo, jitia ekta pathor bhi nabachibo aru juntu ekta uporte ekta ase, etu sobke girai dibo.”
Titia taikhan Taike, koise, “Shika manu, etu sob to kitia hobo, aru eneka din ahibole ase koi kene moi khan kineka janibo?”
Titia Jisu koise, “Hoshiar thakibi aru kun pora bhi tumike thogai dibo nadibi. Bisi manu Moi laga naam loi kene ahibo, aru kobo, ‘Moi Jisu ase,’ aru ‘Homoi to usorte ahise.’ Taikhan laga piche najabi.
Jitia tumikhan lorai aru jhagara laga kotha khan hunibo, bhoi nokoribi, kelemane eitu khan sob poila hobo lagibo, kintu eneka sob hoilebi hekh homoi to eitu khan huwa loge-loge te nahibo.”
Aru Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Ekta desh pora dusra desh bhirodh te uthibo, aru ekta rajyo pora dusra rajyo logote lorai koribo.
Aru dangor mati hili bo, khabole napabo aru alag kisim bemar khan ulabo. Ekdom biya ghatna khan hobo aru etu logot te akash te asurit chihna khan dikhibo.
Kintu eitu khan huwa age te, manu khan pora tumikhan laga uporte hath uthabo aru bisi dukh dibo, tumikhan ke mondoli khan aru bondhi ghor khan te bhi hali dibo, raja khan aru Governor khan usorte anibo moi laga naam luwa nimite.
Eitu khan huwa pora tumikhan gawahi dibole nimite ekta bhal homoi hobo.
Etu nimite nijor mon to shanti rakhibi aru homoi naha age te ki safai dibo lagibo etu nimite chinta nokoribi,
kintu Moi tumikhan ke kotha kobole aru gyaan dibo, aru ta te tumikhan usorte kun ahibo taikhan tumi laga kotha mana kori bole na paribo.
Kintu tumikhan laga nijor ama baba pora tumike chari dibo, aru bhai khan, aru ghor manu khan, sathi khan bhi chari dibo, aru kunba ke to taikhan morai dibo.
Moi laga naam nimite tumikhan ke sob manu pora ghin koribo.
Kintu tumi laga matha te thaka ekta chuli bhi naharabo.
Kintu tumikhan nomro aru biswas te thakile tumikhan laga atma labh lobo.
Kintu jitia Jerusalem ke sipahi khan pora gherikena thaka dikhibo, titia jani lobo, khotom hobole homoi to ahise.
Aru Judea te thaka khan pahar te polai jabi, etu jaga majote thakile chari kene jai jabi, aru jun manu etu desh bhitor te nai taikhan ke gushi bole nadibi.
Etu din to niyai kora laga homoi ase, aru Isor kotha te ki likha ase etu pora hobole nimite.
Kintu hai ase jun khan bacha bukhi ase, aru jun bacha khan ke sai ase! Etu jagate dangor dukh ahibole ase, aru manu khan uporte Isor laga khong ahibole ase.
Kunba to nijor talwar laga dhar pora giri jabo, aru dusra desh te taikhan ke dhori kene loijabo, aru Jerusalem to Porjati khan pora raj chola bo jitia tak Porjati khan laga homoi pura nohoi.
Aru chihna khan to suryo, chand aru tara khan ke dikhibo, aru prithibi te thaka desh khan sob samundar laga pani bisi hili thaka nisena dangor chinta hobo.
Etu duniya te ki ahibole ase eitu khan bhabikena bhoi pora manu khan behosh hoi jabo, kelemane sorgo laga takot sobke hilai dibo.
Titia sob manu khan Manu laga Putro badal te hokti thaka aru dangor mohima pora loi kene ahi thaka dikhibo.
Jitia etu sob hoi thakibo, khara koribi aru matha to uporte uthai lobi, kelemane tumike bachai lobole usor hoise.”
Titia Tai taikhan ke ekta dristanto koise: “Sabi etu dimoru ghas ke, aru sob ghas khan ke.
Jitia ghas te phul ulai jai, tumikhan dikhi kene nijor pora jani jai gorom din ahi ase.
Etu nisena, jitia tumikhan etu sob hoi thaka dikhibo, titia tumikhan jani lobi Isor laga rajyo usorte ahise.
Hosa pora Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, etiya laga manu khan khotom hoi najabo jitia tak etu sob pura nohoi.
Sorgo aru prithibi harai jabo, kintu Moi laga kotha ki koise etu kitia bhi naharabo.
Nijorke bhal kori kene rakhibi, nisa pani khai kene tumikhan laga mon ke bhari kori bole nadibi, aru jibon laga kiman chinta bhabona ase etu pora mon dukh nokorile, kelemane etu din achanak pora ahibo aru tumike dhuri lobo.
Ekta jal phela nisena, jiman manu duniya te thaki ase taikhan uporte ahibo.
Kintu sob homoi te hoshiar thakibi, prathana te takot koribi etu sob ki hobole ase eitu khan pora polabole paribo nimite, aru Manu laga Putro usorte khara kori bole paribo nimite.”
Aru etu din khan te Tai mondoli te sikhai thakise, aru rati te Tai Olivet pahar uporte jai kene thakise.
Aru bisi phojurte manu khan Jisu laga kotha huni bole mondoli te punchise.
Etiya Khomir Nokhuwa Roti laga Purbb dinte, juntu ke Nistar din eneka mate, etu din usor hoise.
Mukhyo purohit khan aru niyom likha khan Jisu ke kineka morai dibole etu laga upai bisari thakise, kele koile taikhan manu khan ke bhoi lagi thakise.
Titia Saitan pora Judas bhitor te ghusi jaise, jun laga naam Iscariot bhi asele, tai bhi chela bhitor te ekjon thakise.
Etu pichete Judas jai kene mukhyo purohit khan aru henedhikari khan logote kineka kori kene Jisu ke dhoribo etu upai bisarise.
Taikhan khushi paise, aru taike poisa dibole nimite kotha milaise.
Aru etu kori bole Judas mani loise, aru Jisu ke kineka pora manu nathaka homoi te dhoribo etu upai bisari thakise.
Aru khomir nadiya roti kha laga din ahise, etu dinte Nistar laga mer ke bolidan kori bole niyom ase.
Jisu pora Peter aru John duijon ke pathai kene koise, “Jaikena amikhan nimite Nistar naam pora kha luwa rakhibi, amikhan mili kene khabo.”
Taikhan pora Taike koise, “Probhu kun jagate jai kene amikhan taiyar koribo?”
Tai pora koise, “Sabi, jitia tumikhan sheher te ponchibo, ekjon manu pani laga baltin loi kene thaka lok pabo. Tai laga piche jabi jun to ghor te tai ghuse.
Titia ghor laga malik ke jai kene kobi, ‘Shika manu pora apuni ke koi ase, “Bahar manu thaki bole laga kamra to kot ase, jun jagate Moi laga chela khan ke loi kene Nistar naam laga khana koribo?’”
Titia tai tumikhan ke uporte loijai kene dangor ekta bhal kamra dikha bo. Jaikena ta te he taiyari koribi.”
Aru taikhan jai kene Jisu kineka koise eneka he paise. Titia taikhan Nistar laga kha luwa jai kene taiyar korise.
Aru jitia Nistar laga khana khabole homoi ahise, Jisu bohi jaise aru Tai laga apostle khan bhi bohi jaise.
Titia Tai koise, “Moi dukh napa age te tumikhan logote bohi kene etu Nistar laga khana khabole mon thakise.
Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, Moi etu nakhabo jitia tak etu sob Isor laga rajyote pura nohoi.”
Titia Jisu kup to loise, aru dhanyavad dikena koise, “Etu lobi, aru ekjon-ekjon logote bhag kori lobi.
Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, etiya pora Isor laga rajyo naha tak, Moi etu angur ros laga pani napibo.”
Jitia Tai roti to loise aru Isor ke dhanyavad dise, Tai bhag kori kene taikhan ke dise aru koise, “Etu Moi laga gaw ase juntu tumikhan karone dise. Moike yaad kori bole eneka koribi.”
Tai kup to loi kene koise, “Etu kup to Moi laga khun te notun niyom bonai ase, juntu tumikhan nimite bohi ulai ase.
Kintu sabi, kun manu Moike dhoka dibole ase, tai bhi amikhan logote bohi ase.
Manu laga Putro ke ki hobole ase etu sob to Isor pora poila te he likhi kene ase. Kintu O jun manu pora Taike thogabole ase, tai hai paise!”
Chela khan majote hudi thakise amikhan majote kun pora eneka kaam koribo.
Pichete chela khan majot jhagara ulaise kun he taikhan majote sob pora dangor hobo laga kotha te.
Titia Tai koise, “Porjati laga rajakhan pora taikhan ke raj kore, aru taikhan uporte adhikari chola khan ke ‘bhal kori diya khan’ eneka mate.
Kintu tumikhan eneka nakoribo lage. Tumikhan majote kun manu dangor bhabi thake tai sob pora chutu hobo lage; aru jun manu age te ase, tai to ekjon sewa kori thaka manu nisena hobo lage.
Kintu bhabi sabi kun he dangor ase, khabole boha manu na sewa kora manu? Kun khabole bohi ase tai nohoi? Kintu Moi tumikhan majote ekjon noukar nisena ase.
Kintu tumikhan Moi laga porikha te Moi logote ase.
Moi tumikhan ke di ase jineka Ami laga, Baba pora Moike ekta rajyo dise,
etu nisena tumikhan bhi Moi laga rajyote kha luwa koribo, aru tumikhan singhason te bohi kene Israel laga baroh jati uporte bisar koribo.
Aru Jisu pora koise, “Simon, Simon, sabi Saitan he tumike gehu dana nisena chani loise.
Kintu Moi tumi nimite prathana korise, etu pora tumi laga biswas to naharabo; aru tumi, jitia ghurai ahibo, tumi laga biswasi bhai khan ke mojbut koribi.”
Kintu Peter koise, “Probhu, moi Apuni logot jabole taiyar ase, bondhi ghor te bhi aru mori bole bhi.”
Kintu Tai koise, “Moi hosa koise, Peter, murgi hala nakora age te tumi Moike najane koi kene tin bar misa kobo.”
Jisu pora chela khan ke koise, “Jitia Moi tumikhan ke poisa laga jola, dorkar laga saman, aru juta noloikena jabole dise, titia kiba napuncha thakise naki?” Taikhan koise, “Eku komti huwa nai.”
Titia Tai pora taikhan ke koise, “Kintu etiya, kun manu poisa laga jola ase tai loi lobi, aru etu nisena, ki saman laga jola ase, tai loi lobi, aru kun manu logote talwar nai tai nijor kapra bikiri kori kene kini lobi.
Moi tumikhan ke koi ase, ji kotha Moi nimite Isor kotha te likha ase etu pura hobo lagibo, ‘aru Taike niyom nathaka khan logote ginti kori dise.’ Kelemane ji kotha moi nimite koise etu sob pura hoi ase.”
Aru taikhan koise, “Probhu, sabi! Yate duita talwar ase.” Etu nimite Tai taikhan ke koise, “Etu kafi ase.”
Aru bahar te ulaikene, adat pora kori thaka nisena, Tai Oliv Pahar te jaise, aru chela khan bhi tai laga pichete jaise.
Jitia taikhan ekta jagate ahise, Tai pora taikhan ke koise, “Prathana koribi tumikhan porikha te nagiribo karone.”
Titia taikhan pora olop dur te jai kene, Tai matite athukari kene prathana korise,
aru koise, “Baba, jodi Apuni itcha kore, etu dukh laga kup to Moi pora hatai dibi. Kintu Ami laga itcha nohoi, Apuni laga itcha hobole dibi.”
Titia sorgodoth khan ahikena Jisu ke modot korise.
Tai dukh pora prathana kora homoi te Tai laga posina khun hoi kene matite giri thakise.
Aru Jitia Tai prathana kori kene uthise, Tai laga chela khan usorte jaise, aru taikhan mon dukh pora ghumai thaka dikhise,
etu nimite Tai pora taikhan ke koise, “Tumikhan kele ghumai ase? Uthibi aru prathana koribi, etu pora tumikhan porikha te nagiribo.”
Aru jitia Tai kotha koi thakise, ta te bisi manu ahi jaise, aru jun laga naam Judas thakise, baroh jon chela majot ekjon, tai age kori kene manu khan ke loi anise. Tai Jisu usorte chuma dibole ahise.
Kintu Jisu taike koise, “Tumi Manu laga Putro ke chuma dikene thogai ase?”
Aru jiman chela khan Jisu usorte khara asele, taikhan ki hobole ase jani jai kene Jisu ke koise, “Probhu, amikhan talwar ulaikene taikhan logote lorai koribo naki?”
Titia maha purohit laga noukar ke chela ekjon pora dyna kan to kati phelai dise.
Kintu Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Eneka nokoribi!” Aru Jisu he kan wapas lagaikena changai kori dise.
Aru Taike dhori bole aha manu khan, mukhyo purohitkhan, aru mondoli laga henedhikari khan aru cholawta khan ke Tai koise, “Tumikhan talwar aru hathiar khan loi kene ekjon chor manu ke dhura nisena ahise naki?
Moi jitia mondoli te hodai din tumikhan logote thakise, tumikhan moi uporte hath utha nai. Kintu etiya homoi tumikhan laga ase, aru andhar laga hokti ase.”
Aru taikhan Jisu Khrista ke dhurikena maha purohit laga ghor bhirorte loi jaise. Aru Peter bhi taikhan laga pichete jai thakise.
Etu pichete taikhan ghor bahar te jui jolai kene eke logote bohise, aru Peter bhi taikhan logot bohi thakise.
Aru ekjon mahila noukar, Peter ke jui usorte bohi thaka dikhi kene koise, “Etu manu bhi Jisu logote thakise.”
Kintu Peter koise nohoi, “Mahila, moi Taike najane.”
Aru olop pichete ekjon pora taike dikhise, aru koise, “Tumi bhi Jisu logote beraise.” Kintu Peter koise, “Bhai moi nohoi.”
Ek ghanta pichete aru ekjon ahikena koise, “Hosa pora, etu manu bhi Tai logote thakise, tai bhi ekjon Galilee laga manu ase.”
Kintu Peter koise, “Bhai, moi najane tumi ki kotha koi ase.” Etu kotha koi thaka homoi te, ekta murga hala korise.
Titia Jisu ghuri kene Peter ke saise, aru titia Peter Jisu kowa kotha to monte ahise, jitia Jisu koisele, “Tumi tin bar Moike ashikar kobo aru titia murga hala koribo.”
Titia Peter bahar te jai kene tai laga mon tita hoi kene bisi kandise.
Aru titia sipahi khan Jisu ke biya kotha koi kene mari bole shuru hoise.
Taikhan Jisu laga suku te kapra bandi kene, koise, “Bhabobani koribi! Kun pora tumike marise koi sabi?”
Aru taikhan bisi bodnam aru biya kotha kori kene Jisu ke sorom khilai se.
Aru jitia din hoise, bura manu khan ahi kene joma hoise, aru mukhyo purohit khan aru niyom likha khan, aru Jisu ke sabha te loi jaise,
aru koise, “Jodi tumi Khrista hoi, amikhan ke kobi.” Kintu Tai koise, “Jodi Moi tumikhan ke koi, tumikhan kitia bhi biswas nokorile;
aru Moi tumikhan ke hudile, tumikhan kitia bhi Moike jowab dibole na paribo.
Kintu etiya pora Manu laga Putro ke Isor laga dyna hathte bohi thaka dikhibo.”
Titia taikhan koise, “Etu karone, tumi Isor laga Putro hoi naki?” Aru Tai koise, “Tumikhan he koi ase, Moi nohoi.”
Taikhan apaste koi thakise, “Amikhan etu kotha age te aru ki janibole gawahi lagi ase? Amikhan tai laga nijor mukh pora etu kotha huni loise.”
Titia sob manu uthi kene Jisu ke Pilate laga age te anise.
Aru taikhan shuru hoise, aru koise, “Etu manu desh ke biya kori ase, aru Caesar ke saman dibole mana kore, aru tai nijorke Khrista, ekjon raja ase koi.”
Titia Pilate pora Jisu ke hudise, “Tumi Yehudi manu laga Raja ase naki?” Kintu Tai jawab dise, “Tumi nijor etu koi ase.”
Titia Pilate pora mukhyo purohit khan aru manu khan ke koise, “Moi etu manu uporte eku golti nadikhe.”
Kintu taikhan etu mana nai aru, koise, “Tai manu khan ke loi kene pura Judea te sikhai kene berai thake, Galilee pora shuru kori kene yate Jerusalem te bhi sikhai.”
Aru jitia Pilate etu hunise, titia tai hudise Jisu to Galilee laga ase naki koi kene.
Jitia tai janise Jisu uporte niyom chola bo nimite Herod laga hathte he adhikar ase, tai Herod usorte Taike pathai dise, Herod tai nijor bhi Jerusalem te thakise.
Aru jitia Herod pora Jisu ke dikhise, tai bisi khushi paise, kelemane tai Jisu ke bisi din pora sabole mon thakise, aru tai Jisu pora kiba ekta asurit chihna kora to sabole mon thakise.
Titia Herod pora Jisu ke bisi kotha hudise, kintu Tai eku jowab diya nai.
Titia mukhyo purohit khan aru niyom likha khan age te khara hoise, aru Taike biya bebohar kori kene sorom khilai se.
Titia Herod aru tai laga sipahi khan bhi milikena Jisu ke bisi ninda korise aru sorom khilai se. Taike raja laga bhal kapra lagai dise, aru Pilate usorte wapas pathai dise.
Thik etu dinte Pilate aru Herod bhal sathi hoi jaise, kintu olop din age te tai duijon bhitor te kotha namila thakisele.
Titia Pilate pora mukhyo purohit khan, cholawta khan aru niyom likha khan ke matise,
aru taikhan ke koise, “Tumikhan etu manu ke moi logote anise aru koise tai pora manu khan ke phuslai ase, aru tumikhan usorte Ami taike hudise, kintu tumikhan Tai uporte ki arop lagai ase, moi etu manu uporte eku biya dikha nai.
Aru Herod bhi Tai uporte eku golti dikha nai, etu karone tai bhi Jisu ke amikhan logote pathai dise, aru sabi, taike mora laga sajai dibole nimite eneka eku kaam kora nai.
Etu nimite moi taike sajai dibo, aru chari dibo.”
Kelemane Jerusalem te jitia dangor utsov hoi, niyom pora duijon bhitor te ekjon bondhi ghor te thaka manu ke chari bole lage.
Kintu taikhan sob hala kori kene koise, “Etu, manu ke sajai dibi aru bodli te Barabbas ke chari dibi!”
-Barabbas ke bondhi ghor te rakhise kelemane tai manu ke morai disele aru sheher te jhagara ulabole dise.-
Aru Pilate pora manu khan ke aru kotha koise, tai Jisu ke chari bole mon thakise.
Kintu taikhan aru bhi hala kori kene koise, “Cross te morai dibi, Cross te morai dibi.”
Pilate pora tin bar taikhan logote koise, “Kile, etu manu pora ki biya kaam korise? Moi Tai uporte eku golti dikha nai juntu pora Taike morai dibo lagise. Etu karone Taike sajai dikena chari dibo.”
Taikhan sob awaj uthaikene khong pora mangise, aru jor pora hala kori thakise Jisu ke Cross te morabo lage koi kene.
Etu pichete Pilate taikhan laga kotha mani loise.
Barabbas ke bondhi ghor pora ajad kori dise, jun manu ke morai diya aru biya kaam kora ekjon dokait thakise. Kintu Jisu ke taikhan hathte di dise.
Aru Pilate laga ghor pora manu khan Jisu ke bahar te loi jaise, aru ekjon manu Simon, Cyrene sheher pora aha ke dhurikena, tai uporte Cross dikena Jisu pichete te jabo dise.
Etu homoi te, bhir te manu khan aru maiki khan bisi mon dukh pora Tai usorte kandi thakise, aru Tai laga piche kori thakise.
Jisu pora ghurikena taikhan ke koise, “Jerusalem laga mahila khan, Moi nimite nakandibi, kintu tumikhan nijor nimite aru bacha khan nimite kandibi.
Kelemane sabi, eneka din ase jitia taikhan kobo,’ ‘Dhonyo ase bacha nathaka mahila khan aru jun laga pet pora bacha jonom huwa nai, aru dudh khila nai.
Aru taikhan pahar ke kobo, ‘Amikhan uporte giri bhi,’ aru pahar khan girikena ‘amikhan ke bondh kori dibi.’
Jodi ghas pata khan hara thaka homoi te eneka kore, tenehoile ghas sukhi ja-a somoite ki halat hobo?”
Aru duijon dokait ke Jisu logote loijai kene Cross te morai dise.
Jitia etu jagate ponchise, etu jaga laga naam to “Matha laga Hardi,” mate, taikhan ta te Jisu ke Cross te mari dise, aru duijon dokait ke bhi Jisu laga dyna aru baya phale Cross te mari dise.
Titia Jisu koise, “Baba, taikhan ke maph kori dibi, taikhan ki korise etu taikhan najane.” Pichete taikhan Jisu laga kapra to chithi kheli kene bhag korise.
Sob manu rukhi kene sai thakise. Aru titia cholawta manu khan Jisu ke sorom khilai kene koise, “Tai dusra ke bachaise. Etiya nijorke bachai lobi, jodi Tai Isor laga Khrista, basi luwa jon to ase koile.”
Sipahi khan bhi Jisu ke sorom khilai se, aru tita pani dise,
aru koise, “Apuni jodi Yehudi khan laga raja ase koile, nijorke bachai lobi.”
Tai uporte ekta kotha likhi dise, “Jisu Yehudi khan laga Raja.”
Titia ekjon dokait Jisu usorte Cross te thaka pora sorom khilai se Jisu ke koise, “Tumi Khrista nohoi naki? Tumi nijorke bachai lobi aru amikhan ke bhi bachai lobi.”
Kintu dusra ekjon pora tai laga sathi ke koise, “Tumi Isor ke bhoi nalage naki, amikhan biya kaam kora nimite nijor sajai pai ase?
Aru etu amikhan pabo lage, amikhan ki biya kaam korise etu hisab te he sajai pai ase. Kintu etu manu eku golti kora nai.”
Titia tai koise, “Jisu, moike yaad koribi jitia Apuni Paradise te jabo.”
Titia Jisu taike koise, “Moi hosa koise, tumi aji Ami logote Paradise te thakibo.”
Kintu baroh baji homoi te, achanak etu sob jagate andhera ahi jaise.
Suryo andhar hoi jaise aru Jerusalem mondoli laga purdah phati jaise.
Etu pichete jor pora awaj ulaikena Jisu koise, “Baba Apuni laga hathte Moi laga Atma di ase.” Etu koi kene Tai laga saas to chari dise.
Aru jitia henedhikari pora etu dikhise, tai Isor ke mohima dise, aru koise, “Hosa pora Tai ekjon dharmik manu thakise.”
Jiman bhir etu sabole ahise, taikhan ki hoise etu dikhise, aru bisi mon dukh hoi kene nijor chati te marikena jai jaise.
Kintu jun manu Taike bhal pora jane, aru jiman mahila khan Galilee pora Tai logot ahise taikhan dur pora ki hoi ase etu sai thakise.
Etu homoi te ekjon manu Joseph koi kene jun sabha te ekjon hisa thaka manu asele aru tai bhal aru dharmik manu asele.
-Tai sabha laga dusra manu khan logote kotha mila nai.- Tai Arimathea sheher laga Yehudi manu thakise, aru tai bhi Isor laga rajyo ahibole nimite rukhi thakise.
Tai Pilate, usorte jai kene Jisu laga gaw mangise.
Aru tai Cross pora gaw namaise, aru sapha mihin kapra pora Jisu laga gaw to bandi dise, aru pathor katikena kobor bonai rakha jagate Jisu ke rakhise, jun jagate kitia bhi manu ke rakha nai.
Titia Jugut Din punchise, aru Bisram din shuru hobole asele.
Aru Galilee pora jiman khan Jisu piche kori thakise, taikhan jai kene kobor ke saise jun jagate Jisu laga gaw rakhise.
Aru mahila khan wapas jai kene mitha sugandh tel aru dawai khan Jisu laga gaw te laga bole nimite jugut korise. Aru taikhan niyom hisab te Bisram din to pobitro rakhikena aram korise.
Etiya hapta laga poila din te, etu mahila khan kobor usorte ahise, mitha sugandh tel aru dawai jugut kori kene anise.
Kintu taikhan dikhise kobor bondh kori kene rakha pathor to hataikena ase,
kintu taikhan bhitor te jai kene Probhu Jisu laga gaw to dikha nai.
Aru eneka hoise, jitia kobor te Jisu laga gaw dikha nai, taikhan asurit hoise. Aru achanak pora, duijon manu boga kapra lagai kene taikhan usorte khara hoise.
Aru, mahila khan bhoi lagikena matha niche kori kene matite girise, etu manu khan pora mahila khan ke hudise, “Tumikhan jinda manu ke mora khan majote kele bisari ase?
Tai yate nai, kintu jinda hoise! Yaad koribi kineka Tai tumikhan ke koisele Galilee te thaka homoi te,
koisele Manu laga Putro kineka paapi manu hathte di dibo aru Taike Cross te morai dibo, aru tin dinte Tai aru bhi jinda hoi jabo.”
Titia mahila khan Jisu laga kotha monte yaad ahise,
aru jitia kobor pora wapas jaise, taikhan jai kene egaroh jon chela aru sob manu khan ke khobor di dise.
Aru Mary Magdalene, Joanna, aru Mary James laga ama aru mahila khan jai kene chela khan ke khobor di dise.
Kintu etu khobor to chela khan misa bhabise, aru mahila khan kowa kotha to biswas kora nai.
Hoile bhi Peter to uthi kene, Jisu laga kobor te polaikene jaise, aru usor pora saise aru khali Jisu ke bandi rakha mihin kapra he dikhise. Aru tai bahar te ulaikena ki hoise etu bhabise.
Aru ek din, duijon manu ekta bosti te jai thakise. Jerusalem pora sath mil dur thaka Emmaus bosti te.
Etu din khan te ki hoise eitu khan sob laga kotha khan koi kene jai thakise.
Aru eneka hoise, taikhan kotha patikena jai thaka homoi te, Jisu taikhan usorte achanak pora ahi kene taikhan eke logote jai thakise.
Kintu taikhan suku pora Jisu ke chini bole para nai.
Titia Jisu taikhan ke hudise, “Tumikhan ki kotha patikena mon dukh pora jai ase?” Taikhan khara hoi jaise, mon dukh pora.
Kintu ekjon Cleopas pora Jisu ke hudise, “Apuni Jerusalem te ekla ahise naki aru ki hoise etu najane?”
Titia Jisu taikhan ke hudise, “Yate ki hoise?” Taikhan koise, “Nazareth Jisu laga kotha, kun ekjon manu thakise, aru asurit kaam aru kotha para Isor usorte aru sob manu nimite Tai ekjon dangor bhabobadi thakise,
Aru mukhyo purohit khan aru cholawta khan pora Taike dhorise aru bodnam kori kene Cross te morai dise.
Kintu moi khan biswas kori thakise Tai he Israel manu ke mukti dibo. Kintu etu sob pura hoi kene, aji tin din hoi jaise.
Kintu kunba mahila khan kobor te joldi jai kene, amikhan ke ahi kene asurit kotha koise.
Aru taikhan Jisu laga gaw to kobor bhitor te dikha nai, taikhan sorgodoth khan ke darshan korise koise aru Jisu jinda ase koise.
Kintu amikhan logote thaka kunba kobor sabole jaise aru jineka mahila khan pora koise eneka he dikhise, kintu Jisu ke ta te dikha nai.”
Titia Jisu taikhan ke koise, “O murkho aru mon chutu kori thaka khan jun khan bhabobadi khan pora ki koise etu sobke biswas kore!
Etu dorkar thaka nai naki Khrista dukh paikena, aru bhi Isor laga mohima te huma bole?”
Moses pora suru kori kene aru kiman bhabobadi khan thakise, taikhan ke ki pobitro kotha te Tai nimite likha ase etu bujhi bole dise.
Taikhan jabole thaka bosti te ponchise, aru Jisu age te jabo nisena korise.
