Aru etiya Taike, kun pora he apnikhan biswas te mojbut hoi kene khara kori dibo pare, Jisu Khrista laga susamachar moi prochar kora, Kun to bisi yug nimite lukai thakise, kintu etiya etu hosa kotha to janai dise,
Etiya etu hosa kotha to khuli dise aru bhabobadi khan pora likha dwara, anonto Isor laga hukum pora jati sobke jonai dise, titia he sob manu biswas kori kene kotha mani lobo.
Etiya buddhiman Isor ke, Jisu Khrista dwara hodai nimite mohima hobi. Amen.
Paul, Khrista Jisu pora Tai laga apostle hobole nimite junke Isor laga itcha pora he basi loise, aru amikhan laga bhai Sosthenes, duijon pora,
Corinth sheher te thaka Isor laga girja te, jun khan ke Khrista Jisu logot pobitro kori loise, jun khan ke pobitro hobo nimite matise, aru sob jagate thaka jun Khrista Jisu amikhan sob laga Probhu laga naam ke biswas kori loise.
Amikhan laga Baba Isor, aru Probhu Jisu Khrista laga naam pora anugrah aru shanti apnikhan uporte thakibo dibi.
Moi hodai apnikhan nimite ami laga Isor ke dhanyavad diye, kelemane Isor laga anugrah to apnikhan uporte Jisu Khrista dwara dise.
Kilekoile sob te apnikhan ke Khrista pora dhuni bonai dise, sob kotha aru sob gyaan te,
jineka amikhan pora apnikhan majote Khrista laga gawahi koi disele, etu to hosa hoise koi kene amikhan jani loise.
Etu karone, apuni khan ke atmik bordan sob dikena ase, etu nimite amikhan laga Probhu Jisu Khrista ke dikhai nadiya din tak apnikhan rukhibole pare.
Tai pora apnikhan ke ses din tak takot kori dibo, eneka hoile amikhan laga Probhu Jisu wapas aha dinte apnikhan eku bhi bodnam hoi kene nathakibo.
Isor to hosa ase, jun pora apnikhan ke Tai laga Putro, Jisu Khrista amikhan laga Probhu laga sangoti te joma kori bole matise.
Etiya, moi apnikhan ke utsah kori ase, bhai khan, Probhu Jisu Khrista laga naam te, apnikhan sob mon milai lobi, aru ta te apnikhan majote bhag nahobi, kintu apnikhan eke logote bhabona hobi aru ekta kaam te mili kene thakibi.
Kilekoile bhai khan, Chloe laga kunba manu khan amike koise, apnikhan majote bhag hoi kene ase.
Etiya moi laga motlob etu ase, apnikhan sob ekjon-ekjon he eneka koi ase, “Moi to Paul logot ase,” nohoile bhi “Moi Apollos logot ase,” nohoile bhi, “Moi Cephas logot ase,” nohoile bhi “Moi Khrista logot ase.”
Khrista to alag-alag bhag hoise naki? Apnikhan nimite Paul to Cross te morise naki? Nahoile bhi apnikhan Paul laga naam pora baptizma loise?
Moi Isor ke dhanyavad di ase kelemane moi apnikhan kunke bhi baptizma diya nai, khali Crispus aru Gaius ke nohoile,
titia kun bhi apnike moi laga naam pora baptizma dise nakobo.
Moi bhi Stephanas laga ghor manu khan ke baptizma dise. Kintu etu pora dusra kunba khan ke moi pora baptizma diya to moi yaad nai.
Kilekoile Khrista to amike baptizma kori bole patha nohoi, kintu Tai laga susamachar prochar kori bole- moike Tai laga kotha to chalak kotha pora kobole patha nohoi, eneka hoile Khrista laga Cross te hokti thaka to sob kaam nathaka hoi jabo.
Kilekoile harai ja manu khan nimite Cross laga kotha to eku bhi motlob nai, kintu amikhan junke bachai loise, etu to Isor laga hokti ase.
Kelemane Shastro te eneka likha ase, “Moi pora gyaani manu khan laga gyaan khotom kori dibo, Aru Moi pora buddhi manu khan ke bujhibo napara kori dibo.”
Kote ase gyaani manu? Kot te ase pura-likha manu? Kot te ase etu prithibi laga kotha bisi kora manu khan? Isor pora etu prithibi laga gyaan sob murkho te ulta kori dise nohoi?
Kilekoile Isor laga buddhi te etu prithibi laga buddhi pora Isor ke jana nai, kintu jun manu khan Isor laga murkho kotha prochar kora ke biswas kore, Tai eitu khan ke bacha bole itcha thakise.
Etu nimite Yehudi khan khali Tai laga asurit kaam khan he bisare aru Yunani khan Tai laga buddhi he bisare.
Kintu amikhan Khrista ke Cross te morai diya he prochar kore, etu kotha khan Yehudi khan nimite digdari dise aru Yunani khan nimite murkho kotha ase.
Kintu jun khan ke mati loise, Yehudi aru Yunani khan nimite bhi, Khrista to Isor laga hokti aru buddhiman ase.
Kilekoile Isor laga murkho kotha khan to manu khan pora bhi buddhi ase, aru Isor laga komjur to manu khan pora bhi takot ase.
Bhai khan Isor pora mati luwa to bhabi sabi, kele koile bisi manu khan apnikhan majote mangso hisab te buddhi thaka nai, apnikhan bisi bhak to hokti thaka nai, aru apnikhan bisi bhak to jonom pora untcha khandan pora aha nai.
Kintu Isor pora prithibi laga gyaani khan ke sorom khila bole ki murkho ase eitu khan ke basi loise, eneka hoile gyaani khan ke sorom dibole nimite, aru Isor pora prithibi te komjur thaka jinis khan ke basi loise, eneka pora takot thaka khan ke sorom dibole.
Isor pora juntu sobse niche ase aru kunke etu prithibi pora ghin kore, taikhan ke basi loise, aru kaam nathaka khan ke Isor pora basi loise, etu prithibi te thaka khan ke khotom kori dibo nimite,
eneka hoile kun manu bhi Isor usorte phutani nakoribo.
Kintu Tai nimite, apnikhan Jisu Khrista logote ase, Junke amikhan nimite Isor laga buddhiman bonai dise, ekjon dharmikta aru sapha bhi kori dise aru paap pora bachai loise.
Etu karone, Shastro te eneka likhi kene ase, “Jun manu phutani kori ase, taike Probhu laga naam te he phutani koribo dibi.”
Jitia moi apnikhan logote ahise, bhai khan, moi bisi kotha kobole jana nohoile bhi buddhi kotha khan pora Isor laga lukaikene thaka kotha prochar kori kene aha nohoi.
Kilekoile moi nijor itcha pora apnikhan laga ki hoile bhi janibole mon thaka nai khali Jisu Khrista aru Taike Cross te morai diya laga he nohoile.
Moi apnikhan logote komjur, aru kapi kene bhoi te thakise.
Moi laga kotha khan aru prochar khan buddhi laga kotha pora nohoi, kintu Isor laga Atma aru hokti pora kori kene dikhai dise,
eneka hoile apnikhan laga biswas to mangso laga buddhi te nathakibo, kintu Isor laga hokti te thakibo.
Etiya amikhan buddhi kotha kowa khan to buja manu khan majote kore, kintu etu jamana laga gyaan nohoi, nohoile bhi etu jamana laga cholawta, jun khan etu prithibi chari kene jai ase taikhan laga kotha nohoi.
Hoilebi, amikhan Isor laga buddhiman to bujhi bole napara kotha nisena lukai kene koi, juntu Isor Tai laga kaam nimite amikhan laga prithibi nabona age pora basi kene taiyar kori loise.
Etu jamana laga cholawta khan kun bhi itu gyaan bujhi bole para nai, kele koile jodi taikhan etu bujhi loi, tinehoile taikhan asis laga Probhu ke Cross te mari dibole thaka nai.
Kintu Shastro te eneka likhi kene ase, “Ki suku pora dikha nai, Aru kan pora huni panai, Aru manu khan laga monte jinda huwa nai, Eitu khan sob Isor pora utu khan nimite taiyar kori kene ase jun Taike morom kore.”
Kilekoile Isor pora eitu khan sob Tai laga Atma pora he dikhai dise. Kilekoile Atma to sob bisari loi, Isor laga ekdom bhitor kotha khan bhi.
Kile mane kun pora ekta manu laga bhabona janibole pare, tai laga bhitor te atma thaka ke chari kene? Thik etu nisena, kun manu bhi Isor laga bhabona janibo napare khali Tai laga bhitor te thaka Atma pora he jane.
Kintu amikhan etu prithibi laga atma ke luwa nai, hoile bhi Isor laga Atma jun Tai amikhan ke dise, titia juntu jinis Isor pora amikhan ke eku daam noloikene dise eitu khan ke jani lobo.
Aru amikhan manu laga gyaan pora kotha khan nakoi, Atma pora sikhai diya kotha khan he koi, juntu kotha khan Atma pora amikhan ke koi, etu kotha khan atma te thaka manu khan ke bujhai diye.
Kintu ekjon prithibi manu to Isor laga Atma laga kaam khan lobole na paribo, kele koile eitu khan tai nimite murkho kotha ase, taikhan eitu khan nabuje kelemane taikhan ke bujhai dibole atma to nai.
Kintu jun manu Atma te ase taikhan eitu khan sob bujhi bo pare, hoile bhi jun atma te nai, kintu tai nijorke dusra kun bhi bujhi bole napare.
“Kilekoile kun pora Probhu laga bhabona jane? Kun pora Taike bujhai dibole pare? Kintu amikhan logote Khrista laga bhabona ase.
Bhai khan, moi apnikhan ke atma te thaka manu khan nisena kotha kobole na paribo, kintu mangso te thaka manu nisena kobole lagibo, kele koile apnikhan Khrista te etiya bhi ekta chutu bacha nisena ase.
Moi apnikhan ke dudh he khilai ase, aru tan bhat khila nohoi, kele koile apnikhan chabai kene bhat khabole para nai. Hoi, etiya tak bhi apnikhan etu khabole na paribo.
Kilekoile apnikhan etiya bhi mangso te ase. Apnikhan ekjon-ekjon ke suku juli thake, aru apnikhan khali kotha pora jhagara kori thake. Eneka hoile apnikhan mangso te he ase nohoi, aru dusra manu nisena berai nohoi?
Kunba pora koi, “Moi Paul logote ase,” aru dusra pora koi, “Moi Apollos logote ase,” titia hoile apnikhan mangso itcha te ase nohoi?
Apollos to kun ase? Aru Paul to kun ase? Ami duijon dwara apnikhan biswas te ahise, kintu amikhan to Isor laga noukar khan he ase, aru ami duijon to Isor pora diya kaam he kori ase.
Moi bijon hali se, aru Apollos pora pani hali se, kintu Isor pora he etu ghas ke dangor hobole dise.
Tinehoile, jun bijon hali se aru jun pani hali se etu to dorkar nai, kintu Isor jun pora etu ghas ke dangor hobole dise Tai he dorkar ase.
Etiya, jun bijon hali se aru jun pani hali se etu duijon laga kaam to eke ase, aru duijon bhi taikhan laga kaam hisab te inam pabo.
Kilekoile amikhan Isor laga kaam kora manu ase. Apnikhan to Tai laga kheti kora manu ase, aru Tai laga ghor ase.
Isor laga anugrah hisab te juntu Tai pora amike ekta pucca ghor bona mistiri hobole dise, moi pora ekta bhal ghor bona bole bhetimul dise aru dusra khan to etu uporte he ghor bonai uthaise. Kintu taikhan ke hoshiar pora ghor to uthabole dibi.
Kilekoile juntu bhetimul bonai kene rakhi loise, etu uporte aru notun ekta bhetimul bona bole na paribo, etu to Jisu Khrista ase.
Etiya, jodi kunba manu etu ghor laga asol pathor uporte suna, chandi, daam pathor, khuri, nohoile bhi kher laga ghor khan bonai koile,
sob kisim kaam khan to dikhibo paribo, kele koile etu din laga ujala te sob dikhe, kelemane etu to jui pora he dikhai dibo. Jui nijor pora he eitu khan ke julai kene bhal-biya kaam khan sob janai dibo.
Jun manu laga kaam to jui pora jula nai, tai laga kaam nimite inam pabo;
kintu jun manu laga kaam to jui pora julai diye, tai laga kaam khan sob nuksan hobo, hoile bhi tai to bachi jabo, jineka ekjon manu jui jula pora polaikene bachi jai.
Apnikhan najane naki apnikhan to Isor laga ghor ase aru apnikhan bhitor te Tai laga Atma thake?
Jun manu Isor laga ghor ke biya kori diye, Isor pora etu manu ke khotom kori dibo. Kilekoile Isor laga ghor to pobitro ase, juntu apuni he ase.
Kun bhi nije ke nijor pora nathoka bhi. Jun etu jamana te apuni khan majote nijorke buddhi thaka manu bhabe, taike “murkho” hobole dibi titia tai buddhi thaka manu hoi jabo.
Kilekoile etu prithibi laga buddhiman to Isor nimite murkho ase. Kile mane te Shastro te likhi kene ase, “Tai pora buddhiman khan ke taikhan laga nijor chal te phasai diye,”
Arubi eneka likhi kene ase, “Probhu to buddhiman manu khan laga bhabona khan jane, aru eitu khan sob eku labh nathaka he ase.”
Etu karone, etu prithibi te kunke bhi manu khan karone phutani kori bole nadibo. Kilekoile eitu khan sob apnikhan laga he ase,
Paul hoile bhi, Apollos hoile bhi, Cephas hoile bhi, nohoile etu prithibi, aru jibon hoile bhi, nohoile mora, nohoile etu somoite thaka, nohoile ahibole thaka somoi. Eitu khan sob apnikhan laga he ase,
aru apnikhan to Khrista laga ase, aru Khrista to Isor laga ase.
Manu khan pora apnikhan ke Khrista ke sewa kora manu bhabibo lage, aru manu khan ke Isor laga lukai kene thaka kotha khan bujhai dibole jimedari dikene thaka manu nisena hobo lage.
Etiya, eneka kaam kora manu khan pora ki itcha ase koile, taikhan ke ekta biswas te thik thaka pabo lage.
Kintu apnikhan pora, nohoile etu prithibi laga faisla pora moike bisar kora to moi nimite bisi mamuli kotha ase. Kilekoile moi nijorke nijor pora bhi bisar nakore.
Kile mane ami nijor jani ase ami laga eku golti nai, kintu ami etu jana karone ami nimite kafi nohoi. Hoile bhi Probhu he ekjon ase Jun he amike bisar koribo.
Etu karone Probhu laga chuni luwa somoi naha age te bisar na koribi. Tai pora he andhar laga kaam khan aru mon laga bhabona duita ke bhi ujala te sob dikhai dibo. Etu pichete Isor laga stuti kori bole ekjon-ekjon uporte ahibo.
Etiya, bhai khan, etu kaam khan moi aru Apollos pora apnikhan nimite he kori kene ahise, eneka hoile amikhan pora he apnikhan sikhi jabo: “Ji likha ase, khali etu te he thakibi,” Titia hoile he ekjon pora ekjon ke dangor-chutu ase koi kene nasabo.
Kilekoile apnikhan ke kun pora dangor bonai? Apnikhan logote ki ase juntu apnikhan ke diya nohoi? Tinehoile apnikhan ke sob diya ase koile, kele apnikhan to nijor pora paise koi kene phutani kore?
Etiya pora he apnikhan sob ase koi kene khushi ase! Etiya pora he apnikhan nijorke dhuni ase bhabi ase! Apnikhan amikhan ke chari kene nijor he raj koribo bhabi ase, aru ami laga itcha to apuni hosa pora bhi raj korile bhal, eneka hoile he amikhan bhi apuni logote raj koribo.
Kile mane moi hisab te Isor pora apostle khan ke sob pora pichete rakhise, jineka mora laga sajai diya nisena. Kilekoile amikhan to etu prithibi pora sabole jinis ekta nisena hoi jaise- sorgodoth aru manu khan duijon ke bhi.
Amikhan Khrista karone murkho ase, kintu apnikhan to Khrista te gyaani ase. Amikhan to komjur ase, kintu apnikhan takot ase. Apnikhan to sonman pai, kintu amikhan to sonman napai.
Etiya laga somoi tak bhi amikhan sob pyaas aru bhuk lagi ase, aru amikhan ekdom biya kapra lagaikena ase, aru amikhan ke biya pora marise, aru amikhan laga thaki bole ghor bhi nai.
Amikhan bisi dukh pora kaam kore, amikhan nijor laga hath pora kore. Jitia manu khan pora amikhan ke hinsa kore, amikhan taikhan ke asis kore. Jitia amikhan uporte Isor kaam nimite dukh digdar pai, amikhan eitu khan dhorjo kori loi.
Jitia manu pora amikhan laga biya kotha koi, taikhan ke bhal kotha pora jawab diye. Kintu manu pora amikhan ke etiya tak bhi etu prithibi laga letera jhabara nisena bhabi ase.
Moi etu apnikhan ke sorom khila bole nimite likha nohoi, kintu apnikhan ke moi morom kori thaka bacha khan nisena sikhai ase.
Kilekoile jodi apnikhan logote Khrista te dos hajar sai diya sipahi thakilebi, apnikhan logote bisi baba khan nathakibo. Kilekoile moi apnikhan laga baba hoise juntu Khrista Jisu laga susamachar pora he hoise.
Etu karone moi apnikhan ke moi nisena koribi koi kene mangi ase.
Kilekoile etu nimite, moi Timothy ke apnikhan logot pathaise, jun Probhu te, moi laga morom thaka aru biswas te thik thaka bacha ase. Tai apnikhan ke ami ki Khrista Jisu laga ki niyom cholai ase, aru girja khan te ami ki hikai thake eitu khan sob hikai dibo.
Etiya, apnikhan bhitor te kunba to bisi phutani hoi ase, moi kitia bhi apnikhan logote nahibo nisena.
Kintu moi apnikhan logote joldi ahibo, jodi etu Probhu laga itcha hoile. Etu pichete moi utu phutani manu khan ke ahikena sabo, taikhan logot khali kotha pora phutani ase na dusra hokti bhi ase.
Kilekoile Isor laga rajyo to khali kotha pora nohoi kintu hokti pora ase.
Apnikhan ki lage? Moi apnikhan ke luha laga lathi loi kene na morom aru norom atma loi kene ahibo?
Ami huni bole pai ase ta te kunba khan ase jun khan bebichar laga kaam apnikhan majote kori ase, aru eneka biya kaam khan juntu Porjati khan majote kitia bhi huna nai- jineka ekjon manu tai laga baba laga maiki ke loi kene ase.
Aru eneka hoi kene bhi apnikhan iman phutani ase! Asol to apnikhan mon dukh hobole lage, eneka hoile jun manu eneka kaam kori ase taikhan ke apnikhan logot pora ulai dibi.
Ami apnikhan majote gaw pora alag thakile bhi, ami laga atma to apnikhan logote ase. Moi poila pora utu manu laga kaam khan nimite bisar kori dise, ami nijor ta te thaka nisena.
Jitia apnikhan Probhu Jisu Khrista laga naam pora joma hoise, aru ami atma pora apnikhan logote ase, amikhan laga Probhu Jisu Khrista laga hokti pora,
etu manu ke Saitan laga hathte tai laga gaw ke khotom kori dibo nimite dibi, eneka hoile Probhu laga dinte tai laga atma to bachai lobo.
Apnikhan phutani dikhai thaka to bhal nohoi. Apnikhan najane naki, ekta chutu khomir to pura atta ke phulai diye?
Purana khomir ke ulai dibi eneka hoile apnikhan ekta notun roti bona bole laga atta hoi jabo. Kilekoile Khrista, amikhan laga Nistar laga mer bacha to bolidan hoi jaise.
Etu nimite ahibi amikhan khushi laga din ke manabo, purana khomir logote nohoi, nohoile bhi biya adat aru biya kaam laga khomir pora nohoi, kintu hosa aru ekta naphula laga roti nisena sapha hoi kene.
Ami poila laga chithi te bhi likhise, bebichar kora manu khan logote namilibi.
Ami laga chithi te, etu prithibi laga bebichar kaam kora khan, nohoile lalchi thaka, nohoile thogai diya manu, nohoile murti puja kora khan logote namili kene thakibi kowa nohoi, eneka hoile apnikhan etu prithibi pora bahar te jabole lagibo.
Kintu etiya ami apnikhan ke likha to utu manu khan logote namilibi jun tai nijorke ekjon bhai nisena koi kintu jun bebichar ase, nohoile lalchi ase, nohoile murti puja kora, nohoile kotha pora biya gali kora, nohoile nisa pani kore, nohoile manu ke thogai diye. Eneka manu logote kha luwa bhi na koribi.
Ki kori bole ami abiswasi khan ke bisar koribo? Bhitor te thaka khan ke bisar koribo lage nohoi?
Kintu Isor to abiswasi khan ke bisar kore. “Etu biya manu ke apnikhan laga majot pora ulai dibi.”
Jitia apnikhan majote kotha namile, titia adharmik ukil khan logote faisla kori bole jabo pare, kintu Isor laga manu khan logot jabo napare?
Nohoile bhi apnikhan najane naki pobitro manu khan he etu prithibi ke bisar koribo koi kene? Aru jodi etu prithibi ke apnikhan pora bisar koribo ase koile, apnikhan pora etu chutu kotha khan ke bisar koribo napare naki?
Apnikhan najane naki amikhan pora he sorgodoth khan ke bisar kori bole ase koi kene? Tinehoile etu jibon laga kotha to ki dorkar ase?
Tinehoile, apnikhan majote namila kotha thakile, kele apnikhan dusra manu khan ke bisar kori bole diye jun khan girja te naam nai?
Moi apnikhan sorom khila bole koi ase. Apnikhan majote kunbi gyaani manu nai naki, jun pora bhai khan majote jhagara faisla kori dibo paribo?
Kintu ekjon biswasi pora tai laga bhai ke faisla ghor te loijai, aru ekjon abiswasi ke bisar kori bole diye!
Etu karone, apnikhan to shuru pora pura hari jaise, kele koile apnikhan nijor uporte bisar kori ase. Manu khan pora apnikhan logot biya kaam korate dhorjo kora he bhal nohoi? Nohoile bhi etu pora to manu khan pora apnikhan ke thogai diya he bhal nohoi?
Kintu apnikhan nijor golti aru thoga baji kore, aru etu bhi nijor bhai khan ke!
Nohoile bhi apnikhan najane naki dharmik nathaka manu khan to Isor laga rajyote jabole na paribo koi kene? Apnikhan dhoka nakhabi; letera kaam khan, nohoile bhi murti puja, nohoile bhi bebichari, nohoile bhi nijor gaw ke bikiri kora khan, nohoile mota-mota aru maiki-maiki biya kaam kora khan,
nohoile chor, lalchi, nisa pani kha khan, bodnam kora khan, manu ke thogai diya kaam khan, eneka kaam kora khan kunbi Isor laga rajyo sabole na paribo.
Apnikhan poila te eneka thakisele. Kintu apnikhan ke dhulai kene sapha kori dise, apnikhan ke pobitro kori dise, apnikhan ke Probhu Jisu Khrista laga naam aru Isor laga Atma pora sapha kori dise.
“Ami nimite sob to niyom te ase,” kintu sob to labh thaka nohoi. “Ami nimite sob to niyom te ase,” kintu eku pora bhi ami uporte malik hobole nadibo.
“Kha luwa khan to pet nimite ase, aru pet to kha luwa nimite ase,” kintu Isor pora duita bhi khotom kori dibo. Gaw to mangso itcha kaam nimite nohoi, kintu Probhu laga ase, aru Probhu to gaw laga ase.
Etiya Isor to hosa pora bhi Probhu ke uthai dise, aru amikhan ke bhi Tai laga hokti pora uthai dibo.
Apnikhan najane naki apnikhan laga gaw to Khrista laga bhag ase koi kene? Tinehoile moi Khrista laga bhag ke ulai dibo aru paap kaam laga bhag bonai dibo? Eneka to kitia bhi nahobi!
Nohoile bhi apnikhan najane naki jitia ekjon bebichar mahila logote biya kaam kore tai duijon ekta sharir hoijai koi kene? Kilekoile Isor kotha te eneka likhi kene ase, “Duijon to ekta sharir hoi jabo.”
Kintu jun Probhu logote mili kene ase tai to Tai logote ekta atma hoijai.
Bebichari kaam khan pora dur polai jabi! Sob paap juntu ekjon manu pora kore etu to gaw bahar te kora ase, kintu bebichari kora paap kaam to nijor gaw ke paap kori diye.
Nohoile bhi apnikhan najane naki apnikhan laga gaw to Pobitro Atma laga girja ase, jun apuni bhitor te ase, aru Jun Isor pora apnikhan ke dise? Apnikhan to nijor laga nohoi,
kele koile Isor pora daam dikene apnikhan ke kini loise. Etu karone Isor ke apnikhan laga gaw dwara mohima dibi.
Etiya juntu jinis khan nimite apnikhan amike likhise: “Ekjon mota manu pora ekjon mahila ke gaw-mangso te namilile he bhal ase.”
Eneka hoile bhi, bebichari nakoribole nimite, sob mota laga nijor maiki thaki bole dibi, aru sob maiki laga nijor mota thaki bole dibi.
Mota pora maiki ki bhal lage etu koribi: aru maiki bhi mota logote eneka koribi.
Maiki to tai laga nijor gaw uporte adhikar nai, hoile bhi mota laga adhikar ase: aru eneka nisena mota bhi tai laga nijor gaw uporte adhikar nai, hoile bhi maiki laga adhikar ase.
Ekjon-ekjon ke mana na koribi, ekta homoi nimite hoile monjur hoi kene thakibi, titia apnikhan nijor nimite prathana te mon dibole paribo; aru etu piche eke logote ahibi, titia Saitan pora apnikhan ke porikha nakoribo, apnikhan nijor pora nijorke rukhabole napara nimite.
Hoile bhi ami etu niyom diya nisena he koi ase, hukum nisena nohoi.
Kilekoile ami bhabi ase sob manu khan ami nisena hobo. Hoile bhi sob manu logote thik pora Isor laga inam ase, ekjon eneka nisena, aru dusra utu nisena.
Etu nimite ami shadi nakora aru bidhowa mahila khan ke koi ase, taikhan ami nisena thakile, etu he taikhan nimite bhal ase.
Hoile bhi taikhan naparile, taikhan ke shadi kori bole dibi: kele koile itcha te thaka pora to shadi korile bhal ase.
Aru shadi kora khan ke ami koi ase, etiya bhi ami nohoi, hoilebi Probhu koi ase, ekjon maiki tai laga mota ke chari kene jabole nalage
(kintu aru tai chari kene jaise koile, taike shadi nakori kene thaki bole dibi, nahoile tai laga mota logote wapas mili bole dibi), aru mota bhi tai laga maiki ke chari bole nadibi.
Hoile bhi dusra khan sobke- Moi pora koi ase, Probhu pora nohoi- kunba bhai laga maiki ase jun biswasi nohoi, aru tai duijon thaki bole mon ase koile, tai to maiki ke chari bole nalage.
Aru ekjon maiki jun laga mota biswasi nohoi, aru tai duijon thaki bole mon ase koile, tai to mota ke chari bole nalage.
Kilekoile utu abiswasi mota to biswasi maiki pora pobitro hoijai, aru abiswas maiki bhi sapha kori loise. Eneka nohoile apnikhan laga bacha khan niyom pora moila hobo asele; hoile bhi etiya taikhan pobitro hoise.
Kintu, jodi abiswas jon pora chari diye koile, taike jabo dibi. Ekjon bhai nahoile ekjon bhoini ke eku bandi kene rakha nohoi: hoile bhi Isor he amikhan ke shanti nimite matise.
Kilekoile oh maiki, apuni jani ase apuni pora apuni laga mota ke bacha bole paribona nai? Nahoile apuni kineka pora jani ase, oh manu, apuni pora apnilaga maiki ke bacha bole paribona nai?
Hoilebi Isor jineka dise sob manu ke, Probhu jineka pora sobke matise, eneka he taike bera bole dibi. Aru eneka pora ami sob girja khan te pobitro kotha koi thake.
Kunba manu ke sunnot kora pichete he matise? Taike sunnot nakoribole nadibi. Kunba ke sunnot nohoikena matise? Taike sunnot hobole nadibi.
Sunnot kora to eku nohoi, aru sunnot nakora bhi eku nohoi, hoile bhi ki dorkar ase koile Isor laga hukum khan mani kene thaka.
Jun manu ke jineka matise taike eneka he thaki bole dibi.
Apuni ekjon noukar thaka homoi te matise? Etu hisab na koribi: hoile bhi apuni ajad hobole parise koile, etu kori lobi.
Kilekoile tai junke Probhu bhitor te matise, ekta noukar hoilebi, Probhu laga ajad manu ase. Eneka pora tai bhi jun ajad thaka ke matise, tai bhi Khrista laga noukar ase.
Apnikhan ke Isor pora ekta daam tirai kene kinise; apnikhan manu khan laga noukar nahobi.
Bhai khan, sob manu ke, jineka taike matise, Isor logote eneka he thakibi.
Etiya kumari mahila khan laga kotha nimite Probhu pora ami logote eku bhi hukum diya nai. Eneka hoilebi ami laga bhabona di ase, ekjon hoi kene jun biswasi huwa nimite Probhu pora daya paise.
Etu nimite, ahibole din laga digdar nimite etu bhal ase, ekjon manu kineka ase eneka he thaki bole.
Apuni ekjon maiki logot bandi kene ase? Khuli bole nabisaribi. Apuni ekjon maiki pora khuli kene ase? Ekjon maiki nabisaribi.
Hoile bhi apuni shadi korise koile, apuni paap kora nohoi; aru ekta kumari pora shadi korise koile, tai paap kora nai. Eneka hoile bhi eitu khan mangso te digdar pabo:aru ami apuni khan etu digdar pora bacha bole itcha kori ase.
Hoile bhi etu ami koi ase, bhai khan, homoi komti hoise: eneka thakibi, jineka jun khan maiki ase taikhan bhi maiki nathaka nisena;
Aru taikhan jun khan kandi ase, jineka taikhan kanda nai; aru taikhan jun khan khushi pai ase, jineka taikhan khushi pa-a nai; aru taikhan jun khan kini ase, jineka taikhan laga eku nai;
aru taikhan jun khan etu prithibi ke cholai ase, taikhan etu ke nachola nisena. Kilekoile etu prithibi thaka to jai-jai ase.
Hoile bhi, apnikhan chinta pora ajad thakibi. Tai jun shadi kora nai utu khan nimite bhabi ase juntu Probhu laga ase, kineka pora tai Probhu ke khushi kori bole paribo.
Hoile bhi tai jun shadi kori kene ase tai kineka pora tai laga maiki ke khushi koribo etu nimite bhabi thake, aru tai laga mon aru bhabona dui bhag hoijai. Ekjon shadi nakora nohoile kumari mahila
to khali Probhu laga kaam nimite bhabi thake, etu nimite tai gaw aru atma duita te bhi pobitro thake. Hoile bhi tai jun shadi kori kene ase prithibi laga jinis nimite bhabi ase, kineka pora tai tai laga mota ke khushi koribo.
Aru etu ami apnikhan laga nijor labh nimite koi ase, apnikhan uporte ekta phang rakha nohoi, hoile bhi juntu sabole sundur ase etu hoi thakibo nimite, aru ta te apnikhan mon ulta nohoikena Probhu phine mon dibole paribo.
Hoile bhi jodi kunba mota bhabi ase tai shadi kori bole thaka kumari mahila logote thik niyom pora thakibo napare,- jodi kumari mahila to shadi kori bole umor bisi hoi ase koile- tai laga itcha nisena kori bole dibi. Tai paap kora nohoi: taikhan ke shadi kori bole dibi.
Hoile bhi tai jun mon bhitor te thik khara ase, aru taike dorkar nai, aru tai nijor bhabona te takot ase, aru tai monte mani loise tai shadi nakori kene thakibo, tai to ekdom thik kori ase.
Etu nimite tai jun shadi kori ase, bhal kori ase; hoilebi tai jun shadi nakore, tai bisi bhal kori ase.
Ekjon maiki tai laga mota jinda thaka tak tai logote niyom pora bandi kene ase; hoilebi tai laga mota morise koile, tai junke khushi ase eitu ke shadi kori bole azadi ase; hoile bhi khali Probhu te.
Hoilebi tai eneka thakise koile he khushi thakibo, ami laga hisab te. Aru ami etu bhi bhabi ase ami logote Isor laga Atma ase.
Etiya, murti khan ke kha luwa laga bolidan diya kotha juntu apnikhan hudise, etu laga likhibo: Amikhan jani ase amikhan sob logote gyaan ase. Kintu gyaan to manu ke phutani kori diye, hoile bhi morom to manu khan ke bonai diye.
Jodi kunba ekjon kiba jani ase koi kene bhabe, tai asol te janibole thaka to eku bhi jana nai.
Kintu jun Isor ke morom kore, etu manu ke Isor pora jani ase.
Tinehoile, murti ke bolidan diya laga kha luwa kora: Amikhan jani ase etu prithibi te murti to eku nai aru amikhan jani ase khali ekjon Isor he ase.
Kilekoile isor khan bisi thakile bhi, sorgote nohoile prithibi te, jineka bisi “isor khan” aru “probhukhan” ase,
hoile bhi amikhan nimite to ekjon Baba Isor he ase, sob to Tai pora he ahise aru Tai nimite amikhan jinda ase, aru ekjon Probhu Jisu Khrista, jun karone he sob jinis ase, aru jun karone amikhan jinda ase.
Kineka hoile bhi, etu gyaan to sob jon bhitor te nohoi. Hoile bhi, kunba to poila te murti khan ke bisi mani kene thakise, etu nimite taikhan murti ke bolidan diya laga kha luwa nisena bhabikena khai diye; etu nimite taikhan laga bhabona komjur aru letera hoi kene ase.
Kintu kha luwa pora amikhan ke Isor age te dikhai nadibo. Amikhan nakhaile biya hoi najai, nohoile bhi khai le bhal ase eneka hoi najai.
Kintu hoshiar hoi kene thakibi apuni laga etu ajadi nimite dusra manu khan karone komjur kori diya porikha hobole nadibi.
Kilekoile jodi kunba pora etu gyaan thaka manu ke murti ke diya laga kha luwa khai thaka dikhise koile, utu dimag komjur thaka manu to murti ke bolidan diya kha luwa khabole sikhi lobo nohoi?
Etu nimite ekjon jun komjur ase, utu bhai nimite jun Khrista jibon di dise, apuni laga kaam dikhi kene tai nosto hoi jaise.
Etu karone, jitia apnikhan bhai khan laga age te paap kaam kori kene taikhan laga komjur bhabona ke ghao kori diye, apnikhan to Khrista age te paap hoise.
Etu karone, jodi kha luwa nimite bhai khan porikha te giri jai, tinehoile ami mangso bhi nakhabo, titia moi pora ami nimite ami laga bhai khan ke porikha te giribole nadibo.
Moi ajad nohoi naki? Moi apostle nohoi naki? Moi amikhan laga Probhu Jisu ke dikhai nai naki? Apnikhan ami logote Probhu nimite kaam kora manu khan nohoi naki?
Jodi ami dusra khan nimite ekjon apostle nohoi koile bhi, apnikhan nimite to ase. Kilekoile ami Probhu laga apostle kaam kora to apnikhan he ami laga gawahi ase.
Etu he ami laga raksha ase jun khan para amike sai thake:
Kha luwa kori bole amikhan adhikar nai naki?
Amikhan ekjon biswasi maiki ke shadi kori bole amikhan laga adhikar nai naki, aru dusra apostle khan nisena, aru Probhu te bhai thaka khan, aru Cephas nisena?
Nohoile, khali Barnabas aru moi he kaam kori bole adhikar nathaka duijon ase?
Kun sipahi kaam kori kene nijorke tangkha diye? Kun bagan kora manu bagan kori kene nijor bagan laga guti khabole napare? Nohoile kun ekjon roikhya manu nijor laga mer khan ke saikene taikhan laga dudh nakhai?
Eitu khan kowa to manu laga adhikar hisab te kowa nohoi naki? Nohoile niyom te bhi eneka ase nohoi?
Kilekoile Moses laga niyom te eneka likhi kene ase, “Goru laga mukh te rusi pora bandhi kene bondh kori nadibi jitia tak tai dhaan uporte theng chipai kene ghuri thake.” Isor to goru khan nimite eku chinta ase, na chinta kore?
Na, khali amikhan nimite he likhi kene ase? Kile mane etu amikhan nimite likhi kene ase, kun kheti khunde aru kun dhaan guti ke alag kore, tai duijon bhi hajira pabo lage.
Jodi amikhan atma laga bijon khan apnikhan majote phelai, tinehoile apnikhan amikhan ke duniya laga jinis khan bhi dibole napare naki?
Jodi dusra khan apuni uporte kiba pabole adhikar ase koile, apnikhan bhi taikhan uporte pabole adhikar ase nohoi? Kintu amikhan etu adhikar to lobole para nai. Ulta Khrista laga susamachar kaam digdar nohobole nimite amikhan dhorjo korise.
Apnikhan najane, jun mondoli nimite kaam kore, tai to mondoli laga kaam khan he khai; aru jun bedi te kha luwa khan sai, tai to bedi laga kha luwa he khai?
Thik etu nisena, Probhu pora hukum dise jun Khrista laga susamachar koi diya kaam kore tai laga hajira to susamachar pora he pabo.
Kintu moi etu adhikar khan eku bhi luwa nai. Kilekoile ami etu likha to kiba pabole nimite likha nohoi, kele koile etu likhi kene phutani kora pora to ami nimite morija to he bhal hobo.
Kilekoile jitia moi susamachar prochar kore, etu te ami eku phutani dikha bole motlob nai, kelemane etu to ami laga jimedari he ase. Aru ami uporte dukh hobole dibi jodi ami susamachar to prochar nakore!
Kilekoile jodi ami khushi pora prochar korile, moi nimite inam ase. Kintu jodi moi khushi nai joborjosti pora, titia hoile moi uporte sabole jimedari di dise.
Tinehoile ami laga inam to ki ase? Ami jitia susamachar prochar kore ami eku bhi daam noloi, eneka hoile he ami susamachar laga naam pora khushi-khushi kori bole sesta nakoribo.
Kilekoile ami to sob pora ajad hoi kene thakile bhi, ami nijorke dusra khan laga nokor bonai dise, eneka hoile ami aru bhi bisi pabo.
Yehudi khan nimite ami Yehudi hoi jaise, eneka hoile Yehudi khan ke jiti lobo. Aru ami nijor bhi niyom bhitor te thaka nai, kintu jun khan niyom bhitor te ase, taikhan uporte jitibo nimite ami nijorke niyom bhitor te thaka ekjon kori loise.
Aru jun khan niyom bahar te ase, ami nijorke niyom bahar te thaka ekjon hoi jaise eneka hoile niyom bahar te thaka khan ke jiti lobo (asol te ami Isor laga niyom bahar te nohoi, kintu Khrista laga niyom bhitor te ase).
Komjur khan nimite ami bhi komjur hoi jaise, eneka hoile komjur khan ke jiti lobo. Moi sob khan nimite sob hoi jaise, eneka hoile ami kineka hoile bhi kunba khan ke bacha bole paribo.
Ami eitu khan sob to susamachar nimite he kori ase, eneka hoile ami bhi etu laga ekta bhag hobo.
Apnikhan najane, polabole laga khila te sob khilari khan polai, kintu khali ekjon he inam loi? Etu nimite eneka pora polabi jineka pora apuni jitibo.
Jun khan etu khila te bhag loi, taikhan to sob jinis te nijorke rukhabo para laga taiyari kure. Taikhan etu kura to harai jabole mukut pabole nimite kore, kintu amikhan to ketia bhi naharabole mukut pabo nimite kore.
Etu karone moi polai, ekjon eku motlob nathaki kene nohoi; moi lorai kore, ekjon hawa te mari thaka nisena nohoi.
Kintu ami nijor gaw ke dhuri loi aru moi laga noukar bonai loi, eneka hoile jitia ami dusra khan ke prochar kora pichete, ami nijorke hari bole nadibo.
Kilekoile ami apnikhan ke eku najani kene thakibo dibole mon nai, bhai khan, amikhan laga baba khan jitia badal pora loijai thakise, taikhan samundar paar kori bole parise.
Taikhan sob Moses logote badal aru samundar pora baptizma loise,
aru taikhan sob eke atma laga kha luwa korise.
Taikhan sob eke atmik laga pani khaise, kele koile taikhan atma laga pathor jun taikhan piche ahise etu pora he khaise, aru etu pathor to Khrista ase.
Kintu Isor to taikhan kunba uporte te khushi thaka nai, aru etu nimite taikhan ke balu laga pahar te morai dise.
Etiya eitu khan sob to amikhan nimite ekta saikene bujhi bole kotha ase, eneka hoile amikhan biya jinis khan te itcha nahobo, jineka taikhan itcha kori sele.
Murti puja kora manu khan nahobi, jineka taikhan majote kunba thakisele; Shastro te eneka likhi kene ase, “Manu khan bohi kene kha luwa kori thakise, aru khili bole uthi loise.”
Bebichar kaam khan na koribi, jineka taikhan bisi manu bebichar korise, aru etu nimite teis hajar manu utu dinte mori jaise.
Khrista ke kitia bhi porikha na koribi, jineka bisi manu Taike kora nisena, aru etu nimite taikhan ke saph pora khotom kori dise.
Khong uthi kene sikayat na koribi, jineka bisi manu korise, aru etu nimite taikhan ke khotom kori diya jon pora khotom kori dise.
Etiya eitu khan sob to amikhan nimite ekta saikene bujhi bole laga kotha ase. Kilekoile etu Shastro te likha to amikhan hoshiar hobo nimite ase, jun khan uporte yug khotom huwa din ahi jaise.
Etu karone jun manu khan khara ase bhabe, taikhan na giribole nimite hoshiar koribi.
Eku porikha bhi apuni ke girai dibole para nai, khali mamuli porikha khan te he girise, jun te sob manu khan giri thake. Kintu, Isor ke biswas thakibi. Tai kitia bhi bukhi bole napara porikha apuni ke nadibo, kintu jitia apuni porikha pabo, Tai apuni ke etu porikha pora bacha bole nimite rasta bhi dibo, titia apuni dhorjo kori bole paribo.
Etu karone, moi laga morom thaka khan, murti puja khan pora dur thakibi.
Moi buja manu khan ke koi ase. Moi ki koi ase etu pora apnikhan nijorke bisar koribi.
Amikhan jun asirbad laga kup pora asis kore, etu to Khrista laga khun te bhag loi ase nohoi? Aru juntu roti amikhan bhangai kene bhag kori ase, etu to Khrista laga gaw ase nohoi?
Kilekoile ta te khali ekta roti ase, etu nimite amikhan bisi jon hoilebi, sob ekta gaw he ase, kele koile amikhan sob to ekta roti pora he bhag kore.
Israel laga manu khan ke sabi. Jitia taikhan bolidan diya janwar khan ke khai, taikhan etu bedi te bhag kori kene khai nohoi?
Tinehoile ami ki koi ase? Kha luwa murti khan ke bolidan kora to ki ase? Nohoile ekta murti to kiba ekta ase naki?
Hoile bhi, ami laga motlob to etu ase, jitia Porjati khan pora bolidan diye, taikhan etu Isor ke nohoi kene bhoot khan ke bolidan diye! Kintu moi apnikhan ke bhoot khan laga bhag hobole dibo mon nai!
Apnikhan Isor laga kup pora bhi aru bhoot khan laga kup pora bhi khabole na paribo. Apnikhan Probhu laga kha luwa jagate bhi aru saitan laga kha luwa jagate bhi bhag lobole na paribo.
Na amikhan Probhu ke mon julabole dikhai ase naki? Amikhan Probhu pora bhi hokti thaka nohoi, na ase?
Apnikhan koi, “Sob to kori bole niyom ase.” Kintu sob to labh nohoi. “Sob to kori bole niyom ase,” kintu sob to manu khan ke thik bonai nadiye.
Kun bhi nijor laga bhal nimite bisaribo nalage, dusra khan laga bhal he nohoile.
Apnikhan juntu bajar te kine eitu khan sob to khabole pare, nijor laga bhabona ke nahudi kene.
Kilekoile “prithibi aru tai bhitor te sob to Probhu laga ase.”
Jodi kunba biswas nakora manu apuni ke bhat khabole mate, aru apuni jabole mon hoi, tai apnike ki khabole diye eitu khan sob apuni laga bhabona ke nahudi kene khai lobi.
Kintu jodi kunba apuni ke koi, “Etu boli kora laga ase,” titia etu to nakhabi, kele koile manu khan laga bhabona hisab te etu thik nai kun pora apuni ke khobor dise, aru nijor bhabona nimite bhi-
Etiya ami laga motlob to, apnikhan nijor laga bhabona ke nohoi, kintu dusra laga bhabona ke koi ase. Kilekoile ami laga ajadi to kele dusra khan laga bhabona pora bisar hobole dibo?
Jodi ami kha luwa laga bhag te sonman pora loi, tinehoile kele amike apman kori ase juntu ami Isor ke dhanyavad dikene khaise?
Etu karone, kha luwa ki hoile bhi, apuni ki kore, sob to Isor laga mohima nimite koribi.
Yehudi aru Porjati khan ke, aru Isor laga girja ke biya na koribi,
jineka moi bhi manu khan ke sob te khushi kori dibole kosis kore. Ami nijor labh hobole nimite nibisare, kintu dusra khan nimite bisare, eneka kori kene taikhan bhi bachi jabo nimite.
Moi jineka Khrista laga niyom cholai, eneka nisena tumikhan bhi moi laga niyom khan koribi.
Etiya moi apnikhan ke prosansa kori ase kele koile apnikhan moi nimite sob to yaad kore, aru apuni laga jati laga niyom khan takot pora dhure, jineka moi apnikhan laga hathte punchai dise.
Etiya moi apnikhan ke bujhai dibole mon thaka to Khrista to mota manu khan laga matha ase, aru mota khan to maiki khan laga matha ase, aru Isor to Khrista laga matha ase.
Sob manu jun prathana aru bhabobani kore, etu homoi te tai laga matha te kiba jinis rakhise koile, tai laga matha ke opman kori ase.
Kintu kun mahila prathana aru bhabobani kore aru tai laga matha dhakikena nakore, tai laga matha ke opman kore. Kilekoile etu to eke kotha nisena ase jineka ekjon mahila tai laga matha te thaka chuli sob kati loi.
Kilekoile jodi ekjon mahila tai laga matha ke nadhake, tinehoile taikhan laga chuli bhi kati bole dibi. Kintu jodi mahila khan taikhan laga chuli kati bole nahoile bhi matha takulu kori bole opman lage koile, taikhan ke taikhan laga matha dhakibole kobi.
Kilekoile ekjon mota pora matha dhaka to thik nohoi, kelemane tai to Isor laga noksa aru mohima nisena taike bonaise. Kintu ekjon maiki to tai laga mota laga mohima ase.
Kilekoile mota manu to maiki pora nohoi. Ulta, maiki he mota manu pora ase.
Kilekoile mota manu to maiki khan nimite bona nohoi, kintu maiki ke mota manu nimite bonaise.
Etu nimite maiki khan to taikhan laga matha dhaki kene rakhibo lage, eneka hoile manu khan janibo tai mota laga adhikar te ase koi kene, aru tai eitu khan kora to sorgodoth khan nimite ase.
Hoilebi, Probhu logote to, maiki to mota pora ajad nohoi, aru mota bhi maiki pora ajad nohoi.
Kilekoile maiki to mota manu pora ase, aru mota bhi maiki pora he ase: kintu sob jinis to Isor pora he ase.
Nijor pora bisar kori sabi: ekjon mahila tai laga matha nadhaki kene Isor ke prathana kora to thik ase naki?
Etu prithibi laga niyom nijor pora he apnikhan ke nasikhai, jodi ekjon mota chuli lamba kore, etu to tai nimite sorom ase nohoi?
Kintu jodi ekjon maiki chuli lamba rakhe, etu tai laga mohima ase nohoi? Kilekoile taike lamba chuli diya to taike dhakibole nimite dise.
Kintu jodi kunba manu etu kotha khan pora mon khushi nai, amikhan logote bhi aru Isor laga girja khan te bhi aru etu pora alag dusra niyom nai.
Kintu etiya moi kobole thaka adesh khan, moi apnikhan ke prosansa kora nohoi, apnikhan eke logote aha to, bhal hobole nohoi, kintu bisi biya nimite.
Kilekoile sob pora age te, moi etu huni bole paise jitia apnikhan girja te eke logote joma hoi, apnikhan majote mon namili kene alag thake, aru etu kotha ke biswas kori bole tan nai.
Kelemane kunba biswasi khan nijor dimag cholai kene kun he asol biswasi ase koi kene sabole, alag dol khan shuru kori bole bhabe.
Kelemane jitia apnikhan ekta jagate eke logote ahe, etu to Probhu laga Bhoj kha luwa kori bole nahe.
Kilekoile jitia kha luwa kora somoi hobo, sob manu nijor laga kha luwa to poila khai loi; kunba to khabole napaikena bhuka thake, aru kunba to bisi khai kene nisa hoi kene thake.
Kilekoile apnikhan kha luwa kori bole nimite nijor ghor nai naki? Na apnikhan Isor laga girja ke ghin kore aru gorib manu khan ke sorom khilai?
Kilekoile moike Probhu pora ki dise etu moi apnikhan ke di ase, Probhu Jisu he, Taike thogai diya rati te, roti loise,
aru Tai dhanyavad dise, aru Tai bhangai kene koise, “Etu Moi laga khun ase, juntu tumikhan nimite ase. Moike yaad kori kene etu koribi.”
Thik etu nisena, Tai bhi kha luwa kora pichete kup to loise, eneka koi kene, “Etu kup to Ami laga khun te ekta notun laga vachan ase. Apnikhan kiman bar etu pibo, Moike yaad kori kene etu koribi.”
Kilekoile hodai jitia apnikhan etu roti pora khabi aru etu kup pora pibo, apnikhan Probhu mora laga khobor to prochar kori thakibo jitia tak Tai wapas nahhe.
Etu karone, jun hoilebi, thik pora nabuji kene Probhu laga roti khai nohoile kup pora pi loi, tai to Probhu laga gaw aru Tai laga khun age te te golti hobo.
Kintu ekjon manu tai nijorke poila sai lobole dibi, aru etu nisena taike roti khabole aru kup pora pibole dibi.
Kilekoile jun manu tai nijor gaw ke bhal pora nasai kene khai aru pi loi, tai to nijorke bisar kora laga khai loi aru pi loi.
Etu nimite apnikhan majote bisi manu komjur aru bemar ase, aru bisi manu ghumai kene ase.
Kintu jitia amikhan nijorke sai, amikhan ke bisar nahobo.
Kintu jitia amikhan ke Probhu pora bisar kore, etu amikhan ke sidha kori bole nimite ase, eneka hoile amikhan ke prithibi logote bodnam nohobo.
Etu karone, moi laga bhai khan, jitia apnikhan eke logote Probhu laga Bhojan khabole ahe, ekjon-ekjon nimite rukhi bhi.
Jodi kunba ekjon bhuk lagi thakile, taike ghor te khabole dibi, eneka hoile tumi duijon Isor laga bisar te eke logote nahibo. Aru apnikhan pora dusra kiba likha khan to, moi aha pichete apnikhan ke dikhai dibo.
Etiya, bhai khan moi atma laga bordan laga kotha koi dibo, apnikhan pora etu najane eneka hobo dibo mon nai.
Apnikhan jani ase jitia apnikhan biswas nathaka asele, apnikhan nijorke ulta rasta te loi jaise aru jibon nathaka murti khan ke puja kori thakise.
Etu karone moi apnikhan ke janai di ase, kun bhi Isor laga Atma pora eneka kobole na paribo, “Jisu ke shrap hobi,” aru kun bhi Pobitro Atma nathaki kene eneka kobole na paribo, “Jisu he Probhu ase.”
Etiya, etu te bisi kisim laga bordan khan ase, kintu Isor laga Atma to eke ase.
Aru etu te alag-alag sewkai khan ase, kintu ekjon he Probhu ase.
Aru etu te alag-alag kisim laga kaam khan ase, kintu ekjon he Isor ase, jun pora kaam khan sob logote kori ase.
Etiya ekjon-ekjon logote Atma dikene ase, ekjon-ekjon ke modot koribo paribo nimite.
Kilekoile Atma pora kunba ke buddhi laga kotha dise, aru etu eke Atma pora kunba ke gyaan laga kotha dise,
eke Atma pora kunba ke biswas dise, aru etu eke Atma pora bhal kori diya bordan dise,
aru kunba ke bhal kaam kora laga hokti dise, kunba ke bhabobani, kunba ke bhal biya atma bujhi bole para, kunba ke alag kisim laga bhasha, aru kunba ke alag kisim laga bhasha ke bujhai dibo para laga bordan dise.
Kintu ekjon aru eke Atma pora etu sob kaam khan kori ase, aru Tai laga itcha hisab te ekjon-ekjon ke bhag kori kene diye.
Kilekoile manu laga khali ekta gaw he ase hoilebi alag-alag kaam hisab te bhag ase, kintu jiman bhag hoilebi gaw to ekta he ase; thik etu nisena Khrista bhi ekjon he ase.
Kilekoile ekjon Atma pora he amikhan sobke baptizma dikene ekta gaw bonai dise, Yehudi hoile bhi Porjati hoile bhi, bandi kene thaka nohoile bhi ajad thakile bhi, amikhan sobke ekjon Atma he khabole dise.
Kilekoile gaw to khali ekta bhag he nohoi, kintu bisi ase.
Jodi theng pora koi, “Ami to hath nohoi, etu nimite ami to gaw laga bhag nohoi,” eneka koile bhi tai etu gaw laga ekta bhag he ase.
Aru jodi kaan pora eneka koi, “kelemane moi to suku nohoi, etu nimite moi etu gaw laga bhag nohoi,” eneka koile bhi tai etu gaw laga ekta bhag he ase.
Jodi pura gaw to suku ase koi, tinehoile kote pora huni bole paribo? Jodi pura gaw to kaan ase koi, tinehoile kote pora gundha bole paribo?
Kintu Isor pora Tai laga itcha hisab te alag-alag bhag ke ekjon-ekjon laga gaw te rakhidise.
Kintu jodi taikhan sob eke bhag ase koi, tinehoile etu gaw to kote hobo?
Etu nimite ta te bisi bhag ase, hoile bhi ekta gaw he ase.
Suku pora hath ke eneka kobole na paribo, “Ami apuni ke nalage.” Nohoile bhi aru, matha pora theng ke koi, “Ami apuni ke nalage.”
Hoile bhi asol kotha to, gaw laga bhag khan jun to bisi komjur dikhe, taikhan he asol kaam laga bhag ase,
aru juntu gaw laga bhag ke amikhan kaam nai koi kene bhabe, etu bhag ke amikhan bisi bhal pora sai, aru juntu bhag ke dikha bole napare etu bhag ke amikhan bisi bhal pora sai,
Hoile bhi amikhan laga dikha bole sundur bhag ke bisi bhal pora nasai le bhi hobo. Kintu Isor pora sob bhag ke ekta gaw te eke logote milai dise, eneka hoile sob bhag ke eke sonman hobo,
etu nimite gaw majote kun bhi alag-alag bhag nahobo, kintu utu bhag to ekjon-ekjon ke eke mon pora sabo.
Eneka hoile, jitia ekta bhag dukh pabo, sob bhag bhi dukh hoi jabo; aru jitia ekta bhag ke sonman pabo, sob bhag bhi etu logote khushi koribo.
Etiya apnikhan sob Khrista laga gaw ase, aru ekjon-ekjon Tai laga bhag khan ase.
Aru hosa pora bhi Isor pora kunba ke girja te sabole rakhise, poila jaga to Tai laga basi luwa chela khan hobo, dusra to bhabobadi khan, tisra to hikhok khan, etu pichete asurit kaam kora khan, pichete bhal kori diya laga bordan, modot kora khan, bhal pora cholai kene ja, aru alag kisim laga bhasha kowa khan.
Sob to apostle khan ase naki? Sob to bhabobadi khan ase naki? Sob to hikhok khan ase naki? Sob to asurit kaam kora manu ase naki?
Sob logote changai kori diya bordan ase naki? Sob to alag bhasha kobole pare naki? Sob to alag bhasha khan ke bujhai dibole pare naki?
Kintu sob pora dangor bordan ke mon dikene lobole itcha koribi. Aru etiya, ami apnikhan ke sob pora bhal rasta dikhai dibo.
Jodi moi manu aru sorgo duth khan laga bhasha pora koi, kintu moi logote morom nai koile, titia hoile ami to ekta hala kori thaka tina nisena ase nohoile bhi ekta awaj di thaka thali nisena ase.
Aru jodi moi logote bhabobani laga bordan aru bujhi bole napara kotha aru sob bujhi jaa gyaan khan ase koile, aru jodi moi logote pahar ke hata bole para laga biswas ase, kintu jodi ami logote morom to nai, tinehoile ami to eku bhi nohoi.
Aru jodi ami laga dhun sompoti khan sob bhag kori diye, aru jodi moi laga gaw ke boli nimite daan di diye, kintu ami logote morom nai koile, moi eku bhi labh nohobo.
Morom to rukhibole pare aru norom ase; morom to suku najule; morom to phutani nadikhai, etu khong nohoi.
Etu khechera nakore, etu nijor nimite nabisare, etu joldi ghusa nauthe, etu golti khan ke monte narakhe.
Etu adharmik kaam khan te khushi nakore, hoilebi hosa te khushi kore.
Etu sobke dhorjo kori bole pare, sob te biswas rakhe, sob asha rakhe, dukh digdar te dhorjo kori bole pare.
Morom kitia bhi khotom nohoi. Kintu bhabobani khan laga bordan khan bhi sob khotom hoi jabo: alag kisim laga bhasha kori bole para laga bordan, aru gyaan laga bordan khan sob khotom hoi jabo.
Kilekoile amikhan etu bhabobani aru gyaan ke pura najane aru adha kaam he kore.
Kintu jitia pura thik thaka to ahibo, titia juntu khan pura nohoi, eitu khan sob khotom hoi jabo.
Jitia moi bacha thakisele, moi bacha nisena kotha korise, moi bacha nisena bhabona korise, moi bacha nisena kaam kori thakise. Jitia moi dangor manu hoise, moi bacha nisena laga kaam khan sob chari dise.
Kilekoile etiya amikhan ayna te bhal pora sabole napare, kintu pichete usor pora ekjon-ekjon laga chehera sabole paribo. Etiya moi olop bhag he jane, kintu pichete moi pura jani jabo, jineka Isor pora amike pura janikena ase.
Kintu etu tinta to thaki jabo: biswas, asha aru morom. Kintu eitu khan majote sob pora dangor to morom ase.
Morom laga piche koribi aru atma laga bordan karone mon julibi, kintu asol bordan apnikhan bhal pora janibo laga to bhabobani ase.
Kilekoile jun ekjon bhasha alag pora kotha koi ase tai to manu ke kotha kora nohoi kintu Isor ke kori ase; kelemane kun nabuje, kintu tai lukaikene thaka kotha khan atma te koi ase.
Kintu ekjon kun bhabobani kore, taikhan manu khan ke utsah kore, aru taikhan manu khan laga mon aram aru dangor kori diye.
Jun alag bhasha laga kotha khan koi, taikhan to nijor laga biswas ke dangor kore, kintu jun bhabobani kore taikhan to girja laga biswas ke dangor kore.
Etiya moi laga itcha to apnikhan sob bhi alag bhasha te kotha koribo lage, kintu etu pora bhi bhabobani kora to he bisi itcha ase. Kilekoile jun bhabobani kore, taikhan to alag bhasha kora khan pora bhi dangor ase (notun bhasha laga motlob koi diya to girja te biswasi thaka khan ke uthabole nimite te ase).
Kintu bhai khan, jodi moi apnikhan ke alag bhasha pora kotha kori kene ahe, apnikhan laga ki labh hobo, jitia tak moi etu bhasha laga asol motlob, nohoile bhi tai laga gyaan, nohoile bhi bhabobani, nohoile bhi sikhai dibole thaka kotha to apnikhan ke koi nadiye koile?
Etu hosa ase utu jibon nathaka bajana khan juntu awaj khan ulai basuri hoilebi taar laga bajana hoilebi, jodi taikhan alag-alag awaj khan nadiye koile, kineka pora eitu khan ke janibo, basuri pora ki bajai ase aru taar laga bajana pora ki bajai ase?
Kilekoile jodi bhigul bajana pora najana alag awaj diye koile, kun pora etu huni kene lorai karone taiyari koribo?
Apuni khan bhi thik eneka nisena he ase. Jitia tak apnikhan bujhi bole bhasha nakoi, tinehoile kineka pora apnikhan laga kotha janibo? Kilekoile apnikhan to hawa ke kotha kora nisena hobo.
Etu prithibi te bisi kisim bhasha ase kowa to hosa ase, aru ekta bhasha bhi motlob nathaka to nai.
Jodi moi etu bhasha laga motlob ki ase najane koile, moi utu kotha kora manu nimite bahar desh laga manu nisena lagibo, aru ekjon jun amike kotha kori ase tai bhi ami nimite dusra desh laga manu nisena lagibo.
Etu nimite apnikhan jun atma laga bordan bisi lobole itcha kori thaki ase, taikhan utu bordan lobi juntu girja khan laga biswas ke bisi dangor kori dibo.
Eneka hoile jun ekjon alag bhasha pora kotha kore, tai etu bhasha buja bo paribole nimite prathana koribo lage.
Jodi moi alag bhasha pora prathana kore, moi laga atma bhi prathana kore, kintu ami laga bhabona to eku bhi nakore.
Etu karone, ami ki koribo lagibo? Moi nijor laga atma logote prathana koribo, kintu moi nijor laga bhabona logote bhi prathana koribo. Moi nijor laga atma logote gana koribo, aru moi nijor laga bhabona logote bhi gana koribo.
Nohoile, jodi apuni atma pora Isor ke dhanyavad kore, kintu ekjon nabuja manu to kineka apuni laga dhanyavad ke “Amen” kobo, kele koile apuni ki koi ase tai eku bhi nabuje?
Apuni to pura mon pora dhanyavad di thakibo pare, kintu dusra manu to eku labh hobo napare.
Ami Isor ke dhanyavad diye kele koile moi apnikhan pora bhi bisi alag bhasha te kotha kore.
Kintu girja te dos hajar alag bhasha laga kotha kora pora to juntu pansta kotha ami laga bhabona pora dusra khan ke buja bole pare, etu he kobo.
Bhai khan, apnikhan laga bhabona te bacha nisena nahobi. Etu pora to, biya kaam te bacha nisena hobi, hoile bhi bhabona te dangor manu nisena thakibi.
Niom laga kitab te eneka likhi kene ase, “Alag bhasha kora manu khan aru alag kotha kowa manu khan ke loi kene, Moi etu manu khan ke kotha koribo, Kintu eneka korile bhi taikhan moike nahunibo, Probhu he koise.”
Etu nimite, alag bhasha kora khan to ekta chihna ase, biswasi khan karone nohoi, kintu abiswasi khan nimite; hoilebi bhabobani kora khan to abiswasi khan nimite nohoi, kintu biswasi khan nimite ase.
Jodi, etu karone, pura biswasi khan eke logote ekta jagate joma hoi aru taikhan sob alag bhasha te kotha kori bole shuru hoijai, kintu kunba abiswasi aru bordan nathaka manu khan ahe, taikhan ke dikhi kene apnikhan pagala hoise nakobo naki?
Kintu jodi apnikhan sob bhabobani kori thakise, kintu kunba bordan nathaka nohoile bhi abiswasi apnikhan logote ahe, taikhan laga paapkhan sob apnikhan pora koi dibo aru apnikhan laga kotha pora taikhan ke bisar koribo,
monte lukai kene thaka janai dibo aru tai athukari kene Isor ke aradhana koribo, janai dibo, “Isor hosa bhi apnikhan laga majot te ase.”
Moi laga bhai khan apuni khan ki koribo lage? Jitia apuni khan eke logote joma kore ekjon gana kore, ekjon sikhai, ekjon Isor laga kotha koi, ekjon alag bhasha koi nahoile alag bhasha laga motlob bujhai diye. Eitu khan sob to girja age jabo nimite ase.
Jitia ekjon alag bhasa pora kotha koi, bisi hoilebi duijon nahoile tinjon he kobole lage, aru ekjon to etu laga motlob kobo lage.
Hoilebi jitia motlob koi dibole manu nathakile, etu manu ke girja te chup kori dibi. Aru tai nijorke Isor logote kotha kori bole dibi.
Duijon nahoile tinjon bhabobadi ke kobole dibi, aru etu ki koise dusra ke faisla kori bole dibi.
Kintu jodi ekta kotha Isor pora dusra bohi thaka ekjon ke diye, tinehoile age ula ke chup hobole dibi.
Kilekoile apnikhan sob ekta piche ekta kori kene bhabobani koribo pare, titia sob bujhi bole paribo aru utsah pabo.
Hosa pora bhi bhabobadi khan laga atma to bhabobadi khan nijor laga nichete kaam kore.
Kilekoile Isor to ulta-polti laga Isor nohoi, kintu shanti laga ase. Sob pobitro manu khan laga girja te,
mahila khan ke girja bhitor te chup thaki bole dibi. Kilekoile taikhan ke kotha kori bole agya nai, kintu taikhan adhikar thaka manu nichete thakibo lage, Moses laga niyom te koise.
Kintu jodi taikhan sikhi bole itcha hoile, taikhan laga nijor mota ke ghor te hudibole dibi, kele koile ekjon mahila pora girja ghor te kotha kora to sorom laga kotha ase.
Na Isor laga kotha to apnikhan pora he ulaise? Na khali apnikhan he etu paise?
Jodi kunba manu nijorke bhabobadi hobole nohoile bhi bordan paikena ase koi kene bhabe, tinehoile moi apnikhan ke itu chithi te likhi ase etu sob to Isor laga hukum ase koi kene bujhi bo lage.
Kintu jodi kunba manu murkho nisena thake, taike murkho he thaki bole dibi.
Etu nimite, bhai khan, bhabobani korate pura mon dibi, aru kunke bhi alag bhasha kobole narukhabi.
Kintu sob kaam to bhal aru thik niyom pora koribo lage.
Bhai khan, etiya moi susamachar apnikhan ke koi diya to yaad rakhibole di ase, juntu apnikhan bhi pai loise, aru jun to te apnikhan khara ase,
juntu pora apnikhan poritran pai loi ase, hoile bhi apnikhan ami prochar kora kotha to thik pora dhori kene thakile, jodi apnikhan biswas kori luwa to eku bhi labh nathaka nahoile.
Kilekoile moi ki paise etu apnikhan ke di dise - Shastro te likha nisena Khrista amikhan laga paap nimite morise,
aru Taike mati bhitor te dabai dise, aru Tai tisra dinte jinda hoise, Isor kotha hisab te,
aru Tai Cephas ke dikhai dise, aru etu pichete Tai laga baroh ta chela khan ke.
Etu pichete Tai ekbar te pans-soh upor bhai khan logot Tai dikhai dise. Kunba to etiya bhi jinda ase, kintu kunba to mori jaise.
Etu pichete Tai James ke dikhai dise, etu pichete Tai laga sob apostle khan ke.
Aru sobse anth te, Tai moike dikhai dise, jineka ekjon bacha homoi napunchi kene jonom huwa nisena.
Kilekoile Isor laga apostle majote moi he sob pora chutu ase, moi eneka koi ase kele koile moi Isor laga girja khan ke dukh digdar di thakise, etu karone moi Tai laga apostle hobole yogya nohoi.
Kintu aji moi ki ase sob Isor laga anugrah pora he ase, aru juntu anugrah moi logote thakise etu ene khali pora nohoi. Hoilebi, dusra khan pora bhi moi he bisi kaam korise, kintu asol te moi laga hokti pora kaam kora nohoi, hoilebi Isor laga anugraha ami logote thaka nimite.
Etu karone, ami hoilebi taikhan hoilebi, amikhan sob ekta khobor he prochar kori ase aru etu nimite apnikhan biswas korise.
Etiya jodi Khrista ke amikhan Tai mora pora punoruthan hoise koi kene prochar kore, tinehoile kunba apnikhan majote kele mora manu khan punoruthan nohoi koi kene dusra ke koi ase?
Kintu jodi ta te mora manu khan mori kene punoruthan nohoi, tinehoile Khrista bhi mora pora punoruthan huwa nai;
aru jodi Khrista ke punoruthan kori diya nai, tinehoile amikhan laga prochar to sob misa misi ase, aru apnikhan laga biswas to misa misi ase.
Arubi, amikhan to Isor laga misa gawahi prochar kori ase koi kene pabo, kelemane amikhan Isor laga gawahi kowa to Tai he Jisu ke punoruthan kori dise, aru jodi kunke bhi mora pora punoruthan kori diya nai, tinehoile Isor pora Khrista ke bhi punoruthan kori diya nai.
Kilekoile jodi mora khan punoruthan huwa nai, tinehoile Khrista bhi punoruthan huwa nai;
aru jodi Khrista punoruthan huwa nai, tinehoile apnikhan laga biswas to misa misi ase; aru apnikhan etiya paap te ase.
Aru jun khan Khrista nimite morise, taikhan sob harai jaise.
Jodi etu prithibi te amikhan laga jibon to Khrista laga asha te jinda thake, tinehoile etu prithibi te sob pora mon dukh manu khan to amikhan he hobo.
Kintu asol te Khrista ke mora pora punoruthan uthai dise, aru morija khan bhitor te Tai he prothom phol ase.
Kilekoile mora to manu pora anise, aru mora pora jee utha bhi dusra manu pora ahise.
Kilekoile jineka Adam te sob morija-a nisena, Khrista te sob aru jinda hoi jabo.
Kintu sob to thik hisab te hobo: Khrista, prothom phol, etu pichete jitia Khrista wapas ahibo, kun Khrista laga ase, taikhan khan uthibo.
Etu pichete hekh homoi to ahibo, jitia Khrista etu prithibi laga sob cholawta, adhikari, aru sob takot khan ke khotom kori dibo. Etu pichete Tai pora Baba Isor ke rajyo to di dibo.
Kilekoile Khrista he raj koribo jitia tak Isor pora Tai laga dushman khan ke Khrista laga theng nichete narakhe.
Mora to he sob pora hekh dushman hobo junke Isor pora khotom koribo.
Kilekoile, “Isor pora sob jinis ke Tai laga theng nichete rakhise.” Kintu jitia eneka koi ase “Tai sob jinis ke rakhise,” etu bhal pora bujhi ase Isor to sob jinis ke Tai laga nichete rakha to Tai nijorke milai kene kowa nohoi.
Etiya, jitia sob to Tai laga nichete ase, tinehoile Khrista nijor bhi Isor laga nichete ase jun pora sobke nichete rakhi kene ase, eneka hoile Isor he sob uporte raj koribo.
Nohoile, dusra khan ki koribo jun khan mora nimite baptizma loi ase koi kene? Jodi mora khan kitia bhi punoruthan nohoi, tinehoile taikhan kele mora nimite baptizma loi ase?
Aru amikhan nimite kineka? Amikhan kele amikhan nijorke sob somoite khatra te rakhe?
Ami hodai din mori ase! Moi hosa pora koi ase, bhai khan, amikhan laga Probhu Jisu Khrista te apnikhan ke moi khushi pora phutani kore.
Moi Ephesus sheher te jongli janwar logote lorai korise, manu khan laga khushi hisab nimite, kintu moi nimite ki labh hoise? Jodi mora khan ke punoruthan kora nai koile, “Ahibi amikhan kha-luwa koribo, kele koile amikhan kali moribo.”
Dhoka nakhabi: “Biya sathi khan pora bhal adot ke biya kori diye.”
Nisa hoi kene nathakibi! Dharmik jibon te thakibi! Paap kaam kori nathakibi. Kilekoile apnikhan kunba Isor ke bhal pora najane- moi eitu khan kowa to apnikhan ke sorom khila bole nimite koi ase.
Kintu kunba pora hudibo, “Mora khan kineka punoruthan hoi, aru taikhan ki kisim laga gaw te ahibo?”
Apnikhan bisi murkho khan ase! Jitia apuni kiba bijon matite rupai, etu bijon age mori jabo lage etu pichete tai jinda hoi kene uthibo.
Aru jodi apuni kiba bijon rupai, ki ulabole ase etu nohoi, kintu ki rupai se khali etu bijon he ase- dhaan guti nohoile kiba ekta bijon hobo pare.
Kintu Isor laga itcha hisab te etu bijon ke gaw dibo, aru ekta-ekta bijon ke bhi nijor laga gaw dibo.
Sob mangso to eke nohoi. Kintu, sob manu laga mangso to eke ase, aru sob janwar laga mangso eke ase, aru sob chiriya laga bhi eke ase, aru sob maas laga bhi eke ase.
Ta te sorgo laga gaw khan ase aru prithibi laga gaw khan bhi ase. Kintu sorgo laga gaw to ekta gaw ase, aru prithibi laga gaw to alag ase.
Ta te suryo laga ekta gaw ase, aru chand laga alag ekta gaw ase, aru tara khan laga alag ekta gaw ase. Aru sob tara to taikhan nijor hisab te sundur ase.
Etu nisena mora khan pora punoruthan huwa bhi eneka ase. Ji gaw to matite rupai dise etu to puchi jabo, aru anonto jibon te uthijabo.
Etu ke eku sonman nathaki kene rupai dise; kintu mohima hoi kene uthe. Etu ke komjur pora rupai se; kintu hokti hoi kene uthe.
Etu ke mangso laga gaw hoi kene rupai dise; kintu atma laga gaw hoi kene uthe. Jodi ta te mangso laga gaw thake, tinehoile atma laga gaw bhi thake.
Isor laga kotha te likhi kene ase, “Poila manu, Adam, ekta jinda jibon hoise.” Kintu hekh Adam to jibon diya atma hoise.
Kintu atma he poila aha nohoi, mangso he poila ahise, aru etu pichete he atma.
Prithibi laga prothom manu ke bona to mati pora bonaise. Kintu dusra manu to sorgo pora ase.
Jineka ekjon prithibi laga thakise, thik eneka dusra khan bhi prithibi laga ase; aru jineka sorgo laga thakise, etu nisena dusra khan bhi sorgo laga ase.
Aru jineka amikhan sabole prithibi laga protima bukha nisena hoise, etu nisena amikhan sorgo laga protima bukha nisena bhi hobo.
Etiya ami koi ase, bhai khan, mangso aru khun pora Isor laga rajyote uttoradhikari napabo. Nohoile bhi harai juwa pora harai najuwa ke uttoradhikar nohobo.
Sabi! Ami apuni khan ke ekta lukai kene thaka kotha koi dibo: Amikhan sob naghuma bo, kintu amikhan sob bodli hoi jabo-
Ekbar te he, suku bondh kori kene khula pora bhi joldi, hekh somoi laga bhigul hala korate. Etu bhigul laga awaj ulabo, aru mora khan kitia bhi namori bole nimite jinda hoi kene uthibo, aru amikhan sob bodli hoi jabo.
Kilekoile harai jabole laga gaw to kitia bhi harai najabole laga gaw lagai pindhi lobo lage, aru etu mora laga gaw to namora laga gaw hobo lage.
Kintu jitia harai juwa gaw pora kitia bhi harai naja gaw ke pindhi loi, aru jitia mora gaw pora kitia bhi namora gaw ke pindhi loi, titia Shastro te ki likhi kene ase etu ahijabo, “Mrityu ke harai dise aru pura jiti jaise.”
“Hey mrityu, tumi laga jit to kote ase? Mrityu, tumi laga dunkh kot te ase?”
Hoilebi mrityu laga dunkh to paap ase, aru paap laga shakti to niyom ase.
Hoilebi Isor ke dhanyavad ase, jun amikhan ke jiti bole diye Probhu Jisu Khrista pora.
Etu nimite ami morom kora bhai khan thik pora biswas ke dhori kene thakibi, nahili kene, hodai mon dikene Probhu laga kaam kori thakibi, etu jani kene thakibi ki apuni Probhu karone kaam kora to misa misi nahobo.
Etiya Isor laga manu khan nimite daan joma korise, ami Galatia jaga laga girjakhan te kowa nisena, apuni khan bhi eneka he koribi.
Hodai hafta laga prothom dinte, apuni khan alag joma kori lobi, apuni khan laga kamai pora joma kori kene rakhibi, kelemane jitia moi ahibo, apuni khan titia joma kori nathakibo.
Etu pichete jitia moi punchibo, jun hoilebi, apnikhan pora basikena moi logot patha manu khan ke apnikhan laga daan logote chithi likhi kene Jerusalem te pathai dibo.
Aru jodi moi bhi jabo parise koile, taikhan moi logote jabo.
Hoilebi moi apuni khan logote ahibo Macedonia jagate ja pichete. Kilekoile ami Macedonia majot pora jai ase.
Ami apuni khan logote thakibo parise koile thanda din tak thakibo, etu hoile ami dusra kun jaga khan te jabole ase etu nimite apnikhan amike modot kori bole paribo.
Kelemane moi apuni khan ke khali paar hoi kene dikha he nohoikena, ami asha kore, Probhu laga itcha hoile apuni khan logote olop somoi karone thaki bole.
Kintu moi Ephesus te thakibo Pentecost napuncha tak.
Kelemane ekta dangor dorja ami karone khula ase, aru ta te dushman khan bhi bisi ase.
Etiya jodi Timothy ahile, sabi tai apuni khan ke bhoi nakore, kelemane tai Probhu laga kaam kore, moi nisena.
Kunbi taike chutu nabhabi bhi, hoilebi tai kot te jabole ase, shanti pora taike modot kori dibi, eneka pora tai moi logot ahibo, kele koile ami bhabona kori ase, ami laga bhai khan logote tai bhi ahibo koi kene.
Etiya amikhan laga bhai Apollos laga kotha to, moi taike apnikhan logote jabole nimite bisi mon dangor kori disele. Kintu apnikhan logote etiya ahibole nimite tai laga itcha nai. Hoile bhi tai jitia bhal somoi pabo titia ahibo.
Hoshiar pora thakibi; biswas te thik pora thakibi; mon dangor thakibi; takot thakibi.
Ji kaam korile bhi morom pora koribi.
Apuni khan jani ase, bhai khan, Stephanas laga ghor manu khan, taikhan to Achaia jaga laga poila bijon khan ase, aru taikhan to pobitro manu khan laga kaam koribo nimite nijorke di dise. Moi apuni khan ke koi ase,
taikhan nisena cholawta manu khan aru dusra jun khan mon dikene tai logote mili kene sewa kori ase eitu khan laga pichete jabi,
Moi khushi ase Stephanas aru Fortunatus, aru Achaicus aha nimite, kelemane taikhan apuni khan ki napuncha thakise etu punchai dise.
Taikhan moi laga aru apuni laga atma ke khushi kori dise. Etu karone, apnikhan eneka manu ke janikena thakibi.
Asia jaga laga girja khan apnikhan ke salam janai di ase. Aquila aru Priscilla pora Probhu laga naam pora salam janai di ase, taikhan laga ghor te thaka girja logot te.
Sob bhai khan apuni ke salam di ase. Ekjon-ekjon ke pobitro laga chuma dibi.
Ami laga nijor hath pora salam diya laga likhi ase- Paul.
Kun pora Probhu ke morom nakore, tai uporte shrap thaki bole dibi. Amikhan laga Probhu. Ahibi!
Probhu Jisu laga anugrah apuni khan logote thakibi.
Moi laga morom aru Probhu Jisu laga morom apuni khan logote thaki bole dibi. Amen.
Paul, jun Isor laga itcha pora Khrista Jisu laga apostle ase, aru amikhan laga bhai Timothy, Corinth sheher te thaka Isor laga girja ke, aru Achaia jagate thaka sob pobitro jonke.
Anugrah aru shanti Isor amikhan laga Baba aru Probhu Jisu Khrista pora aha apnikhan logote thaki bole dibi.
Asis hobi Isor aru amikhan laga Probhu Jisu Khrista laga Baba, jun daya laga Baba ase aru mon aram diya laga Baba ase,
Kun pora amikhan laga sob dukh te anondo kori diye, titia amikhan pora bhi dusra khan ke anondo dibole paribo, etu eke anondo Isor pora amikhan ke bhi anondo dise.
Kilekoile kineka Khrista laga dukh te amikhan bhi bhag hoi ase, thik etu nisena, Khrista te amikhan bhi bisi anondo pai ase.
Kintu jodi amikhan digdar pai ase, etu apnikhan laga anondo aru poritran nimite ase, jodi amikhan anondo pai ase, etu to apnikhan ke anondo dibo nimite ase, aru etu pora apnikhan bhi nomro kori kene amikhan laga dukh te bhag hobo.
Aru amikhan laga asha apnikhan nimite thaka to mojbut ase, amikhan laga dukh te apnikhan bhi bhag ase koi kene jani ase, etu nisena anondo te bhi bhag ase.
Kilekoile bhai khan, amikhan uporte Asia jagate ki digdar hoise, etu apnikhan najani kene thakibo dibo mon nai. Ta te amikhan dukh pa to amikhan laga takot bahar thakise aru etu nimite amikhan jinda thaki bole bhi asha nathaka hoi jaisele.
Hosa pora bhi, amikhan morai dibole hukum thakisele, eneka hoile he amikhan nijor uporte nohoi kene, Isor kun pora mora ke jinda kori diye, Tai uporte biswas thakibo nimite.
Isor he amikhan ke mori bole thaka pora bachai dise, aru Tai amikhan ke aru bhi bachai lobo. Tai uporte amikhan laga asha to rakhidise titia Tai amikhan ke bachai thakibo,
apnikhan bhi eke logote mili kene amikhan nimite prathana koribi, titia amikhan uporte bisi manu pora modot kora nimite apnikhan ke bisi manu khan dhanyavad dibo.
Kilekoile etu nimite amikhan mon dangor kore: aru amikhan laga thik bhabona pora etu gawahi di ase, amikhan ji kaam etu prithibi te korise, etu pobitro aru hosa mon pora korise, aru mangso laga buddhi pora nohoi, kintu Isor laga kripa pora, aru asol to apuni khan logot te he kaam to bisi korise.
Kilekoile amikhan dusra eku bhi likha nai, khali juntu apnikhan puribole aru bujhi bole pare. Kintu etiya ami asha ase apuni khan pura bujhi jabo,
jineka apuni khan age pora amikhan laga bisi kotha bujhi kene ase, titia apnikhan bhi Probhu Jisu wapas aha laga dinte amikhan nimite mon dangor dikha bo, aru amikhan bhi apuni khan nimite dikha bo.
Aru mon dangor pora, moi age te apnikhan logote ahibole bhabona korise, titia apnikhan aru dusra bar asirbad pabo,
aru Macedonia jagate jai thaka homoi te apnikhan ke paar kori kene jabo, aru Macedonia pora wapas aha homoi te bhi, aru ami Judea jagate jabole nimite apnikhan pora amike modot koribo.
Etu karone, jitia ami eneka pora bhabona kori thakise, moi etu ke asani pora luwa nai, na loise? Na ami ki bhabona korise etu to mangso laga itcha pora he hoise, juntu nimite apnikhan eke somoite “Hoi, hoi” aru “Nohoi, nohoi” eneka koi ase?
Kintu Isor to hosa ase, etu nimite amikhan laga kotha apnikhan ke khali “Hoi” aru “Nohoi” eneka hobo napare.
Kilekoile Isor laga Putro, Jisu Khrista, junke ami aru Silvanus aru Timothy pora apnikhan majote prochar kori dise- Tai to “Hoi” aru “Nohoi” thaka nai, kintu khali “Hoi” he thakise.
Kilekoile Tai bhitor te, Isor laga sob vachan khan “Hoi” ase. Etu nisena Tai dwara amikhan pora “Amen” koi ase, Tai laga mohima nimite.
Etiya Isor he ekjon ase jun pora ami aru apnikhan ke Khrista te takot bonai dise, aru Tai laga kaam nimite amikhan ke basi loise,
Tai pora amikhan ke Tai nimite mohor lagai dise, aru Atma laga kosom amikhan laga monte dise.
Moi hosa pora koi ase, Isor ke ami laga gawah hobo nimite mati ase, moi apnikhan ke saja nadibo karone Corinth te aha nai.
Amikhan eneka kora to apuni khan laga biswas ke amikhan laga nichete rakhi kene chola bo nimite nohoi, kintu, amikhan sob apnikhan logote mili kene kaam kora manu khan ase aru apnikhan laga khushi nimite ase, kele koile apnikhan laga biswas to bisi mojbut hoi kene ase.
Moi laga mon nijor pora etu bhabi loise, moi apnikhan logote mon dukh hoi kene aru nahibo.
Kilekoile jodi moi apnikhan ke mon dukh kori diye, tinehoile kun pora amike mon khushi kori dibo, ami pora mon biya kori diya khan pora nohoile?
Aru moi etu eke kotha khan likhi ase, eneka hoile jitia moi ahibo, moi jun khan uporte moi laga mon khushi thakibo lage, taikhan pora moi laga mon dukh nakoribo karone, aru moi apnikhan sobke pura mon pora biswas ase ami laga khushi to apnikhan sob laga khushi hobo koi kene.
Kilekoile moi laga mon bisi bikhai kene aru dukh hoi kene likhi ase, suku pani giri kene, kintu apnikhan ke mon dukh kori dibo nimite nohoi, hoilebi ami laga morom apnikhan nimite bisi thaka to janai dibo nimite ase.
Jodi kunba pora mon dukh kori bole dise, tai moi ekla ke mon dukh kori diya nohoi, hoile bhi, olop kori kene- moi laga kotha kara nalagaibo nimite- apnikhan sob laga mon dukh koridi ase.
Eneka ekjon manu nimite etu sajai he thik ase, manu bisi pora taike golti diya to he kafi ase,
etu hoile ulta apnikhan taike maph kori dibole lage, aru tai laga mon dangor kori dibole lage. Tinehoile, eneka ekjon ke bisi mon dukh pora khai dibo.
Eneka nimite, ami apnikhan ke utsah kori ase, apnikhan laga morom tai phale thik pora rakhibi.
Kilekoile etiya bhi ami apuni khan ke likhi ase, tinehoile ami apuni khan ke porikha kori bole paribo, apuni khan sob phale kotha mani kene ase na nai.
Junke apnikhan jineka pora hoile bhi maph kori dise, ami bhi maph koridi ase- kele koile ami kunba ke maph korise -junke ami maph koridi ase-, ami apnikhan nimite Khrista bhitor te thaka manu hoi kene maph koridi ase,
eneka nohoile Saitan amikhan pora labh uthabo. Kilekoile amikhan tai laga chalak khan najani kene thaka nohoi.
Jitia ami Khrista laga susamachar laga kotha jonai dibole nimite Troas te ahisele, ami usorte Probhu laga ekta dorja khuli sele.
Ami laga atma bhitor te aram thaka nai, kele koile ami laga bhai Titus ke ami bisarikena paa nai. Etu pora, ami taikhan ke chari kene Macedonia te jai jaise.
Etiya Isor ke dhanyavad ase, jun amikhan ke hodai Khrista dwara jiti bole di thake, aru amikhan dwara pora tel laga mitha sugandh laga gyaan sob jagate dikhai thake.
Kilekoile amikhan Isor usorte Khrista laga mitha sugandh thaka ase, taikhan nimite jun khan ke bachai loi ase, aru taikhan jun khan harai ase-
Jun khan harai ase taikhan nimite amikhan mora laga gundh ase, aru jun khan ke bachi loi ase taikhan nimite jibon laga sugandh ase. Aru kun eitu khan pabole thik ase?
Kilekoile amikhan bisi jon nisena nohoi, jun khan Isor laga kotha ke bisi halka pora cholai ase, hoile bhi amikhan to hosa pora Isor usorte amikhan Khrista bhitor te thaki kene koi ase.
Amikhan aru bhi nijorke untcha kori bole shuru hoi ase? Amikhan to bhal naam laga chithi apnikhan pora nohoile bhi amikhan nimite lagi ase naki, dusra manu khan dorkar kora nisena?
Apnikhan he amikhan laga mon bhitor te likhi kene thaka chithi ase, sob manu khan pora jani ase aru puri ase,
apnikhan Khrista laga chithi ase koi kene dikhai dise, junke amikhan pora sai dise, kolom pora likhi kene nohoi, kintu jinda Isor laga Atma pora, pathor laga tukrate nohoi, hoile bhi mon laga tukrate.
Aru Khrista dwara amikhan Isor phale eneka biswas ase.
Amikhan sob parikena sob to amikhan pora he kori ase eneka kobole nohoi. Hoile bhi Isor he amikhan ke paribole di ase,
Jun pora amikhan ke notun vachan nimite yogya hobole dise; likha kotha pora nohoi, hoilebi Atma pora hoise. Kilekoile likhi kene thaka kotha to mori bole diye, hoilebi Pobitro Atma pora he jibon diye.
Hoilebi juntu porisorja pora mrityu anise- juntu pathor khan te khundi kene likhise- iman mohima te ahise, juntu nimite Israel laga bacha khan Moses laga mukh phine sabole para nai, kele koile tai mukh laga mohima to komti hoi asele,
tinehoile, kineka Pobitro Atma laga kaam khan etu pora bhi bisi mohima thaka nahobo?
Kilekoile jodi bodnam kori diya laga kaam khan te mohima thakise koile, dhormikta laga kaam khan to mohima pora bhorta hobo!
Kilekoile juntu mohima ase koi thakise, etiya utu hisab te mohima nai, kele koile etiya laga mohima to he bisi dangor ase.
Kilekoile juntu khotom hoijai ase utu laga mohima pora ahise koile, juntu thaki ase etu to aru bhi kiman bisi dangor mohima pora ahibo!
Tinehoile jitia dikhi ase amikhan laga eneka asha ase, amikhan mon dangor huwa kotha koi thake,
Aru Moses nisena nohoi, jun tai laga mukh uporte ekta kapra rakhise, eneka pora Isor laga bacha khan utu laga piche phine saikene nathakibo juntu khotom hoijai ase.
Hoilebi Israel manu khan to taikhan laga bhabona ke bon kori kene rakhise. Kilekoile aji tak bhi purana niyom khan pura homoi te utu kapra ke nahataikena rakhi ase. Utu kapra ke uthai diya nai, kele koile Khrista dwara he etu khotom hoijai ase.
Hoilebi aji tak bhi, jitia Moses ke porhe, utu kapra taikhan laga mon uporte ase.
Eneka hoile bhi jitia ekjon Probhu phale ahibo, utu kapra ke hatai diye.
Etiya Probhu Atma ase: aru jun jagate Probhu laga Atma ase, ta te ajadi ase.
Hoilebi amikhan sob, mukh te eku bhi nalagaikena sisate sa-a nisena Probhu laga mohima sai ase, aru nijor bhi eneka pora mohima paikena bodli hoi ase, jineka Probhu laga Atma pora hoi ase.
Etu karone, etu porisorja kaam kori thaka to, jineka amikhan Isor laga daya paise, amikhan mon chutu nohoi.
Hoile bhi lukai kene thaka misa khan chari dise, chalak kori kene na berabo, Isor laga kotha thoga baji nimite nacholabo; hoilebi hosa ke dikhai kene Isor usorte sob manu laga mon laga bhabona te nijorke thik korise.
Hoilebi jodi amikhan prochar kora susamachar to dhaki kene ase, etu taikhan nimite ase jun khan harai kene ase,
jun khan bhitor te etu yug laga isor pora abiswasi khan laga dimag ke bondh kori dise, eneka pora Khrista laga mohima laga susamachar, jun Isor nisena ase, taikhan uporte pohor nathake.
Kilekoile amikhan nije ke prochar kora nohoi, kintu Probhu Jisu Khrista ke; aru amikhan nijor apnikhan laga noukar ase, Jisu nimite.
Kilekoile Isor he ase, jun koise, “Andhar pora puhor to ujala ulai ahibo,” jun amikhan laga mon bhitor te ujala korise, Isor laga mohima laga gyaan laga puhor Jisu Khrista laga chehera pora dikha bole nimite.
Hoilebi amikhan logote etu khajana to mati kolsi khan bhitor te ase, tinehoile etu iman dangor takot to Isor laga he hobo, aru amikhan laga nohoi.
Amikhan sob phale digdar ase, eneka hoile bhi mon dukh nai; amikhan ulta-pulta hoi kene ase, hoile bhi bhabona harai kene thaka nohoi.
Biswas nimite dukh kosto paise, kintu amikhan ke chari diya nohoi. Amikhan ke mari kene girai dise, hoile bhi khotom kori diya nohoi.
Hodai Probhu Jisu laga mora gaw ke bukhi kene thaki ase, titia Jisu laga jibon bhi amikhan laga gaw te dikhi bole pabo.
Kilekoile amikhan jun khan jinda ase Jisu nimite hodai mori bole nisena hoijai, titia amikhan laga mori bole thaka gaw te Jisu laga jibon bhi dikhi bole pabo.
Etu nimite mrityu to amikhan bhitor te kaam kori ase, hoilebi jibon to apnikhan bhitor te ase.
Amikhan logote eke biswas laga atma ase, likhi kene thaka nisena, “Ami biswas korise; aru etu nimite ami kotha koise. Amikhan bhi biswas korise aru etu nimite amikhan bhi koise,
amikhan jani ase tai jun Probhu Jisu ke uthaise, amikhan ke bhi Jisu logote uthabo, aru amikhanke aru apnikhan ke eke logote Tai usorte loijabo.
Kilekoile eitu khan sob apnikhan nimite ase, tinehoile kiman dangor anugraha sob phale jai ase, tineka he Isor laga mohima nimite dhanyavad bisi diya he hobo.
Etu nimite amikhan alsi hoi najai. Amikhan laga gaw mangso to bura hoijai ase, hoilebi, amikhan laga bhitor laga atma to din-dinte notun koridi ase.
Kilekoile amikhan laga olop dukh khan, juntu olop homoi nimite he ase, amikhan nimite bisi bhal aru kitia bhi khotom nahobole bisi dangor nimite kaam kori ase.
Amikhan utu jinis khan ke sa-a nohoi juntu dikhi ase, hoilebi utu jinis khan ke sai ase juntu dikhi bole napare. Kilekoile ki dikhi ase, etu olop homoi nimite he ase; hoile ki suku pora nadikhe, etu he anonto ase.
Kilekoile amikhan jani ase jodi amikhan prithibi te thaka tombu laga ghor to bhangi jaise koile bhi, amikhan logote Isor laga ghor ase, juntu hath pora bona nohoi, hoilebi sorgo khan te thaka anonto ghor ase.
Kilekoile etu tombu laga ghor te amikhan dukh pora hala kori ase, aru amikhan ke sorgo laga kapra lagai dibole itcha ase,
Eneka pora amikhan ke kapra lagai dise koile amikhan ke kapra nalagai kene napabo.
Kilekoile amikhan jun khan etu tombu laga ghor te ase dukh paikena hala kori ase, bisi bhari ujon bukhi kene, kelemane amikhan kapra nalagaikena thaka hobo mon nai, kintu kapra lagai kene thakibo mon ase, titia mori bole thaka gaw ke jibon pora khai dibo.
Etiya tai jun amikhanke eneka kori bole dise etu Isor ase, jun amikhan ke Atma bisari bole nimite ekta bhabona bhi dise.
Etu nimite amikhan hodai mon-dangor kori kene ase, etu janikena, jiman tak amikhan etu ghor te thaki kene gaw bhitor te ase, amikhan utu Probhu logote nai-
Kilekoile amikhan biswas pora berai ase, dikhi kene nohoi-
Amikhan mon dangor ase, aru bhabi ase etu gaw te nathaki jabo, aru Probhu logote he thakibo.
Etu nimite amikhan kaam kori ase, titia, thakile bhi nohoile nathakile bhi, amikhan ke Tai khushi pabo.
Kilekoile amikhan sob Khrista bisar kora laga singhason age te khara hobole lagibo, tinehoile sob manu pabo juntu tai nijor gaw te korise, jineka tai korise, bhal hoilebi biya hoilebi.
Etu nimite Probhu laga bhoi janikena, amikhan pora manu khan ke kotha mani bole koi ase. Kintu amikhanke Isor pora dikhai dise, aru ami etu bhi asha kori ase apuni khan laga mon laga bhabona te amikhan ke bujhi di ase.
Kilekoile apnikhan usorte aru bhi bhal hobole nimite eneka kora nohoi, hoile bhi apuni khan pora amikhan nimite phutani kori bole ekta homoi di ase, titia apnikhan taikhan ke jowab dibole paribo jun khan khali bahar te he sai, aru mon-bhitor nohoi.
Kilekoile amikhan pagala hoile, etu Isor logote ase: nohoile amikhan dimag thaka hoile, etu to apnikhan nimite ase.
Kilekoile Khrista laga morom pora amikhanke eneka kori bole joborjosti kori ase, kele koile amikhan eneka jani loise: ekjon manu pora sob nimite morise; etu karone sob manu morise.
Aru kele koile Tai sob nimite morise, titia kunkhan jinda ase etiya pora nijor nimite jinda nathakibo, hoilebi Jun taikhan nimite morise, aru bhi uthise Tai nimite he jinda thakibo.
Etu nimite, etiya pora amikhan mangso hisab te manu ke nasabo. Hoi, amikhan Khrista ke mangso hisab te janise, hoilebi etiya to amikhan Taike eneka pora nasai.
Etu nimite, kunba manu Khrista bhitor te ase koile, tai ekjon notun bonai luwa jon hoise. Purana khan paar hoise. Sabi, etiya sob to notun hoise.
Aru etu sob Isor laga ase, jun nije ke Jisu Khrista dwara amikhan logote milai loise, aru amikhan ke mil-milap kori dibole laga kaam dise.
Etu bujhai diya kotha to eneka ase, Khrista dwara Isor pora prithibi ke nijor logote milai loise, aru eku golti khan taikhan usorte rakha nai; aru amikhanke etu prithibi te mil-milap kori bole laga kaam to dise.
